atk-s0514a3:2219_2: tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2220_0: “Ūnūdaro yo sahate jighacchaṃ, danto tapassī mitapānabhojano;
atk-s0514a3:2221_0: Āhārahetu na karoti pāpaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2222_2: Āhārahetūti atijighacchapiḷitopi yo pāpaṃ lāmakakammaṃ na karoti dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero viya.
atk-s0514a3:2222_3: Ahaṃ panajja āhārahetu pāpaṃ na karomi,
atk-s0514a3:2223_0: Tato sakko devarājā “ahaṃ nānappakāraṃ sukhapadaṭṭhānaṃ devalokasampattiṃ pahāya sīlarakkhaṇatthāya manussalokaṃ āgato,
atk-s0514a3:2223_1: tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2224_0: “Khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ vippajahitvāna sabbaṃ, na cālikaṃ bhāsati kiñci loke;
atk-s0514a3:2225_0: Vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato methunasmā, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2226_8: tato virato methunasevanato ca yo paṭivirato.
atk-s0514a3:2226_9: Taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loketi ahaṃ ajja devaccharāyo pahāya idhāgantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karomi,
atk-s0514a3:2227_0: Taṃ sutvā dhanañcayarājā “ahaṃ ajja mahantaṃ pariggahaṃ soḷasasahassanāṭakitthiparipuṇṇaṃ antepuraṃ cajitvā uyyāne samaṇadhammaṃ karomi,
atk-s0514a3:2227_1: tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2228_0: “Pariggahaṃ lobhadhammañca sabbaṃ, yo ve pariññāya pariccajeti;
atk-s0514a3:2229_0: Dantaṃ ṭhitattaṃ amamaṃ nirāsaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2230_8: Yo imāhi tīhi pariññāhi jānitvā vatthukāmakilesakāme pariccajati,
atk-s0514a3:2230_14: Taṃ ve naranti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ “samaṇa”nti vadanti.
atk-s0514a3:2231_0: Iti te sabbepi attano attano sīlameva mahantanti vaṇṇetvā sakkādayo dhanañcayaṃ pucchiṃsu “atthi pana, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a3:2231_3: mahārājāno mama atthadhammānusāsako mahāpañño asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito nāma atthi,
atk-s0514a3:2231_7: Atha sabbepi uyyānā nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā pallaṅkaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā bodhisattaṃ pallaṅkavaramajjhe
atk-s0514a3:2231_10: taṃ no vinodehī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:2232_0: “Pucchāma kattāramanomapaññaṃ, kathāsu no viggaho atthi jāto;
atk-s0514a3:2233_0: Chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, tadajja kaṅkhaṃ vitaremu sabbe”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2234_1: Viggaho atthi jātoti eko sīlaviggaho sīlavivādo uppanno atthi.
atk-s0514a3:2234_2: Chindajjāti amhākaṃ taṃ kaṅkhaṃ tāni ca vicikicchitāni vajirena sineruṃ paharanto viya ajja chinda.
atk-s0514a3:2235_0: Paṇḍito tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mahārājāno tumhākaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ vivādakathaṃ sukathitadukkathitaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2236_0: “Ye paṇḍitā atthadasā bhavanti, bhāsanti te yoniso tattha kāle;
atk-s0514a3:2237_0: Kathaṃ nu kathānaṃ abhāsitānaṃ, atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalā janindā”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2238_1: Tattha kāleti tasmiṃ viggahe ārocite yuttappayuttakāle te paṇḍitā tamatthaṃ ācikkhantā yoniso bhāsanti.
atk-s0514a3:2238_2: Atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalāti kusalā chekāpi samānā abhāsitānaṃ kathānaṃ kathaṃ nu atthaṃ ñāṇena nayeyyuṃ upaparikkheyyuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2239_0: “Kathaṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, garuḷo pana venateyyo kimāha;
atk-s0514a3:2240_0: Gandhabbarājā pana kiṃ vadeti, kathaṃ pana kurūnaṃ rājaseṭṭho”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2243_0: “Khantiṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, appāhāraṃ garuḷo venateyyo;
atk-s0514a3:2245_1: nāgarājā tāva kopaneyyepi puggale akuppanasaṅkhātaṃ adhivāsanakhantiṃ vaṇṇeti,
atk-s0514a3:2246_0: Atha tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2247_0: “Sabbāni etāni subhāsitāni, na hettha dubbhāsitamatthi kiñci;
atk-s0514a3:2248_0: Yasmiñca etāni patiṭṭhitāni, arāva nābhyā susamohitāni;
atk-s0514a3:2249_0: Catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūtaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2250_0: Tattha etānīti etāni cattāripi guṇajātāni yasmiṃ puggale sakaṭanābhiyaṃ suṭṭhu samohitāni arā viya patiṭṭhitāni,
atk-s0514a3:2250_1: catūhipetehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ puggalaṃ paṇḍitā “samaṇa”nti āhu loketi.
atk-s0514a3:2251_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto catunnampi sīlaṃ ekasamameva akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2251_1: Taṃ sutvā cattāropi rājāno tassa tuṭṭhā thutiṃ karontā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:2252_0: “Tuvañhi seṭṭho tvamanuttarosi, tvaṃ dhammagū dhammavidū sumedho;
atk-s0514a3:2253_0: Paññāya pañhaṃ samadhiggahetvā, acchecchi dhīro vicikicchitāni;
atk-s0514a3:2254_0: Acchecchi kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenā”ti..
atk-s0514a3:2255_2: Dhammagūti dhammassa gopako ceva dhammaññū ca.
atk-s0514a3:2255_4: Sumedhoti sundarapañño paññāyāti attano paññāya amhākaṃ pañhaṃ suṭṭhu adhigaṇhitvā “idamettha kāraṇa”nti yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā.
atk-s0514a3:2255_5: Acchecchīti tvaṃ dhīro amhākaṃ vicikicchitāni chindi,
atk-s0514a3:2255_6: evaṃ chindanto ca “chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitānī”ti idaṃ amhākaṃ āyācanaṃ sampādento acchecchi kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni.
atk-s0514a3:2255_7: Cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenāti yathā dantakāro kakacena hatthidantaṃ chindeyya,
atk-s0514a3:2256_0: Evaṃ te cattāropi rājāno tassa pañhabyākaraṇena tuṭṭhamānasā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2258_0: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2260_0: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2261_0: “Maṇiṃ anagghaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ, kaṇṭhāvasattaṃ maṇibhūsitaṃ me;
atk-s0514a3:2262_0: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2263_0: “Gavaṃ sahassaṃ usabhañca nāgaṃ, ājaññayutte ca rathe dasa ime;
atk-s0514a3:2264_0: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te gāmavarāni soḷasā”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2265_0: Evaṃ sakkādayo mahāsattaṃ pūjetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2268_1: Sā tassa gīvāya piḷandhanamaṇiṃ apassantī pucchi “deva,
atk-s0514a3:2268_3: candabrāhmaṇaputtassa vidhurapaṇḍitassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacitto ahaṃ tena maṇinā taṃ pūjesiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2268_11: sakalajambudīpe ekasatarājāno tassa madhuradhammakathāya bajjhitvā hatthikantavīṇāsarena paluddhamattavāraṇā
atk-s0514a3:2268_12: viya attano attano rajjāni gantuṃ na icchanti,
atk-s0514a3:2268_13: evarūpo so madhuradhammakathiko”ti tassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0514a3:2268_14: Sā vidhurapaṇḍitassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā hutvā cintesi “sacāhaṃ vakkhāmi ‘deva,
atk-s0514a3:2268_18: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ‘tassa me hadaye dohaḷo uppanno’ti gilānālayaṃ kareyya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2268_19: Sā tathā katvā siragabbhaṃ pavisitvā attano paricārikānaṃ saññaṃ datvā sirisayane nipajji.
atk-s0514a3:2268_20: Nāgarājā upaṭṭhānavelāya taṃ apassanto “kahaṃ vimalā”ti paricārikāyo pucchitvā “gilānā,
atk-s0514a3:2268_21: devā”ti vutte uṭṭhāyāsanā tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanapasse nisīditvā sarīraṃ parimajjanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2270_0: “Paṇḍu kisiyāsi dubbalā, vaṇṇarūpaṃ na tavedisaṃ pure;
atk-s0514a3:2271_0: Vimale akkhāhi pucchitā, kīdisī tuyhaṃ sarīravedanā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2272_3: Vaṇṇarūpaṃ na tavedisaṃ pureti tava vaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ pure edisaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0514a3:2275_0: “Dhammo manujesu mātīnaṃ, dohaḷo nāma janinda vuccati;
atk-s0514a3:2277_5: ahaṃ dhammena samena asāhasikakammena āhaṭaṃ vidhurassa hadayaṃ abhipatthayāmi,
atk-s0514a3:2277_7: alabhamānāya idheva maraṇanti tassa paññaṃ sandhāyevamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2280_0: “Candaṃ kho tvaṃ dohaḷāyasi, sūriyaṃ vā atha vāpi mālutaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2281_0: Dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2282_0: Tattha dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassananti asamadhurassa vidhurassa dassanameva dullabhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2282_1: Tassa hi sakalajambudīpe rājāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0514a3:2283_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “alabhamānāya me idheva maraṇa”nti parivattitvā piṭṭhiṃ datvā sāḷakakaṇṇena mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipajji.
atk-s0514a3:2283_1: Nāgarājā anattamano sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinno “vimalā vidhurapaṇḍitassa hadayamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2283_2: āharāpetī”ti saññī hutvā “paṇḍitassa hadayaṃ alabhantiyā vimalāya jīvitaṃ natthi,
atk-s0514a3:2283_3: kathaṃ nu kho tassa hadayamaṃsaṃ labhissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0514a3:2283_4: Athassa dhītā irandhatī nāma nāgakaññā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā mahantena sirivilāsena pitu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā,
atk-s0514a3:2283_7: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti pucchantī imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2285_0: “Kiṃ nu tāta tuvaṃ pajjhāyasi, padumaṃ hatthagataṃva te mukhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2286_0: Kiṃ nu dummanarūposi issara, mā tvaṃ soci amittatāpanā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2287_1: Hatthagatanti hatthena parimadditaṃ padumaṃ viya te mukhaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2288_0: Dhītu vacanaṃ sutvā nāgarājā tamatthaṃ ārocento āha –
atk-s0514a3:2290_0: “Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati;
atk-s0514a3:2291_0: Dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2293_1: mama santike vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samattho natthi,
atk-s0514a3:2293_3: vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samatthaṃ bhattāraṃ pariyesāhī”ti uyyojento upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2297_0: Iti so kilesābhiratabhāvena dhītu ananucchavikaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2298_0: “Pituno ca sā sutvāna vākyaṃ, rattiṃ nikkhamma avassutiṃ carī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2299_1: sā nāgamāṇavikā pitu vacanaṃ sutvā pitaraṃ assāsetvā mātu santikaṃ gantvā tampi assāsetvā attano sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2299_2: gantvā sabbālaṅkārehi attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā ekaṃ kusumbharattavatthaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ ekaṃse katvā tameva
atk-s0514a3:2299_3: rattiṃ udakaṃ dvidhā katvā nāgabhavanato nikkhamma himavantappadese samuddatīre ṭhitaṃ saṭṭhiyojanubbedhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2299_4: ekagghanaṃ kāḷapabbataṃ nāma añjanagiriṃ gantvā avassutiṃ cari kilesaavassutiṃ bhattupariyesanaṃ carīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2300_0: Carantī ca yāni himavante vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni,
atk-s0514a3:2300_1: tāni āharitvā sakalapabbataṃ maṇiagghiyaṃ viya alaṅkaritvā uparitale pupphasanthāraṃ katvā manoramenākārena
atk-s0514a3:2302_0: “Ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāge, ke kimpurise cāpi mānuse;
atk-s0514a3:2303_0: Ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade, dīgharattaṃ bhattā me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2304_0: Tattha ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāgeti ko gandhabbo vā rakkhaso vā nāgo vā.
atk-s0514a3:2304_1: Ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadadeti ko etesu gandhabbādīsu paṇḍito sabbakāmaṃ dātuṃ samattho,
atk-s0514a3:2304_2: so vidhurassa hadayamaṃsadohaḷiniyā mama mātu manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ bhattā bhavissatīti.
atk-s0514a3:2305_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe vessavaṇamahārājassa bhāgineyyo puṇṇako nāma yakkhasenāpati tigāvutappamāṇaṃ manomayasindhavaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2305_1: abhiruyha kāḷapabbatamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchanto taṃ tāya gītasaddaṃ assosi.
atk-s0514a3:2305_2: Anantare attabhāve anubhūtapubbāya itthiyā gītasaddo tassa chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2305_3: So tāya paṭibaddhacitto hutvā nivattitvā sindhavapiṭṭhe nisinnova “bhadde,
atk-s0514a3:2305_4: ahaṃ mama paññāya dhammena samena vidhurassa hadayaṃ ānetuṃ samatthomhi,
atk-s0514a3:2305_5: tvaṃ mā cintayī”ti taṃ assāsento aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2307_0: “Assāsa hessāmi te pati, bhattā te hessāmi anindalocane;
atk-s0514a3:2308_0: Paññā hi mamaṃ tathāvidhā, assāsa hessasi bhariyā mamā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2309_0: Tattha anindalocaneti aninditabbalocane. Tathāvidhāti vidhurassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharaṇasamatthā.
atk-s0514a3:2313_0: Ehi gacchāma pitu mamantike, esova te etamatthaṃ pavakkhatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2314_0: Tattha pubbapathānugatenāti anantare attabhāve bhūtapubbasāmike tasmiṃ pubbapatheneva anugatena.
atk-s0514a3:2314_2: so yakkhasenāpati evaṃ vatvā “imaṃ assapiṭṭhiṃ āropetvā nessāmī”ti pabbatamatthakā otaritvā tassā gahaṇatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0514a3:2314_3: Sā attano hatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ adatvā tena pasāritahatthaṃ sayaṃ gahetvā “sāmi,
atk-s0514a3:2314_8: eso eva te yathā amhākaṃ maṅgalakiriyāya bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2315_0: Evaṃ vatvā sā yakkhaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2319_0: Tattha pitusantikupāgamīti attano pituno nāgarañño santikaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:2320_0: Puṇṇakopi yakkho paṭiharitvā nāgarājassa santikaṃ gantvā irandhatiṃ yācanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:2322_0: “Nāgavara vaco suṇohi me, patirūpaṃ paṭipajja suṅkiyaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2323_0: Patthemi ahaṃ irandhatiṃ, tāya samaṅgiṃ karohi maṃ tuvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2328_0: Tattha suṅkiyanti attano kulapadesānurūpaṃ dhitu suṅkaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajja gaṇha.
atk-s0514a3:2328_1: Samaṅgiṃ karohīti maṃ tāya saddhiṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ karohi.
atk-s0514a3:2332_0: Anāmanta kataṃ kammaṃ, taṃ pacchā anutappatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2333_0: Tattha yāva āmantaye ñātīti bho yakkhasenāpati,
atk-s0514a3:2333_5: Taṃ pacchā anutappatīti itthiyo hi gatagataṭṭhāne abhiramantipi anabhiramantipi,
atk-s0514a3:2333_6: anabhiratikāle ñātakādayo amhehi saddhiṃ anāmantetvā kataṃ kammaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ hotīti ussukkaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0514a3:2333_7: evaṃ taṃ kammaṃ pacchā anutāpaṃ āvahatīti.
atk-s0514a3:2334_0: Evaṃ vatvā so bhariyāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tāya saddhiṃ sallapi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2339_0: “‘Ayaṃ so puṇṇako yakkho, yācatī maṃ irandhatiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2340_0: Bahunā vittalābhena, tassa dema piyaṃ mama”’nti.
atk-s0514a3:2341_0: Tattha pavisitvāti varuṇo puṇṇakaṃ tattheva ṭhapetvā sayaṃ uṭṭhāya yatthassa bhariyā nipannā,
atk-s0514a3:2341_2: Piyaṃ mamanti mama piyaṃ dhītaraṃ tassa bahunā vittalābhena demāti pucchati.
atk-s0514a3:2344_0: “Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
atk-s0514a3:2345_0: Sace ca kho hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māhareyya;
atk-s0514a3:2346_0: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2347_0: Tattha amhaṃ irandhatīti amhākaṃ dhītā irandhatī. Etena vittenāti etena tuṭṭhikāraṇena.
atk-s0514a3:2348_0: So tāya saddhiṃ mantetvā punadeva puṇṇakena saddhiṃ mantesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2353_0: “‘Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
atk-s0514a3:2354_0: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitasa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
atk-s0514a3:2355_0: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:2359_0: “Yaṃ paṇḍitotyeke vadanti loke, tameva bāloti punāhu aññe;
atk-s0514a3:2360_0: Akkhāhi me vippavadanti ettha, kaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nāga tuvaṃ vadesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2361_0: Tattha yaṃ paṇḍitotyeketi so kira “hadayaṃ paṇḍitassā”ti sutvā cintesi “yaṃ eke paṇḍitoti vadanti,
atk-s0514a3:2364_0: “Korabyarājassa dhanañcayassa, yadi te suto vidhuro nāma kattā;
atk-s0514a3:2365_0: Ānehi taṃ paṇḍitaṃ dhammaladdhā, irandhatī padacarā te hotū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2366_0: Tattha dhammaladdhāti dhammena labhitvā. Padacarāti pādaparicārikā.
atk-s0514a3:2367_0: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako somanassappatto sindhavaṃ nayanatthāya upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:2369_0: “Idañca sutvā varuṇassa vākyaṃ, uṭṭhāya yakkho paramappatīto;
atk-s0514a3:2370_0: Tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yutta”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2371_0: Tattha purisaṃ asaṃsīti attano upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:2375_0: Tattha jātarūpamayā kaṇṇāti tameva sindhavaṃ vaṇṇento āha.
atk-s0514a3:2375_1: Tassa hi manomayassa sindhavassa jātarūpamayā kaṇṇā,
atk-s0514a3:2375_4: Jambonadassa pākassāti jambonadassa pakkassa rattasuvaṇṇassa uracchado.
atk-s0514a3:2376_0: So puriso tāvadeva taṃ sindhavaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0514a3:2376_1: Puṇṇako taṃ abhiruyha ākāsena vessavaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a3:2381_0: “So puṇṇako kāmarāgena giddho, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ jigīsaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2382_0: Gantvāna taṃ bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, iccabravī vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2385_0: Nagare nimmite kañcanamaye, maṇḍalassa uragassa niṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2394_0: Ete dumā pariṇāmitā, sobhayanti uragassa mandiraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2406_0: Taṃ tesaṃ demi issara, tena te denti irandhatiṃ mama”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2407_12: Vāsā hiraññavatīti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānattā vāsāti ca,
atk-s0514a3:2407_13: kañcanavatiyā suvaṇṇapākārena parikkhittattā hiraññavatīti ca vuccati.
atk-s0514a3:2407_25: Campeyyakā nāgamallikāti campakā ca nāgā ca mallikā ca.
atk-s0514a3:2407_26: Bhaginīmālā atha mettha koliyāti bhaginīmālā ceva atha ettha nāgabhavane koliyā nāma rukkhā ca.
atk-s0514a3:2407_27: Ete dumā pariṇāmitāti ete pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭasākhatāya pariṇāmitā ākulasamākulā.
atk-s0514a3:2407_31: Yattha vasatopapātikoti yattha nāgabhavane opapātiko nāgarājā vasati.
atk-s0514a3:2407_33: Kālā taruṇāva uggatāti vilāsayuttatāya mandavāteritā kālavallipallavā viya uggatā.
atk-s0514a3:2407_38: Taṃ tesaṃ demīti taṃ tassa hadayaṃ ahaṃ tesaṃ demi,
atk-s0514a3:2408_0: Iti so vessavaṇena ananuññāto gantuṃ avisahitvā taṃ anujānāpetuṃ etā ettakā gāthā kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:2408_1: Vessavaṇo pana tassa kathaṃ na suṇāti.
atk-s0514a3:2408_4: Puṇṇako attano vacanassa assutabhāvaṃ ñatvā jinakadevaputtassa santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2408_5: Vessavaṇo aḍḍaṃ vinicchinitvā parājitaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā itaraṃ “gaccha tvaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2408_7: Puṇṇako “gaccha tva”nti vuttakkhaṇeyeva “mayhaṃ mātulena mama pesitabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti katipayadevaputte
atk-s0514a3:2408_8: sakkhiṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sindhavaṃ āharāpetvā abhiruyha pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a3:2410_0: “So puṇṇako bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, āmantaya vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2411_0: Tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2419_8: rājagahassa sāmantā vepullapabbatabbhantare cakkavattirañño paribhogamaṇiratanaṃ atthi mahānubhāvaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2419_9: taṃ gahetvā tena rājānaṃ palobhetvā jinissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2421_0: “So aggamā rājagahaṃ surammaṃ, aṅgassa rañño nagaraṃ durāyutaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2429_0: Tattha aṅgassa raññoti tadā aṅgassa raññova magadharajjaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:2429_4: Masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassāti masakkasārasaṅkhāte sinerupabbatamatthake māpitattā “masakkasāra”nti laddhanāmaṃ vāsavassa bhavanaṃ viya.
atk-s0514a3:2429_5: Dijābhighuṭṭhanti aññehi ca pakkhīhi abhisaṅghuṭṭhaṃ ninnāditaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2429_6: Nānāsakuntābhirudanti madhurassarena gāyantehi viya nānāvidhehi sakuṇehi abhirudaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2431_0: “Disvā maṇiṃ pabhassaraṃ jātimantaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2436_3: Obhāsatīti taṃ maṇiratanaṃ ākāse vijjuriva obhāsati.
atk-s0514a3:2436_5: Taṃ pana maṇiratanaṃ kumbhiro nāma yakkho kumbhaṇḍasahassaparivāro rakkhati.
atk-s0514a3:2436_6: So pana tena kujjhitvā olokitamatteneva bhītatasito palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ patvā kampamāno olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2436_7: Iti taṃ palāpetvā puṇṇako maṇiratanaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0514a3:2436_8: Manoharaṃ nāmāti manasā cintitaṃ dhanaṃ āharituṃ sakkotīti evaṃladdhanāmaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2437_0: Iti so taṃ gahetvā ākāsena gacchanto taṃ nagaraṃ patto. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2440_0: Samāgate ekasataṃ samagge, avhettha yakkho avikampamāno.
atk-s0514a3:2443_0: Kamanuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma, ko vāpi no jeti varaddhanenā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2444_1: so puṇṇako assapiṭṭhito oruyha assaṃ adissamānarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā māṇavakavaṇṇena kurūnaṃ sabhaṃ upagato.
atk-s0514a3:2444_2: Ekasatanti ekasatarājāno achambhīto hutvā “ko nīdhā”tiādīni vadanto jūtena avhettha.
atk-s0514a3:2444_3: Ko nīdhāti ko nu imasmiṃ rājasamāgame.
atk-s0514a3:2444_9: Kamanuttaranti jinanto ca kataraṃ rājānaṃ anuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma.
atk-s0514a3:2444_10: Ko vāpi no jetīti atha vā ko nāma rājā amhe varadhanena jeti.
atk-s0514a3:2444_11: Iti so catūhi padehi korabyameva ghaṭṭeti.
atk-s0514a3:2445_0: Atha rājā “mayā ito pubbe evaṃ sūro hutvā kathento nāma na diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0514a3:2445_1: ko nu kho eso”ti cintetvā pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2447_0: “Kuhiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmi, na korabyasseva vaco tavedaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2448_0: Abhītosi no vaṇṇanibhāya sabbe, akkhāhi me nāmañca bandhave cā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2449_0: Tattha na korabyassevāti kururaṭṭhavāsikasseva tava vacanaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0514a3:2450_0: Taṃ sutvā itaro “ayaṃ rājā mama nāmaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0514a3:2450_4: tasmā maṃ pagabbhatāya evaṃ vadetī’ti avamaññissati,
atk-s0514a3:2450_5: anantarātīte attabhāve nāmamassa kathessāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2453_0: Aṅgesu me ñātayo bandhavā ca, akkhena devasmi idhānupatto”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2454_1: Iminā attano puṇṇakanāmameva paṭicchannaṃ katvā katheti.
atk-s0514a3:2454_2: Iti mavhayantīti iti maṃ avhayanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0514a3:2455_0: Atha rājā “māṇava, tvaṃ jūtena jito kiṃ dassasi, kiṃ te atthī”ti pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2457_0: “Kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto;
atk-s0514a3:2458_0: Bahūni rañño ratanāni atthi, te tvaṃ daliddo kathamavhayesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2459_2: ye taṃ jinanto akkhadhutto “āharā”ti vatvā hareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2459_3: Rañño pana nivesane bahūni ratanāni atthi,
atk-s0514a3:2459_4: te rājāno evaṃ bahudhane tvaṃ daliddo samāno kathaṃ jūtena avhayasīti.
atk-s0514a3:2462_0: “Manoharo nāma maṇī mamāyaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2463_0: Imañca ājaññamamittatāpanaṃ, etaṃ me jinitvā hare akkhadhutto”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2464_0: Pāḷipotthakesu pana “maṇi mama vijjati lohitaṅko”ti likhitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2465_0: Tattha ājaññanti imaṃ ājānīyassañca maṇiñcāti etaṃ me ubhayaṃ hareyya akkhadhuttoti assaṃ dassetvā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:2468_0: “Eko maṇī māṇava kiṃ karissati, ājāniyeko pana kiṃ karissati;
atk-s0514a3:2469_0: Bahūni rañño maṇiratanāni atthi, ājāniyā vātajavā anappakā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2472_5: imassa tāva javaṃ passathā”ti vatvā assaṃ abhiruhitvā pākāramatthakena pesesi.
atk-s0514a3:2472_6: Sattayojanikaṃ nagaraṃ assehi gīvāya gīvaṃ paharantehi parikkhittaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:2472_13: mahārājā”ti vatvā assaṃ antonagare uyyāne pokkharaṇiyā udakapiṭṭhe pesesi,
atk-s0514a3:2472_15: Atha naṃ padumapattesu vicarāpetvā pāṇiṃ paharitvā hatthaṃ pasāresi,
atk-s0514a3:2472_17: Tato “vaṭṭate evarūpaṃ assaratanaṃ narindā”ti vatvā “vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “mahārāja,
atk-s0514a3:2472_19: maṇiratanassa mahānubhāvaṃ passā”ti vatvā tassānubhāvaṃ pakāsento āha –
atk-s0514a3:2478_0: Nāgarājā supaṇṇā ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2479_0: Tattha itthīnanti etasmiñhi maṇiratane alaṅkatapaṭiyattā anekā itthiviggahā purisaviggahā nānappakārā migapakkhisaṅghā senaṅgādīni ca paññāyanti,
atk-s0514a3:2479_2: Nimmitanti idaṃ evarūpaṃ accherakaṃ maṇimhi nimmitaṃ passa.
atk-s0514a3:2487_0: Tattha balaggānīti balāneva. Viyūḷhānīti byūhavasena ṭhitāni.
atk-s0514a3:2493_0: Aṭṭālake ca dvāre ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2497_0: Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā.
atk-s0514a3:2501_0: Tattha toraṇamaggesūti etasmiṃ nagare toraṇaggesu. Kuṇālakāti kāḷakokilā. Citrāti citrapattakokilā.
atk-s0514a3:2508_2: Nivesane nivese cāti gehāni ceva gehavatthūni ca.
atk-s0514a3:2510_0: “Pānāgāre ca soṇḍe ca, sūnā odaniyā gharā;
atk-s0514a3:2511_0: Vesī ca gaṇikāyo ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2518_0: Tattha soṇḍe cāti attano anurūpehi kaṇṭhakaṇṇapilandhanehi samannāgate āpānabhūmiṃ sajjetvā nisinne surāsoṇḍe ca.
atk-s0514a3:2527_0: Vetālike ca jalle ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2528_3: Sobhiyāti nagarasobhanā itthī ca sampannarūpā purisā ca.
atk-s0514a3:2532_0: Tattha mañcātimañceti mañcānaṃ upari baddhamañce. Bhūmiyoti ramaṇīyā samajjabhūmiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2535_0: Nihate nihatamāne ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2536_0: Tattha samajjasminti mallaraṅge. Nihateti nihanitvā jinitvā ṭhite. Nihatamāneti parājite.
atk-s0514a3:2542_0: Eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca, gaṇino nīkasūkarā.
atk-s0514a3:2553_2: Kumbhīlāti ime evarūpā jalacarā antonadiyaṃ vicaranti,
atk-s0514a3:2557_0: Tattha veḷuriyakarodāyoti veḷuriyapāsāṇe paharitvā saddaṃ karontiyo evarūpā najjāyoti.
atk-s0514a3:2564_0: Tattha puthulomanisevitāti mahāmacchehi nisevitā. Vanarājehīti vanarājīhi, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0514a3:2573_0: Cattāro ca mahārāje, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2592_0: Pajjalante ca vaṇṇena, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2594_0: “Tāvatiṃse ca yāme ca, tusite cāpi nimmite;
atk-s0514a3:2602_0: Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā ca catuddasa.
atk-s0514a3:2612_0: Tattha dasettha rājiyo setāti etasmiṃ maṇikkhandhe dasa setarājiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2612_1: Cha piṅgalā pannarasāti cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalarājiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2612_4: Dasa chaccāti dasa ca cha ca soḷasa kāḷarājiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2612_6: Missā bandhukapupphehīti kāḷamañjeṭṭhavaṇṇarājiyo etehi missā vicittikā passa.
atk-s0514a3:2612_15: dvipaduttama passa tvaṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ maṇikkhandhaṃ, idameva, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a3:2615_1: ahaṃ tāva jūte parājito imaṃ maṇiratanaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0514a3:2615_3: mama sarīrañca deviñca setacchattañca ṭhapetvā sesaṃ mama santakaṃ suṅkaṃ hotū”ti. “Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0514a3:2615_8: Te khippaṃ jūtamaṇḍalaṃ sajjetvā rañño varapotthakattharaṇaṃ santharitvā sesarājūnañcāpi āsanāni paññapetvā
atk-s0514a3:2615_9: puṇṇakassapi patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā rañño kālaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2617_0: “Upāgataṃ rāja mupehi lakkhaṃ, netādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ tavatthi;
atk-s0514a3:2618_0: Dhammena jissāma asāhasena, jito ca no khippamavākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2619_9: papañcaṃ akatvāva jito dhanaṃ dadeyyāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0514a3:2620_2: dhammeneva no asāhasena jayaparājayo bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a3:2620_3: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “amhākaṃ dhammeneva jayaparājayabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti tepi rājāno sakkhiṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2622_0: “Pañcāla paccuggata sūrasena, macchā ca maddā saha kekakebhi;
atk-s0514a3:2623_0: Passantu note asaṭhena yuddhaṃ, na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2624_0: Tattha paccuggatāti uggatattā paññātattā pākaṭattā pañcālarājānamevālapati.
atk-s0514a3:2624_4: Saha kekakebhīti kekakebhināmena janapadena saha vattamānakekakebhirāja, tvañca.
atk-s0514a3:2624_5: Atha vā sahasaddaṃ “kekakebhī”ti padassa pacchato ṭhapetvā paccuggatasaddañca sūrasenavisesanaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a3:2624_6: pañcālapaccuggatasūrasena macchā ca maddā ca kekakebhi saha sesarājāno cāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0514a3:2624_7: Passantu noteti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ ete rājāno asaṭhena akkhayuddhaṃ passantu.
atk-s0514a3:2624_8: Na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcīti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2624_9: sabhāyaṃ kiñci sakkhiṃ na na karonti,
atk-s0514a3:2624_13: na no diṭṭha”nti vattuṃ na labhissatha,
atk-s0514a3:2625_1: Rājāpi ekasatarājaparivuto puṇṇakaṃ gahetvā jūtasālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a3:2625_5: pāsakesu āyā nāma mālikaṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ bahulaṃ santibhadrādayo catuvīsati,
atk-s0514a3:2625_6: tesu tumhe attano ruccanakaṃ āyaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2625_9: Atha naṃ rājā āha “tena hi tāva māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:2625_14: Tassa pana tatiye attabhāve mātubhūtapubbā ārakkhadevatā,
atk-s0514a3:2625_17: Rājā devadhītaraṃ anussaritvā jūtagītaṃ gāyanto imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2628_0: “Atha passatu maṃ amma, vijayaṃ me padissatu;
atk-s0514a3:2630_0: “Devate tvajja rakkha devi, passa mā maṃ vibhāveyya;
atk-s0514a3:2631_0: Anukampakā patiṭṭhā ca, passa bhadrāni rakkhituṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2634_0: “Devate me jayaṃ dehi, passa maṃ appabhāginaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2639_0: Rājā evaṃ jūtagītaṃ gāyitvā pāsake hatthena parivattetvā ākāse khipi.
atk-s0514a3:2639_1: Puṇṇakassa ānubhāvena pāsakā rañño parājayāya bhassanti.
atk-s0514a3:2639_2: Rājā jūtasippamhi atikusalatāya pāsake attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvā ākāseyeva saṅkaḍḍhanto gahetvā puna ākāse khipi.
atk-s0514a3:2639_3: Dutiyampi attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvā tatheva aggahesi.
atk-s0514a3:2639_4: Tato puṇṇako cintesi “ayaṃ rājā mādisena yakkhena saddhiṃ jūtaṃ kīḷanto bhassamāne pāsake saṅkaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0514a3:2639_6: So olokento tassa ārakkhadevatāya ānubhāvaṃ ñatvā akkhīni ummīletvā kuddho viya naṃ olokesi.
atk-s0514a3:2639_7: Sā bhītatasitā palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ patvā kampamānā oloketvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2639_8: Rājā tatiyampi pāsake khipitvā attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvāpi puṇṇakassānubhāvena hatthaṃ pasāretvā gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a3:2639_10: Athassa parājitabhāvaṃ ñatvā puṇṇako apphoṭetvā mahantena saddena “jitaṃ me”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0514a3:2641_0: “Te pāvisuṃ akkhamadena mattā, rājā kurūnaṃ puṇṇako cāpi yakkho;
atk-s0514a3:2642_0: Rājā kaliṃ viccinamaggahesi, kaṭaṃ aggahī puṇṇako nāma yakkho.
atk-s0514a3:2644_0: “Te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgate, raññaṃ sakāse sakhīnañca majjhe;
atk-s0514a3:2645_0: Ajesi yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ, tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2646_1: Viccinanti rājā catuvīsatiyā āyesu vicinanto kaliṃ parājayaggāhaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0514a3:2646_2: Kaṭaṃ aggahīti puṇṇako nāma yakkho jayaggāhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a3:2646_3: Te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgateti te tattha jūte samāgatā ubho jūtaṃ kīḷiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2646_4: Raññanti atha tesaṃ ekasatarājūnaṃ sakāse avasesānañca sakhīnaṃ majjhe so yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ rājānaṃ ajesi.
atk-s0514a3:2646_5: Tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvāti tasmiṃ jūtamaṇḍale “rañño parājitabhāvaṃ jānātha, jitaṃ me,
atk-s0514a3:2647_0: Rājā parājito anattamano ahosi. Atha naṃ samassāsento puṇṇako gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2649_0: “Jayo mahārāja parājayo ca, āyūhataṃ aññatarassa hoti;
atk-s0514a3:2650_0: Janinda jīnosi varaddhanena, jito ca me khippamavākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2651_0: Tattha āyūhatanti dvinnaṃ vāyāmamānānaṃ aññatarassa eva hoti,
atk-s0514a3:2651_4: Khippamavākarohīti khippaṃ me jayaṃ dhanaṃ dehīti.
atk-s0514a3:2652_0: Atha naṃ rājā “gaṇha, tātā”ti vadanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2654_0: “Hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi mayhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā;
atk-s0514a3:2655_0: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2658_0: “Hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi tuyhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā;
atk-s0514a3:2659_0: Tesaṃ varo vidhuro nāma kattā, so me jito taṃ me avākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2660_0: Tattha so me jito taṃ meti mayā hi tava vijite uttamaṃ ratanaṃ jitaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2660_1: so ca sabbaratanānaṃ varo vidhuro, tasmā, deva,
atk-s0514a3:2663_0: “Attā ca me so saraṇaṃ gatī ca, dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca;
atk-s0514a3:2664_0: Asantuleyyo mama so dhanena, pāṇena me sādiso esa kattā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2665_0: Tattha attā ca me soti so mayhaṃ attā ca,
atk-s0514a3:2665_1: mayā ca “attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ dassāmī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2665_4: atha kho me so saraṇañca gati ca dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca.
atk-s0514a3:2665_5: Asantuleyyo mama so dhanenāti sattavidhena ratanena saddhiṃ na tuletabboti.
atk-s0514a3:2668_0: “Ciraṃ vivādo mama tuyhañcassa, kāmañca pucchāma tameva gantvā;
atk-s0514a3:2669_0: Esova no vivaratu etamatthaṃ, yaṃ vakkhatī hotu kathā ubhinna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2670_0: Tattha vivaratu etamatthanti “so tava attā vā na vā”ti etamatthaṃ esova pakāsetu.
atk-s0514a3:2670_1: Hotu kathā ubhinnanti yaṃ so vakkhati,
atk-s0514a3:2673_0: “Addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, na ca māṇava sāhasaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2674_0: Tameva gantvā pucchāma, tena tussāmubho janā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2675_0: Tattha na ca māṇava sāhasanti mayhaṃ pasayha sāhasikavacanaṃ na ca bhaṇasi.
atk-s0514a3:2676_0: Evaṃ vatvā rājā ekasatarājāno puṇṇakañca gahetvā tuṭṭhamānaso vegena dhammasabhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2676_1: Paṇḍitopi āsanā oruyha rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2676_3: ‘tvaṃ dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ na bhaṇasī’ti kittisaddo te sakalaloke phuṭo,
atk-s0514a3:2676_4: ahaṃ pana te ajja dhamme ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2678_0: “Saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2679_0: Dāsosi rañño uda vāsi ñāti, vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loke”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2680_0: Tattha saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2680_1: dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccanti “kurūnaṃ raṭṭhe vidhuro nāma amacco dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2680_2: na bhaṇatī”ti evaṃ devā vidahū vidahanti kathenti pakāsenti,
atk-s0514a3:2680_3: evaṃ vidahamānā te devā saccaṃ nu vidahanti,
atk-s0514a3:2680_5: Vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loketi yā esā tava “vidhuro”ti loke saṅkhā paññatti,
atk-s0514a3:2680_9: udāhu samo vā uttaritaro vā ñātīti idaṃ tāva me ācikkha,
atk-s0514a3:2681_1: ahaṃ kho panetaṃ ‘rañño ñātī’tipi ‘rañño uttaritaro’tipi ‘rañño na kiñci homī’tipi saññāpetuṃ sakkomi,
atk-s0514a3:2681_2: evaṃ santepi imasmiṃ loke saccasamo avassayo nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a3:2681_6: catunnaṃ pana dāsānaṃ aññataro”ti dassetuṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2683_0: “Āmāyadāsāpi bhavanti heke, dhanena kītāpi bhavanti dāsā;
atk-s0514a3:2684_0: Sayampi heke upayanti dāsā, bhayā paṇunnāpi bhavanti dāsā.
atk-s0514a3:2686_0: “Ete narānaṃ caturova dāsā, addhā hi yonito ahampi jāto;
atk-s0514a3:2687_0: Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño, dāsāhaṃ devassa parampi gantvā;
atk-s0514a3:2689_1: Sayampi heke upayanti dāsāti ye keci upaṭṭhākajātikā,
atk-s0514a3:2689_2: sabbe te sayaṃ dāsabhāvaṃ upagatā dāsā nāma.
atk-s0514a3:2689_3: Bhayā paṇunnāti rājabhayena vā corabhayena vā attano vasanaṭṭhānato paṇunnā karamarā hutvā paravisayaṃ gatāpi dāsāyeva nāma.
atk-s0514a3:2689_4: Addhā hi yonito ahampi jātoti māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:2689_5: ekaṃseneva ahampi catūsu dāsayonīsu ekato sayaṃ dāsayonito nibbattadāso.
atk-s0514a3:2689_6: Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca raññoti rañño vuḍḍhi vā hotu avuḍḍhi vā,
atk-s0514a3:2689_8: Parampīti dūraṃ gantvāpi ahaṃ devassa dāsoyeva.
atk-s0514a3:2689_9: Dajjāti maṃ rājā jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā tuyhaṃ dento dhammena sabhāvena dadeyyāti.
atk-s0514a3:2690_0: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako haṭṭhatuṭṭho puna apphoṭetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2692_0: “Ayaṃ dutīyo vijayo mamajja, puṭṭho hi kattā vivarettha pañhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2693_0: Adhammarūpo vata rājaseṭṭho, subhāsitaṃ nānujānāsi mayha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2694_0: Tattha rājaseṭṭhoti ayaṃ rājaseṭṭho adhammarūpo vata.
atk-s0514a3:2694_2: Nānujānāsi mayhanti idānetaṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ mayhaṃ kasmā nānujānāsi,
atk-s0514a3:2695_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā anattamano hutvā “paṇḍito mādisaṃ yasadāyakaṃ anoloketvā idāni diṭṭhaṃ māṇavakaṃ oloketī”ti mahāsattassa kujjhitvā “māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:2697_0: “Evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañhaṃ, dāsohamasmi na ca khosmi ñāti;
atk-s0514a3:2698_0: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2699_0: Tattha evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañhanti sace so amhākaṃ pañhaṃ “dāsohamasmi,
atk-s0514a3:2699_1: na ca khosmi ñātī”ti evaṃ vivari ettha parisamaṇḍale,
atk-s0514a3:2702_0: Evañca pana vatvā rājā cintesi “paṇḍitaṃ gahetvā māṇavo yathāruci gamissati,
atk-s0514a3:2702_1: tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ madhuradhammakathā dullabhā bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:2702_2: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdapetvā gharāvāsapañhaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2702_4: tumhākaṃ gatakāle mama madhuradhammakathā dullabhā bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:2702_5: alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdāpetvā attano ṭhāne ṭhatvā mayhaṃ gharāvāsapañhaṃ kathethā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2702_6: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā raññā pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjesi.
atk-s0514a3:2705_0: Khemā vutti kathaṃ assa, kathaṃ nu assa saṅgaho.
atk-s0514a3:2708_0: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2709_0: Tattha khemā vutti kathaṃ assāti kathaṃ gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa gahaṭṭhassa khemā nibbhayā vutti bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2709_1: Kathaṃ nu assa saṅgahoti catubbidho saṅgahavatthusaṅkhāto saṅgaho tassa kathaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2709_3: Saccavādī cāti kathaṃ nu māṇavo saccavādī nāma bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2710_0: Taṃ sutvā paṇḍito rañño pañhaṃ kathesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2716_0: Na seve lokāyatikaṃ, netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2728_0: Khemā vutti siyā evaṃ, evaṃ nu assa saṅgaho.
atk-s0514a3:2731_0: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2732_1: taṃ rājānaṃ tattha dhammasabhāyaṃ ñāṇagatiyā gatimā,
atk-s0514a3:2732_10: Na bhuñje sādumekakoti sādurasaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ aññesaṃ adatvā ekakova na bhuñjeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2732_11: Lokāyatikanti anatthanissitaṃ saggamaggānaṃ adāyakaṃ aniyyānikaṃ vitaṇḍasallāpaṃ lokāyatikavādaṃ na seveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2732_12: Netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhananti na hi etaṃ lokāyatikaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2732_14: Vattasampannoti gharāvāsavattena vā rājavattena vā samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2733_5: imasmiṃ kāle vapituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ sabbakiccesu vidhānasampanno.
atk-s0514a3:2733_12: Evaṃ nu assa saṅgahoti saṅgahopissa evaṃ kato nāma bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2733_13: Saccavādīti evaṃ paṭipannoyeva sabhāvavādī nāma siyā.
atk-s0514a3:2734_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto rañño gharāvāsapañhaṃ kathetvā pallaṅkā oruyha rājānaṃ vandi.
atk-s0514a3:2734_1: Rājāpissa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ekasatarājūhi parivuto attano nivesanameva gato.
atk-s0514a3:2737_0: Mahāsatto pana paṭinivatto. Atha naṃ puṇṇako āha –
atk-s0514a3:2739_0: “Ehi dāni gamissāma, dinno no issarena me;
atk-s0514a3:2741_0: Tattha dinno noti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2741_2: Sanantanoti mama atthaṃ paṭipajjantena hi tayā attano sāmikassa attho paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0514a3:2745_0: Tīhañca taṃ vāsayemu agāre, yenaddhunā anusāsemu putte”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2746_2: Dinnohamasmi tava issarenāti mama issarena raññā ahaṃ tava dinno.
atk-s0514a3:2746_8: mayaṃ tīṇipi divasāni attano agāre vāsemu,
atk-s0514a3:2746_9: tasmā yenaddhunā yattakena kālena mayaṃ puttādāre anusāsemu,
atk-s0514a3:2747_2: ‘sattāhampi aḍḍhamāsampi nisīdāhī’ti vutte adhivāsetabbamevā”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2749_0: “Taṃ me tathā hotu vasemu tīhaṃ, kurutaṃ bhavajja gharesu kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2750_0: Anusāsataṃ puttadāre bhavajja, yathā tayī pecca sukhī bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2751_0: Tattha taṃ meti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0514a3:2751_2: Bhavajjāti bhavaṃ ajja paṭṭhāya tīhaṃ anusāsatu.
atk-s0514a3:2751_3: Tayī peccāti yathā tayi gate pacchā tava puttadāro sukhī bhaveyya,
atk-s0514a3:2752_0: Evaṃ vatvā puṇṇako mahāsattena saddhiṃyeva tassa nivesanaṃ pāvisi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2754_0: “Sādhūti vatvāna pahūtakāmo, pakkāmi yakkho vidhurena saddhiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2756_1: Kuñjarājaññahayānuciṇṇanti kuñjarehi ca ājaññahayehi ca anuciṇṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2756_2: Ariyaseṭṭhoti ācāraariyesu uttamo puṇṇako yakkho paṇḍitassa antepuraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a3:2757_0: Mahāsattassa pana tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ atthāya tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2759_0: “Koñcaṃ mayūrañca piyañca ketaṃ, upāgamī tattha surammarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2761_0: Tattha tatthāti tesu tīsu pāsādesu yattha tasmiṃ samaye attanā vasati,
atk-s0514a3:2761_1: taṃ surammarūpaṃ pāsādaṃ puṇṇakaṃ ādāya upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:2762_0: So upagantvā ca pana alaṅkatapāsādassa sattamāya bhūmiyā sayanagabbhañceva mahātalañca sajjāpetvā sirisayanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2762_1: paññāpetvā sabbaṃ annapānādividhiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā devakaññāyo viya pañcasatā itthiyo “imā te pādaparicārikā hontu,
atk-s0514a3:2762_2: anukkaṇṭhanto idha vasāhī”ti tassa niyyādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0514a3:2762_3: Tassa gatakāle tā itthiyo nānātūriyāni gahetvā puṇṇakassa paricariyāya naccādīni paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2766_0: Tattha avhayanti varāvaranti varato varaṃ naccañca gītañca karontiyo pakkosanti.
atk-s0514a3:2768_0: “Samaṅgikatvā pamadāhi yakkhaṃ, annena pānena ca dhammapālo;
atk-s0514a3:2770_0: Tattha pamadāhīti pamadāhi ceva annapānehi ca samaṅgikatvā.
atk-s0514a3:2773_0: Bhariyaṃvacā ‘ehi suṇohi bhoti, puttāni āmantaya tambanette”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:2774_0: Tattha bhariyaṃvacāti jeṭṭhabhariyaṃ avaca. Āmantayāti pakkosa.
atk-s0514a3:2776_0: “Sutvāna vākyaṃ patino anujjā, suṇisaṃ vaca tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2778_1: Suṇisaṃvaca tambanakhiṃ sunettanti sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā assumukhī rodamānā “sayaṃ gantvā putte pakkosituṃ ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2778_2: suṇisaṃ pesessāmī”ti tassā nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ suṇisaṃ avaca.
atk-s0514a3:2778_8: puttānīti mama putte ca dhītaro ca.
atk-s0514a3:2779_0: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāsādā oruyha anuvicaritvā “pitā vo ovādaṃ dātukāmo pakkosati,
atk-s0514a3:2779_1: idaṃ kira vo tassa pacchimadassana”nti sabbamevassa suhadajanañca puttadhītaro ca sannipātesi.
atk-s0514a3:2779_2: Dhammapālakumāro pana taṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva rodanto kaniṭṭhabhātikagaṇaparivuto pitu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2779_3: Paṇḍito te disvāva sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto assupuṇṇehi nettehi āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2779_4: muhuttaṃ hadaye nipajjāpetvā hadayā otāretvā sirigabbhato nikkhamma mahātale pallaṅkamajjhe nisīditvā
atk-s0514a3:2781_0: “Te āgate muddhani dhammapālo, cumbitvā putte avikampamāno;
atk-s0514a3:2782_0: Āmantayitvāna avoca vākyaṃ, dinnāhaṃ raññā idha māṇavassa.
atk-s0514a3:2784_0: “Tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyo, ādāya yenicchati tena gacchati;
atk-s0514a3:2785_0: Ahañca vo sāsitumāgatosmi, kathaṃ ahaṃ aparittāya gacche.
atk-s0514a3:2787_0: “Sace vo rājā kururaṭṭhavāsī, janasandho puccheyya pahūtakāmo;
atk-s0514a3:2788_0: Kimābhijānātha pure purāṇaṃ, kiṃ vo pitā puratthā.
atk-s0514a3:2790_0: “Samāsanā hotha mayāva sabbe, konīdha rañño abbhatiko manusso;
atk-s0514a3:2791_0: Tamañjaliṃ kariya vadetha evaṃ, mā hevaṃ deva na hi esa dhammo;
atk-s0514a3:2792_0: Viyaggharājassa nihīnajacco, samāsano deva kathaṃ bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2793_1: Dinnāhanti ahaṃ jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā raññā dinno.
atk-s0514a3:2793_2: Tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyoti ajja paṭṭhāya tīhamattaṃ ahaṃ iminā attano sukhena attasukhī,
atk-s0514a3:2793_3: tato paraṃ pana tassa māṇavassāhaṃ vidheyyo homi.
atk-s0514a3:2793_4: So hi ito catutthe divase ekaṃsena maṃ ādāya yatthicchati,
atk-s0514a3:2793_6: Aparittāyāti tumhākaṃ parittaṃ akatvā kathaṃ gaccheyyanti anusāsituṃ āgatosmi.
atk-s0514a3:2793_8: Pure purāṇanti ito pubbe tumhe kiṃ purāṇakāraṇaṃ abhijānātha.
atk-s0514a3:2793_10: Evaṃ tumhe raññā puṭṭhā “amhākaṃ pitā imañcimañca ovādaṃ adāsī”ti katheyyātha.
atk-s0514a3:2793_11: Samāsanā hothāti sace vo rājā mayā dinnassa ovādassa kathitakāle “etha tumhe,
atk-s0514a3:2793_13: idha rājakule tumhehi añño ko nu rañño abbhatiko manusso”ti attano āsane nisīdāpeyya,
atk-s0514a3:2793_14: atha tumhe añjaliṃ katvā taṃ rājānaṃ evaṃ vadeyyātha “deva,
atk-s0514a3:2793_19: Yathā siṅgālo sīhassa samāsano na hoti,
atk-s0514a3:2794_0: Imaṃ panassa kathaṃ sutvā puttadhītaro ca ñātisuhajjādayo ca dāsakammakaraporisā ca te sabbe sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2797_0: Atha ne paṇḍito puttadhītaro ca ñātayo ca upasaṅkamitvā tuṇhībhūte disvā “tātā,
atk-s0514a3:2797_4: apica tumhākaṃ rājavasatiṃ nāma yasapaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0514a3:2797_5: taṃ ekaggacittā suṇāthā”ti buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ nāma paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a3:2799_0: “So ca putte amacce ca, ñātayo suhadajjane;
atk-s0514a3:2803_0: Yathā rājakulaṃ patto, yasaṃ poso nigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2804_4: Yathāti yena kāraṇena rājakulaṃ patto upasaṅkamanto rañño santike caranto poso yasaṃ nigacchati labhati,
atk-s0514a3:2806_0: “Na hi rājakulaṃ patto, aññāto labhate yasaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2810_0: Atha vissasate tyamhi, guyhañcassa na rakkhatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2811_2: Yadāssa sīlanti yadā assa sevakassa rājā sīlañca paññañca soceyyañca adhigacchati,
atk-s0514a3:2811_4: Atha vissasate tyamhīti atha rājā tamhi vissasate vissāsaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a3:2811_5: attano guyhañcassa na rakkhati na gūhati.
atk-s0514a3:2814_0: Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2818_0: Tattha tulā yathāti yathā esā vuttappakārā tulā na onamati na unnamati,
atk-s0514a3:2818_1: evameva rājasevako kismiñcideva kamme raññā “idaṃ nāma karohī”ti ajjhiṭṭho āṇatto chandādiagativasena na vikampeyya,
atk-s0514a3:2818_3: Sa rājavasatinti so evarūpo sevako rājakule vāsaṃ vaseyya,
atk-s0514a3:2818_5: evaṃ paricaranto pana yasaṃ labheyyāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2820_0: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a3:2821_0: Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2823_0: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a3:2827_0: Na tena vutto gaccheyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2828_0: Tattha na vikampeyyāti avikampamāno tāni kiccāni kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2828_1: Yo cassāti yo ca rañño gamanamaggo sukato assa suppaṭiyādito sumaṇḍito,
atk-s0514a3:2828_2: “iminā maggena gacchā”ti vuttopi tena na gaccheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2831_0: Sabbattha pacchato gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2833_0: “Na rañño sadisaṃ vatthaṃ, na mālaṃ na vilepanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2834_0: Ākappaṃ sarakuttiṃ vā, na rañño sadisamācare;
atk-s0514a3:2835_0: Aññaṃ kareyya ākappaṃ, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2836_0: Tattha na raññoti rañño kāmabhogena samaṃ kāmabhogaṃ na bhuñjeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2836_2: Sabbatthāti sabbesu rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu rañño pacchatova gaccheyya,
atk-s0514a3:2836_4: Aññaṃ kareyyāti rañño ākappato sarakuttito ca aññameva ākappaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2843_3: Saṃvutindriyoti pihitachaḷindriyo rañño vā aṅgapaccaṅgāni orodhe vāssa na olokeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2843_4: Manopaṇidhisampannoti acapalena suṭṭhu ṭhapitena cittena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2846_0: Nāssa kosā dhanaṃ gaṇhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2848_0: “Na niddaṃ bahu maññeyya, na madāya suraṃ pive;
atk-s0514a3:2849_0: Nāssa dāye mige haññe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2851_0: “Nāssa pīṭhaṃ na pallaṅkaṃ, na kocchaṃ na nāvaṃ rathaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2857_0: “Na ve rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti methuno;
atk-s0514a3:2862_0: Tattha na manteyyāti tassa rañño bhariyāhi saddhiṃ neva kīḷeyya,
atk-s0514a3:2862_2: Kosā dhananti rañño kosā dhanaṃ thenetvā na gaṇheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_4: rājasevako nāma madatthāya suraṃ na piveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_5: Nāssa dāye migeti assa rañño dinnābhaye mige na haññeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_7: Sammatomhīti ahaṃ sammato hutvā evaṃ karomīti na āruheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_8: Sammukhañcassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa rañño purato khuddakamahantakathāsavanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_9: Sandissanto sabhattunoti yo rājasevako tassa bhattuno dassanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_10: Sūkenāti akkhimhi patitena vīhisūkādinā ghaṭṭitaṃ akkhi pakatisabhāvaṃ jahantaṃ yathā kujjhati nāma,
atk-s0514a3:2865_0: Aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2867_0: “Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sampaggaṇhāti khattiyo;
atk-s0514a3:2868_0: Gāmehi nigamehi vā, raṭṭhehi janapadehi vā;
atk-s0514a3:2870_0: Tattha laddhadvāro labhe dvāranti ahaṃ nippaṭihāro laddhadvāroti appaṭihāretvā na paviseyya,
atk-s0514a3:2870_4: Bhātaraṃ vā santi sakaṃ bhātaraṃ vā.
atk-s0514a3:2870_5: Sampaggaṇhātīti “asukagāmaṃ vā asukanigamaṃ vā assa demā”ti yadā sevakehi saddhiṃ katheti.
atk-s0514a3:2870_6: Na bhaṇe chekapāpakanti tadā guṇaṃ vā aguṇaṃ vā na bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2874_0: Na tesaṃ antarā gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2877_0: Paṭilomaṃ na vatteyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2880_0: Appāsī nipako sūro, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2881_0: Tattha na tesaṃ antarā gaccheti tesaṃ lābhassa antarā na gacche,
atk-s0514a3:2881_2: Vaṃsovāpīti yathā vaṃsagumbato uggatavaṃso vātena pahaṭakāle pakampati,
atk-s0514a3:2881_4: Cāpovūnudaroti yathā cāpo mahodaro na hoti,
atk-s0514a3:2881_6: Ajivhavāti yathā maccho ajivhatāya na katheti,
atk-s0514a3:2884_0: Kāsaṃ sāsaṃ daraṃ bālyaṃ, khīṇamedho nigacchati.
atk-s0514a3:2887_0: Avikiṇṇaṃ mitaṃ vācaṃ, patte kāle udīraye.
atk-s0514a3:2890_0: Samphaṃ giraṃ na bhāseyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2894_0: Tattha na bāḷhanti punappunaṃ kilesavasena na gaccheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2894_1: Tejasaṅkhayanti evaṃ gacchanto hi puriso tejasaṅkhayaṃ gacchati pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0514a3:2894_5: Khīṇamedhoti punappunaṃ kilesarativasena khīṇapañño puriso ete kāsādayo nigacchati.
atk-s0514a3:2894_6: Nātivelanti tātā rājūnaṃ santike pamāṇātikkantaṃ na bhāseyya.
atk-s0514a3:2897_0: Appamatto suci dakkho, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2904_10: Sahituṃ patitanti pararājūhi sakarañño santikaṃ guyharakkhaṇavasena vā paṭicchannapākaṭakaraṇavasenavā pesitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2904_11: Tathārūpena hi saddhiṃ kathentopi rañño sammukhāva katheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2904_13: Na ca aññassa rājinoti aññassa rañño santako na bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2917_0: Tattha sakkaccaṃ payirupāseyyāti gāravena punappunaṃ upasaṅkameyya.
atk-s0514a3:2920_0: Na ca kiñci nivāreyya, dānakāle vaṇibbake.
atk-s0514a3:2923_0: Kālaññū samayaññū ca, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2927_2: Vaṇibbaketi dānakāle vaṇibbake āgate disvā kiñci na nivāreyya.
atk-s0514a3:2929_0: “Khalaṃ sālaṃ pasuṃ khettaṃ, gantā cassa abhikkhaṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2930_0: Mitaṃ dhaññaṃ nidhāpeyya, mitaṃva pācaye ghare.
atk-s0514a3:2932_0: “Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sīlesu asamāhitaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2933_0: Anaṅgavā hi te bālā, yathā petā tatheva te;
atk-s0514a3:2938_2: Mitanti minitvā ettakanti ñatvā koṭṭhesu nidhāpeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2938_3: Ghareti gharepi parijanaṃ gaṇetvā mitameva pacāpeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2938_4: Sīlesu asamāhitanti evarūpaṃ dussīlaṃ anācāraṃ kismiñci ādhipaccaṭṭhāne na ṭhapeyyāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2938_6: bhātā loke pavuccatī”ti kiñcāpi jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātaro aṅgasamānatāya “aṅga”nti vuttā,
atk-s0514a3:2938_9: Yathā pana susāne chaḍḍitā petā matā,
atk-s0514a3:2938_13: vinaṭṭhakuṭumbassa ca daliddassa rājavasati nāma na sampajjati.
atk-s0514a3:2938_14: Āsīnānanti āgantvā nisinnānaṃ puttabhātānaṃ matasattānaṃ matakabhattaṃ viya dento ghāsacchādanamattameva padāpeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2940_0: “Sīlavā ca alolo ca, anurakkho ca rājino;
atk-s0514a3:2941_0: Āvī raho hito tassa, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2947_0: Āhatopi na kuppeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2948_4: Adhosiranti pāde dhovantopi adhosiraṃ katvā heṭṭhāmukhova dhoveyya,
atk-s0514a3:2953_0: “Yo deti sayanaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ āvasathaṃ gharaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2958_1: cāṭañcāpi padakkhiṇanti vuddhiṃ paccāsīsanto puriso udakapūritaṃ kumbhaṃ disvā tassa añjaliṃ kareyya,
atk-s0514a3:2958_3: Añjaliṃ vā padakkhiṇaṃ vā karontassa te kiñci dātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0514a3:2958_4: Kimevāti yo pana sabbakāmānaṃ dātā dhīro ca,
atk-s0514a3:2958_6: Rājāyeva hi namassitabbo ca ārādhetabbo ca.
atk-s0514a3:2958_8: Esayyo rājavasatīti ayyo yā ayaṃ mayā kathitā,
atk-s0514a3:2958_10: Yathāti yāya rājavasatiyā vattamāno naro rājānaṃ ārādheti,
atk-s0514a3:2958_11: rājūnañca santikā pūjaṃ labhati, sā esāti.
atk-s0514a3:2959_0: Evaṃ asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ kathesi;
atk-s0514a3:2962_0: Evaṃ puttadārañātimittasuhajjādayo anusāsantasseva tassa tayo divasā jātā.
atk-s0514a3:2962_1: So divasassa pāripūriṃ ñatvā pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā “rājānaṃ apaloketvā māṇavena
atk-s0514a3:2962_2: saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti ñātigaṇaparivuto rājanivesanaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito vattabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2967_0: “Vanditvā sirasā pāde, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2973_0: “Putte ca me udikkhesi, yañca maññaṃ ghare dhanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2974_0: Yathā pecca na hāyetha, ñātisaṅgho mayī gate.
atk-s0514a3:2977_0: Evetaṃ khalitaṃ mayhaṃ, etaṃ passāmi accaya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2978_1: Yañca maññanti yañca me aññaṃ tayā ceva aññehi ca rājūhi dinnaṃ ghare aparimāṇaṃ dhanaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2978_6: Ahañhi bhūmiyaṃ khalitvā tattheva patiṭṭhitapuriso viya tumhesu khalitvā tumhesuyeva patiṭṭhahāmi.
atk-s0514a3:2978_7: Etaṃ passāmīti yo esa “kiṃ te rājā hotī”ti māṇavena puṭṭhassa mama tumhe anoloketvā saccaṃ apekkhitvā “dāsohamasmī”ti vadantassa accayo,
atk-s0514a3:2978_11: etaṃ hadaye katvā pacchā mama puttadāresu mā aparajjhitthāti.
atk-s0514a3:2979_2: māṇavaṃ upāyena pakkosāpetvā ghātetvā kilañjena paṭicchādetuṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti dīpento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2981_0: “Sakkā na gantuṃ iti mayha hoti, chetvā vadhitvā idha kātiyānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2982_0: Idheva hohī iti mayha ruccati, mā tvaṃ agā uttamabhūripaññā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2983_0: Tattha chetvāti idheva rājagehe taṃ pothetvā māretvā paṭicchādessāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:2984_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “deva, tumhākaṃ ajjhāsayo evarūpo hoti, so tumhesu ayutto”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2986_0: “Mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahi, atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu;
atk-s0514a3:2987_0: Dhiratthu kammaṃ akusalaṃ anariyaṃ, yaṃ katvā pacchā nirayaṃ vajeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2989_0: “Nevesa dhammo na puneta kiccaṃ, ayiro hi dāsassa janinda issaro;
atk-s0514a3:2990_0: Ghātetuṃ jhāpetuṃ athopi hantuṃ, na ca mayha kodhatthi vajāmi cāha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2991_0: Tattha mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahīti adhammesu anatthesu ayuttesu tava cittaṃ mā heva paṇidahīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2991_1: Pacchāti yaṃ kammaṃ katvāpi ajarāmaro na hoti,
atk-s0514a3:2991_3: Dhiratthu kammanti taṃ kammaṃ garahitaṃ atthu assa bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2991_6: Ghātetunti etāni ghātādīni kātuṃ ayiro dāsassa issaro,
atk-s0514a3:2991_9: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya tava cittaṃ sandhāretuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0514a3:2992_0: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto rājānaṃ vanditvā rañño orodhe ca puttadāre ca rājaparisañca ovaditvā tesu sakabhāvena
atk-s0514a3:2992_1: saṇṭhātuṃ asakkuṇitvā mahāviravaṃ viravantesuyeva rājanivesanā nikkhami.
atk-s0514a3:2992_2: Sakalanagaravāsinopi “paṇḍito kira māṇavena saddhiṃ gamissati, etha,
atk-s0514a3:2992_3: passissāma na”nti mantayitvā rājaṅgaṇeyeva naṃ passiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2992_4: Atha ne mahāsatto assāsetvā “tumhe mā cintayittha,
atk-s0514a3:2992_8: apica tumhe dānādīsu puññesu appamattā hothā”ti tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā nivattāpetvā attano gehābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2992_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammapālakumāro bhātikagaṇaparivuto “pitu paccuggamanaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhanto nivesanadvāreyeva pitu sammukho ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:2992_10: Mahāsatto taṃ disvā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto upaguyha ure nipajjāpetvā nivesanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a3:2996_4: tehi ceva avasesadāsidāsakammakarañātimittasuhajjādīhi ca sakalanivesanaṃ yugantavātābhighātapatitehi sālehi sālavanaṃ viya nirantaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:2999_0: Senti puttā ca dārā ca, vidhurassa nivesane.
atk-s0514a3:3004_0: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3014_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkantuṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3016_0: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3017_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3020_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3023_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3024_0: Tattha sentīti mahātale chinnapādā viya patitā āvattantā parivattantā sayanti.
atk-s0514a3:3024_2: Kasmā no vijahissasīti kena kāraṇena amhe vijahissasīti parideviṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3025_0: Mahāsatto sabbaṃ taṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetvā ghare avasesakiccāni katvā antojanañca bahijanañca ovaditvā
atk-s0514a3:3025_1: ācikkhitabbayuttakaṃ sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā puṇṇakassa santikaṃ gantvā attano niṭṭhitakiccataṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a3:3028_0: Mittāmacce ca bhacce ca, puttadāre ca bandhave.
atk-s0514a3:3033_0: “Avasī tuvaṃ mayha tīhaṃ agāre, katāni kiccāni gharesu mayhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3034_0: Anusāsitā puttadārā mayā ca, karoma kaccāna yathāmatiṃ te”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3035_0: Tattha kammantaṃ saṃvidhetvānāti “evañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ghare kattabbayuttakaṃ kammaṃ saṃvidahitvā.
atk-s0514a3:3035_3: Yathāmatiṃ teti idāni tava ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ karomāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3038_0: “Sace hi katte anusāsitā te, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca;
atk-s0514a3:3039_0: Handehi dānī taramānarūpo, dīgho hi addhāpi ayaṃ puratthā.
atk-s0514a3:3043_0: Tattha katteti somanassappatto yakkho mahāsattaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a3:3043_2: “Achambhitovā”ti idaṃ so heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ anotaritvā tatova gantukāmo hutvā avaca.
atk-s0514a3:3046_0: “Sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissaṃ, yassa me natthi dukkaṭaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3047_0: Kāyena vācā manasā, yena gaccheyya duggati”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3048_0: Tattha sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissanti idaṃ mahāsatto “achambhitova gaṇhāhī”ti vuttattā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:3049_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto sīhanādaṃ naditvā achambhito kesarasīho viya nibbhayo hutvā “ayaṃ sāṭako mama aruciyā
atk-s0514a3:3049_1: mā muccatū”ti adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā assassa vāladhiṃ viyūhitvā ubhohi
atk-s0514a3:3049_2: hatthehi daḷhaṃ vāladhiṃ gahetvā dvīhi pādehi assassa ūrūsu paliveṭhetvā “māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:3049_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe puṇṇako manomayasindhavassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3053_0: Tattha sākhāsu selesu asajjamānoti puṇṇako kira cintesi “dūraṃ agantvāva imaṃ himavantappadese rukkhesu
atk-s0514a3:3053_1: pabbatesu ca pothetvā māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ ādāya kaḷevaraṃ pabbatantare chaḍḍetvā nāgabhavanameva gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3053_2: So rukkhe ca pabbate ca apariharitvā tesaṃ majjheneva assaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0514a3:3053_3: Mahāsattassānubhāvena rukkhāpi pabbatāpi sarīrato ubhosu passesu ratanamattaṃ paṭikkamanti.
atk-s0514a3:3053_5: no vā”ti parivattitvā mahāsattassa mukhaṃ olokento kañcanādāsamiva vippasannaṃ disvā “ayaṃ evaṃ na maratī”ti
atk-s0514a3:3053_6: punapi sakalahimavantappadese rukkhe ca pabbate ca tikkhattuṃ pothento pesesi.
atk-s0514a3:3053_7: Evaṃ pothentopi tatheva rukkhapabbatā dūrameva paṭikkamantiyeva.
atk-s0514a3:3053_10: idāni vātakkhandhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti kodhābhibhūto sattamaṃ vātakkhandhaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0514a3:3053_11: Bodhisattassānubhāvena vātakkhandho dvidhā hutvā bodhisattassa okāsaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3053_13: verambhavātāpi satasahassaasanisaddo viya hutvā bodhisattassa okāsaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3053_14: So puṇṇako tassa antarāyābhāvaṃ passanto taṃ ādāya kāḷapabbataṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3056_0: Tattha asajjamānoti alaggamāno appaṭihaññamāno vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ vahanto kāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ upāgato.
atk-s0514a3:3057_0: Evaṃ puṇṇakassa mahāsattaṃ gahetvā gatakāle paṇḍitassa puttadārādayo puṇṇakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0514a3:3057_1: tattha mahāsattaṃ adisvā chinnapādā viya patitvā aparāparaṃ parivattamānā mahāsaddena parideviṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3062_0: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3074_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3075_0: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3076_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3078_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3081_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:3082_0: Evaṃ pakkanditvā ca pana te sabbepi sakalanagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ roditvā rājadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3082_1: Rājā mahantaṃ paridevasaddaṃ sutvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā “tumhe kasmā paridevathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0514a3:3082_4: yakkho pana brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgantvā paṇḍitaṃ ādāya gato,
atk-s0514a3:3082_6: Sace so ito sattame divase nāgamissati,
atk-s0514a3:3082_7: sakaṭasatehi sakaṭasahassehi ca dārūni saṅkaḍḍhitvā sabbe mayaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletvā pavisissāmā”ti imamatthaṃ ārocentā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:3085_0: Sabbe aggiṃ pavekkhāma, natthattho jīvitena no”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3086_0: Sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutakālepi “mayaṃ aggiṃ pavisitvā marissāmā”ti vattāro nāma nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3086_2: Rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “tumhe mā cintayittha,
atk-s0514a3:3086_5: madhurakatho paṇḍito māṇavaṃ dhammakathāya palobhetvā attano pādesu pātetvā sakalanagaravāsīnaṃ assumukhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3086_6: hāsayanto na cirasseva āgamissatī”ti assāsento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3088_0: “Paṇḍito ca viyatto ca, vibhāvī ca vicakkhaṇo;
atk-s0514a3:3090_1: Vibhāvīti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ vibhāvetvā dassetvā kathetuṃ samattho.
atk-s0514a3:3091_0: Nāgarāpi “paṇḍito kira rañño kathetvā gato bhavissatī”ti assāsaṃ paṭilabhitvā attano gehāni pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3094_0: Puṇṇakopi mahāsattaṃ kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhapetvā “imasmiṃ jīvamāne mayhaṃ vuḍḍhi nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a3:3094_1: imaṃ māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā vimalāya datvā irandhatiṃ gahetvā devalokaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0514a3:3096_0: “So tattha gantvāna vicintayanto, uccāvacā cetanakā bhavanti;
atk-s0514a3:3097_0: Nayimassa jīvena mamatthi kiñci, hantvānimaṃ hadayamānayissa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3098_1: Tattha gantvānāti gantvā tattha kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhito.
atk-s0514a3:3098_2: Uccāvacā cetanakā bhavantīti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānā cetanā uccāpi avacāpi uppajjanti.
atk-s0514a3:3098_5: Imassa pana jīvitena tahiṃ nāgabhavane mama appamattakampi kiñci kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0514a3:3098_6: idhevimaṃ māretvā assa hadayaṃ ānayissāmīti sanniṭṭhānamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3099_0: Tato puna cintesi “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ sahatthena amāretvā bheravarūpadassanena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeyya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3099_1: So bheravayakkharūpaṃ nimminitvā mahāsattaṃ tajjento āgantvā taṃ pātetvā dāṭhānaṃ antare katvā khāditukāmo viya ahosi,
atk-s0514a3:3099_3: Tato sīharūpena mattamahāhatthirūpena ca āgantvā dāṭhāhi ceva dantehi ca vijjhitukāmo viya ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3099_4: Tathāpi abhāyantassa ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ mahantaṃ sappavaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā assasanto passasanto “susū”ti
atk-s0514a3:3099_5: saddaṃ karonto āgantvā mahāsattassa sakalasarīraṃ veṭhetvā matthake phaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0514a3:3099_7: Atha “naṃ pabbatamatthake ṭhapetvā pātetvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti mahāvātaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3099_9: Atha naṃ tattheva pabbatamatthake ṭhapetvā hatthī viya khajjūrirukkhaṃ pabbataṃ aparāparaṃ cālesi,
atk-s0514a3:3099_10: tathāpi naṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato kesaggamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a3:3100_0: Tato “saddasantāsenassa hadayaphālanaṃ katvā māressāmī”ti antopabbataṃ pavisitvā pathaviñca nabhañca ekaninnādaṃ karonto mahānādaṃ nadi,
atk-s0514a3:3100_2: Jānāti hi mahāsatto “yakkhasīhahatthināgarājavesehi āgatopi mahāvātavuṭṭhiṃ samuṭṭhāpakopi pabbatacalanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3100_3: karontopi antopabbataṃ pavisitvā nādaṃ vissajjentopi māṇavoyeva,
atk-s0514a3:3100_5: Tato puṇṇako cintesi “nāhaṃ imaṃ bāhirupakkamena māretuṃ sakkomi,
atk-s0514a3:3100_7: Tato yakkho mahāsattaṃ pabbatamuddhani ṭhapetvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā maṇikkhandhe paṇḍusuttaṃ pavesento
atk-s0514a3:3100_8: viya pabbataṃ pavisitvā tāsento vagganto antopabbatena uggantvā mahāsattaṃ pāde daḷhaṃ gahetvā parivattetvā
atk-s0514a3:3102_0: “So tattha gantvā pabbatantarasmiṃ, anto pavisitvāna paduṭṭhacitto;
atk-s0514a3:3104_0: Tattha so tattha gantvāti so puṇṇako pabbatamatthakā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā tattha pabbatantare ṭhatvā tassa
atk-s0514a3:3104_1: anto pavisitvā pabbatamatthake ṭhitassa heṭṭhā paññāyamāno asaṃvute bhūmipadese dhāresīti.
atk-s0514a3:3104_3: tattha pana taṃ khipitvā pannarasayojanamattaṃ bhaṭṭhakāle pabbatamuddhani ṭhitova hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0514a3:3104_4: adhosiraṃ bhassantaṃ pādesu gahetvā adhosirameva ukkhipitvā mukhaṃ olokento “na maratī”ti ñatvā dutiyampi
atk-s0514a3:3104_5: khipitvā tiṃsayojanamattaṃ bhaṭṭhakāle tatheva ukkhipitvā puna tassa mukhaṃ olokento jīvantameva disvā
atk-s0514a3:3104_6: cintesi “sace idāni saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ bhassitvā na marissati,
atk-s0514a3:3104_7: pādesu naṃ gahetvā pabbatamuddhani pothetvā māressāmī”ti atha naṃ tatiyampi khipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3104_8: bhaṭṭhakāle hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pādesu gahetvā ukkhipi.
atk-s0514a3:3104_9: Tato mahāsatto cintesi “ayaṃ maṃ paṭhamaṃ pannarasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ khipi,
atk-s0514a3:3104_14: yāva maṃ ukkhipitvā pabbatamuddhani na potheti,
atk-s0514a3:3104_15: tāva naṃ adhosiro hutvā olambantova māraṇakāraṇaṃ pucchissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3104_16: Evaṃ cintetvā ca pana so achambhito asantasanto tathā akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3106_0: “So lambamāno narake papāte, mahabbhaye lomahaṃse vidugge;
atk-s0514a3:3107_0: Asantasanto kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho, iccabravi puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3110_0: Accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi ludraṃ, bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñci.
atk-s0514a3:3112_0: “Yaṃ maṃ papātasmiṃ papātumicchasi, ko nu tavattho maraṇena mayhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3113_0: Amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇo, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatāti.
atk-s0514a3:3114_0: Tattha so lambamānoti so kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho tatiyavāre lambamāno.
atk-s0514a3:3114_1: Ariyāvakāsoti rūpena ariyasadiso devavaṇṇo hutvā carasi.
atk-s0514a3:3114_5: Bhāve ca teti tava citte appamattakampi kusalaṃ natthi.
atk-s0514a3:3114_6: Amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇoti ajja tava idaṃ kāraṇaṃ amānusasseva.
atk-s0514a3:3114_7: Katamāsi devatāti yakkhānaṃ antare katarayakkho nāma tvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3117_0: “Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbo;
atk-s0514a3:3118_0: Bhūmindharo varuṇo nāma nāgo, brahā sucī vaṇṇabalūpapanno.
atk-s0514a3:3120_0: “Tassānujaṃ dhītaraṃ kāmayāmi, irandhatī nāma sā nāgakaññā;
atk-s0514a3:3121_0: Tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu, patārayiṃ tuyha vadhāya dhīrā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3122_2: Vaṇṇabalūpapannoti sarīravaṇṇena ca kāyabalena ca upagato.
atk-s0514a3:3123_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ loko duggahitena nassati,
atk-s0514a3:3123_1: nāgamāṇavikaṃ patthentassa mama maraṇena kiṃ payojanaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3125_0: “Mā heva tvaṃ yakkha ahosi mūḷho, naṭṭhā bahū duggahītena loke;
atk-s0514a3:3126_0: Kiṃ te sumajjhāya piyāya kiccaṃ, maraṇena me iṅgha suṇomi sabba”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3127_0: Taṃ sutvā tassa ācikkhanto puṇṇako āha –
atk-s0514a3:3130_0: Taṃ yācamānaṃ sasuro avoca, yathā mamaññiṃsu sukāmanītaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3132_0: “Dajjemu kho te sutanuṃ sunettaṃ, sucimhitaṃ candanalittagattaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3133_0: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
atk-s0514a3:3134_0: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, naññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāma.
atk-s0514a3:3136_0: “Evaṃ na mūḷhosmi suṇohi katte, na cāpi me duggahitatthi kiñci;
atk-s0514a3:3137_0: Hadayena te dhammaladdhena nāgā, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ dadanti.
atk-s0514a3:3139_0: “Tasmā ahaṃ tuyhaṃ vadhāya yutto, evaṃ mamattho maraṇena tuyhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3140_0: Idheva taṃ narake pātayitvā, hantvāna taṃ hadayamānayissa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3141_2: Ñātibhatohamasmīti tasmā tassa ñātibhatako nāma ahaṃ amhi.
atk-s0514a3:3141_7: Sukāmanītanti suṭṭhu esa kāmena nītoti sukāmanīto,
atk-s0514a3:3141_12: Idha māharesīti idha nāgabhavane dhammena laddhā āhareyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a3:3142_0: Tassa taṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto cintesi “vimalāya mama hadayena kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0514a3:3142_1: varuṇanāgarājena mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā maṇinā maṃ pūjetvā tattha gatena mama dhammakathikabhāvo vaṇṇito bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3142_2: tato vimalāya mama dhammakathāya dohaḷo uppanno bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3142_3: varuṇena duggahitaṃ gahetvā puṇṇako āṇatto bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3142_4: svāyaṃ attanā duggahitena maṃ māretuṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpesi,
atk-s0514a3:3142_5: mama paṇḍitabhāvo ṭhānuppattikāraṇacintanasamatthatā imasmiṃ maṃ mārente kiṃ karissati,
atk-s0514a3:3142_10: tāva maṃ pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpetvā sādhunaradhammaṃ nāma suṇohi,
atk-s0514a3:3142_12: taṃ kareyyāsī”ti vatvā sādhunaradhammaṃ vaṇṇetvā attano jīvitaṃ āharāpento so adhosiro olambantova gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3144_0: “Khippaṃ mamaṃ uddhara kātiyāna, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3145_0: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3146_0: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “ayaṃ paṇḍitena devamanussānaṃ akathitapubbo dhammo bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3146_1: khippameva naṃ uddharitvā sādhunaradhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ ukkhipitvā pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3148_0: “So puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nagamuddhani khippaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā;
atk-s0514a3:3151_0: “Samuddhaṭo mesi tuvaṃ papātā, hadayena te ajja mamatthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3152_0: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva me pātukarohi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3156_0: “Samuddhaṭo tyasmi ahaṃ papātā, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3157_0: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3159_2: Yakkhopi “sādhū”ti nhānodakaṃ āharitvā nhātakāle mahāsattassa dibbadussagandhamālādīni datvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattakāle dibbabhojanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3159_3: Atha mahāsatto bhuttabhojano kāḷāgirimatthakaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā
atk-s0514a3:3161_0: “Yātānuyāyī ca bhavāhi māṇava, allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassu;
atk-s0514a3:3162_0: Mā cassu mittesu kadāci dubbhī, mā ca vasaṃ asatīnaṃ nigacche”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3163_0: Tattha allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassūti allaṃ tintaṃ pāṇiṃ mā dahi mā jhāpehi.
atk-s0514a3:3164_0: Yakkho saṃkhittena bhāsite cattāro sādhunaradhamme bujjhituṃ asakkonto vitthārena pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3166_0: “Kathaṃ nu yātaṃ anuyāyi hoti, allañca pāṇiṃ dahate kathaṃ so;
atk-s0514a3:3167_0: Asatī ca kā ko pana mittadubbho, akkhāhi me pucchito etamattha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3170_0: “Asanthutaṃ nopi ca diṭṭhapubbaṃ, yo āsanenāpi nimantayeyya;
atk-s0514a3:3171_0: Tasseva atthaṃ puriso kareyya, yātānuyāyīti tamāhu paṇḍitā.
atk-s0514a3:3174_0: Na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintaye, adubbhapāṇiṃ dahate mittadubbho.
atk-s0514a3:3177_0: Na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0514a3:3179_0: “Puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya;
atk-s0514a3:3180_0: Laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche.
atk-s0514a3:3184_0: Asatī ca sā so pana mittadubbho,
atk-s0514a3:3186_1: Yo āsanenāpīti yo evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ āsanamattenapi nimantayeyya,
atk-s0514a3:3186_3: Tassevāti tassa pubbakārissa atthaṃ puriso karoteva.
atk-s0514a3:3186_6: pacchā karonto anuyāyī nāmāti evaṃ paṇḍitā kathenti.
atk-s0514a3:3186_9: Adubbhapāṇinti adubbhakaṃ attano bhuñjanahatthameva dahanto hi mittadubbhī nāma hoti.
atk-s0514a3:3186_10: Iti allahatthassa ajjhāpanaṃ nāma ayaṃ dutiyo sādhunaradhammo.
atk-s0514a3:3186_11: Na tassāti tassa sākhaṃ vā pattaṃ vā na bhañjeyya.
atk-s0514a3:3186_14: Iti paribhuttacchāyassa acetanassa rukkhassapi pāpaṃ karonto mittadubbhī nāma hoti,
atk-s0514a3:3186_16: Evaṃ mittesu adubbhanaṃ nāma ayaṃ tatiyo sādhunaradhammo.
atk-s0514a3:3186_19: maññeva sā icchatī”ti evaṃ suṭṭhu matāya.
atk-s0514a3:3186_22: Iti mātugāmaṃ nissāya pāpassa akaraṇaṃ nāma ayaṃ catuttho sādhunaradhammo.
atk-s0514a3:3186_24: so tvaṃ imehi catūhi sādhunaradhammehi yutto hohīti.
atk-s0514a3:3187_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto yakkhassa cattāro sādhunaradhamme buddhalīlāya kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:3190_0: Te dhamme suṇantoyeva puṇṇako sallakkhesi “catūsupi ṭhānesu paṇḍito attano jīvitameva yācati,
atk-s0514a3:3190_1: ayaṃ kho mayhaṃ pubbe asanthutasseva sakkāramakāsi,
atk-s0514a3:3190_2: ahamassa nivesane tīhaṃ mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavanto vasiṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3190_3: ahañcimaṃ pāpakammaṃ karonto mātugāmaṃ nissāya karomi,
atk-s0514a3:3190_8: indapatthanagaravāsīnaṃ assumukhāni hāsento imaṃ vegena tattha netvā dhammasabhāyaṃ otāressāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3192_0: “Avasiṃ ahaṃ tuyha tīhaṃ agāre, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi;
atk-s0514a3:3193_0: Mitto mamāsī visajjāmahaṃ taṃ, kāmaṃ gharaṃ uttamapañña gaccha.
atk-s0514a3:3195_0: Api hāyatu nāgakulā attho, alampi me nāgakaññāya hotu;
atk-s0514a3:3196_0: So tvaṃ sakeneva subhāsitena, muttosi me ajja vadhāya paññā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3198_1: tvaṃ tāva maṃ attano gharaṃ mā pesehi,
atk-s0514a3:3200_0: “Handa tuvaṃ yakkha mamampi nehi, sasuraṃ te atthaṃ mayi carassu;
atk-s0514a3:3201_0: Mayañca nāgādhipatiṃ vimānaṃ, dakkhemu nāgassa adiṭṭhapubba”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3202_1: Sasuraṃ te atthaṃ mayi carassūti tava sasurassa santakaṃ atthaṃ mayi cara mā nāsehi.
atk-s0514a3:3202_2: Nāgādhipatiṃ vimānanti ahampi nāgādhipatiñca vimānañcassa adiṭṭhapubbaṃ passeyyaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3205_0: “Yaṃ ve narassa ahitāya assa, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya;
atk-s0514a3:3206_0: Atha kena vaṇṇena amittagāmaṃ, tuvamicchasi uttamapañña gantu”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3207_0: Tattha amittagāmanti amittassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, amittasamāgamanti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3210_0: “Addhā pajānāmi ahampi etaṃ, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya;
atk-s0514a3:3211_0: Pāpañca me natthi kataṃ kuhiñci, tasmā na saṅke maraṇāgamāyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3213_1: tādiso yakkho kakkhaḷo mayā dhammakathāya palobhetvā mudukato,
atk-s0514a3:3213_6: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā puṇṇako “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tuṭṭhacitto āha –
atk-s0514a3:3215_0: “Handa ca ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, mayā saha dakkhasi ehi katte;
atk-s0514a3:3216_0: Yatthacchati naccagītehi nāgo, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷiññaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3218_0: “Naṃ nāgakaññā caritaṃ gaṇena, nikīḷitaṃ niccamaho ca rattiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3221_0: “Annena pānena upetarūpaṃ, naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
atk-s0514a3:3223_3: Caritaṃ gaṇenāti taṃ nāgakaññānaṃ gaṇena caritaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3223_4: Nikīḷitanti niccaṃ aho ca rattiñca nāgakaññāhi kīḷitānukīḷitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3224_0: Evañca pana vatvā puṇṇako mahāsattaṃ assapiṭṭhaṃ āropetvā tattha nesi.
atk-s0514a3:3226_0: “So puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nisīdayī pacchato āsanasmiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3229_0: “Patvāna ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, aṭṭhāsi kattā pacchato puṇṇakassa;
atk-s0514a3:3231_1: so evaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇetvā paṇḍitaṃ attano ājaññaṃ āropetvā nāgabhavanaṃ nesi.
atk-s0514a3:3231_3: Pacchato puṇṇakassāti puṇṇakassa kira etadahosi “sace nāgarājā paṇḍitaṃ disvā muducitto bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3231_5: tassa taṃ apassantasseva sindhavaṃ āropetvā ādāya gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3231_10: attano jāmātaraṃ passitvā paṭhamataraṃ sayameva ajjhabhāsathāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3234_0: “Yannu tuvaṃ agamā maccalokaṃ, anvesamāno hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa;
atk-s0514a3:3236_0: Tattha kacci samiddhenāti kacci te manorathena samiddhena nipphannena idhāgatosīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a3:3239_0: “Ayañhi so āgato yaṃ tvamicchasi, dhammena laddho mama dhammapālo;
atk-s0514a3:3240_0: Taṃ passatha sammukhā bhāsamānaṃ, sukho have sappurisehi saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3241_0: Tattha yaṃ tvamicchasīti yaṃ tvaṃ icchasi.
atk-s0514a3:3241_2: Sammukhā bhāsamānanti taṃ lokasakkataṃ dhammapālaṃ idāni madhurena sarena dhammaṃ bhāsamānaṃ sammukhāva passatha,
atk-s0514a3:3241_3: sappurisehi ekaṭṭhāne samāgamo hi nāma sukho hotīti.
atk-s0514a3:3247_2: tvaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ disvā maraṇabhayena aṭṭito bhīto hutvā yaṃ maṃ nābhivādesi,
atk-s0514a3:3248_0: Evaṃ vandanaṃ paccāsīsantaṃ nāgarājānaṃ mahāsatto “na tvaṃ mayā vanditabbo”ti avatvāva attano ñāṇavantatāya
atk-s0514a3:3248_1: upāyakosallena “ahaṃ vajjhappattabhāvena naṃ taṃ vandāmī”ti vadanto gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3250_0: “Na camhi byamhito nāga, na ca maccubhayaṭṭito;
atk-s0514a3:3251_0: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
atk-s0514a3:3254_0: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3255_5: vajjhaṃ vā avajjhopi abhivādāpetuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0514a3:3255_8: kathaṃ vā tena attānaṃ abhivādāpayetha ve.
atk-s0514a3:3255_9: Tassa hi taṃ kammaṃ na upapajjati.
atk-s0514a3:3255_10: Tvañca kira maṃ mārāpetuṃ imaṃ āṇāpesi,
atk-s0514a3:3256_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā mahāsattassa thutiṃ karonto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a3:3259_0: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
atk-s0514a3:3262_0: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3263_0: Idāni mahāsatto nāgarājena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto āha –
atk-s0514a3:3265_0: “Asassataṃ sassataṃ nu tavayidaṃ, iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti;
atk-s0514a3:3266_0: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3268_0: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3269_0: Akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, yatheva te laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3270_2: “mā kho yasaṃ nissāya pāpamakāsī”ti iminā padena attano jīvitaṃ yācati.
atk-s0514a3:3270_3: Iddhīti nāgaiddhi ca nāgajuti ca kāyabalañca cetasikavīriyañca nāgabhavane upapatti ca yañca te idaṃ vimānaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3270_6: kathaṃ nu te idaṃ sabbaṃ laddhanti.
atk-s0514a3:3270_7: Adhiccaladdhanti kiṃ nu tayā idaṃ vimānaṃ evaṃ sampannaṃ adhicca akāraṇena laddhaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3273_0: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3274_0: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3278_0: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a3:3279_0: Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca te nāga mahāvimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3283_0: “Ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke, saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā;
atk-s0514a3:3284_0: Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
atk-s0514a3:3287_0: Acchādanaṃ sāyanamannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha.
atk-s0514a3:3289_0: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a3:3290_0: Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca me dhīra mahāvimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3291_1: Taṃ me vatanti taṃ sakkaccaṃ dinnadānameva mayhaṃ vattasamādānañca brahmacariyañca ahosi,
atk-s0514a3:3294_0: “Evaṃ ce te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, jānāsi puññānaṃ phalūpapattiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3295_0: Tasmā hi dhammaṃ cara appamatto, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3296_0: Tattha jānāsīti sace tayā dānānubhāvena taṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3296_1: evaṃ sante jānāsi nāma puññānaṃ phalañca puññaphalena nibbattaṃ upapattiñca.
atk-s0514a3:3296_2: Tasmā hīti yasmā puññehi tayā idaṃ laddhaṃ, tasmā.
atk-s0514a3:3296_3: Puna māvasesīti punapi yathā imaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ ajjhāvasasi,
atk-s0514a3:3299_0: “Nayidha santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, yesannapānāni dademu katte;
atk-s0514a3:3300_0: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasemā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3303_0: “Bhogī hi te santi idhūpapannā, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca;
atk-s0514a3:3304_0: Tesu tuvaṃ vacasā kammunā ca, asampaduṭṭho ca bhavāhi niccaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3306_0: “Evaṃ tuvaṃ nāga asampadosaṃ, anupālaya vacasā kammunā ca;
atk-s0514a3:3307_0: Ṭhatvā idha yāvatāyukaṃ vimāne, uddhaṃ ito gacchasi devaloka”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3308_2: Tesūti tesu puttadārādīsu bhogīsu vācāya kammena ca niccaṃ asampaduṭṭho bhava.
atk-s0514a3:3308_3: Anupālayāti evaṃ puttādīsu ceva sesasattesu ca mettacittasaṅkhātaṃ asampadosaṃ anurakkha.
atk-s0514a3:3308_4: Uddhaṃ itoti ito nāgabhavanato cuto uparidevalokaṃ gamissati.
atk-s0514a3:3309_0: Tato nāgarājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā “na sakkā paṇḍitena bahi papañcaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3309_1: vimalāya dassetvā subhāsitaṃ sāvetvā dohaḷaṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhanañcayarājānaṃ hāsento paṇḍitaṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3311_0: “Addhā hi so socati rājaseṭṭho, tayā vinā yassa tuvaṃ sajibbo;
atk-s0514a3:3312_0: Dukkhūpanītopi tayā samecca, vindeyya poso sukhamāturopī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3313_0: Tattha sajibboti sajīvo amacco. Sameccāti tayā saha samāgantvā. Āturopīti bāḷhagilānopi samāno.
atk-s0514a3:3314_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto nāgarājassa thutiṃ karonto itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3316_0: “Addhā sataṃ bhāsasi nāga dhammaṃ, anuttaraṃ atthapadaṃ suciṇṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3317_0: Etādisiyāsu hi āpadāsu, paññāyate mādisānaṃ viseso”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3318_0: Tattha addhā satanti ekaṃsena santānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsasi.
atk-s0514a3:3318_2: Etādisiyāsūti evarūpāsu āpadāsu etādise bhaye upaṭṭhite mādisānaṃ paññavantānaṃ viseso paññāyati.
atk-s0514a3:3319_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā atirekataraṃ tuṭṭho tameva pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3321_0: “Akkhāhi no tāyaṃ mudhā nu laddho, akkhehi no tāyaṃ ajesi jūte;
atk-s0514a3:3322_0: Dhammena laddho iti tāyamāha, kathaṃ nu tvaṃ hatthamimassa māgato”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3323_2: Mudhā nu laddhoti kiṃ nu kho mudhā amūlakeneva labhi,
atk-s0514a3:3323_4: Iti tāyamāhāti ayaṃ puṇṇako “dhammena me paṇḍito laddho”ti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3323_5: Kathaṃ nu tvaṃ hatthamimassa māgatoti tvaṃ kathaṃ imassa hatthaṃ āgatosi.
atk-s0514a3:3326_0: “Yo missaro tattha ahosi rājā, tamāyamakkhehi ajesi jūte;
atk-s0514a3:3327_0: So maṃ jito rājā imassadāsi, dhammena laddhosmi asāhasenā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3328_0: Tattha yo missaroti yo maṃ issaro. Imassadāsīti imassa puṇṇakassa adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3329_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā tuṭṭho ahosi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3332_0: Hatthe gahetvāna anomapaññaṃ, pāvekkhi bhariyāya tadā sakāse.
atk-s0514a3:3334_0: “Yena tvaṃ vimale paṇḍu, yena bhattaṃ na ruccati;
atk-s0514a3:3335_0: Na ca metādiso vaṇṇo, ayameso tamonudo.
atk-s0514a3:3338_0: Tassa vākyaṃ nisāmehi, dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ punā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3339_4: Na ca metādiso vaṇṇoti pathavitale vā devaloke vā na ca tādiso vaṇṇo aññassa kassaci atthi,
atk-s0514a3:3339_6: Ayameso tamonudoti yaṃ nissāya tava dohaḷo uppanno,
atk-s0514a3:3339_8: Punāti puna etassa dassanaṃ nāma dullabhanti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3340_0: Vimalāpi taṃ disvā paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3342_0: “Disvāna taṃ vimalā bhūripaññaṃ, dasaṅgulī añjaliṃ paggahetvā;
atk-s0514a3:3343_0: Haṭṭhena bhāvena patītarūpā, iccabravi kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3344_0: Tattha haṭṭhena bhāvenāti pahaṭṭhena cittena. Patītarūpāti somanassajātā.
atk-s0514a3:3345_0: Ito paraṃ vimalāya ca mahāsattassa ca vacanappaṭivacanagāthā –
atk-s0514a3:3350_0: “Na camhi byamhito nāgi, na ca maccubhayaṭṭito;
atk-s0514a3:3351_0: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
atk-s0514a3:3354_0: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjati.
atk-s0514a3:3357_0: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
atk-s0514a3:3360_0: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjati.
atk-s0514a3:3362_0: “Asassataṃ sassataṃ nu tavayidaṃ, iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti;
atk-s0514a3:3363_0: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgakaññetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3365_0: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3366_0: Akkhāhi me nāgakaññetamatthaṃ, yatheva te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3368_0: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkathaṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3369_0: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3371_0: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a3:3372_0: Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca te nāgi mahāvimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3374_0: “Ahañca kho sāmiko cāpi mayhaṃ, saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā;
