atk-s0514a3:3375_0: Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
atk-s0514a3:3378_0: Acchādanaṃ sāyanamannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha.
atk-s0514a3:3380_0: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a3:3381_0: Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca me dhīra mahāvimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3383_0: “Evaṃ ce te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, jānāsi puññānaṃ phalūpapattiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3384_0: Tasmā hi dhammaṃ cara appamattā, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasesi.
atk-s0514a3:3386_0: “Nayidha santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, yesannapānāni dademu katte;
atk-s0514a3:3387_0: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasema.
atk-s0514a3:3389_0: “Bhogī hi te santi idhūpapannā, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca;
atk-s0514a3:3390_0: Tesu tuvaṃ vacasā kammunā ca, asampaduṭṭhā ca bhavāhi niccaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3392_0: “Evaṃ tuvaṃ nāgi asampadosaṃ, anupālaya vacasā kammunā ca;
atk-s0514a3:3393_0: Ṭhatvā idha yāvatāyukaṃ vimāne, uddhaṃ ito gacchasi devalokaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3395_0: “Addhā hi so socati rājaseṭṭho, tayā vinā yassa tuvaṃ sajibbo;
atk-s0514a3:3396_0: Dukkhūpanītopi tayā samecca, vindeyya poso sukhamāturopi.
atk-s0514a3:3398_0: “Addhā sataṃ bhāsasi nāgi dhammaṃ, anuttaraṃ atthapadaṃ suciṇṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3399_0: Etādisiyāsu hi āpadāsu, paññāyate mādisānaṃ viseso.
atk-s0514a3:3401_0: “Akkhāhi no tāyaṃ mudhā nu laddho, akkhehi no tāyaṃ ajesi jūte;
atk-s0514a3:3402_0: Dhammena laddho iti tāyamāha, kathaṃ nu tvaṃ hatthamimassa māgato.
atk-s0514a3:3404_0: “Yo missaro tattha ahosi rājā, tamāyamakkhehi ajesi jūte;
atk-s0514a3:3405_0: So maṃ jito rājā imassadāsi, dhammena laddhosmi asāhasenā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3406_0: Imāsaṃ gāthānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0514a3:3407_0: Mahāsattassa vacanaṃ sutvā atirekataraṃ tuṭṭhā vimalā mahāsattaṃ gahetvā sahassagandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:3407_1: nhānakāle mahāsattassa dibbadussadibbagandhamālādīni datvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattakāle dibbabhojanaṃ bhojesi.
atk-s0514a3:3407_2: Mahāsatto bhuttabhojano alaṅkatāsanaṃ paññāpetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0514a3:3415_0: “Ubhopi te attamane viditvā, mahoragaṃ nāgakaññañca dhīro;
atk-s0514a3:3416_0: Achambhī abhīto alomahaṭṭho, iccabravi varuṇaṃ nāgarājānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3418_0: “Mā rodhayi nāga āyāhamasmi, yena tavattho idaṃ sarīraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3419_0: Hadayena maṃsena karohi kiccaṃ, sayaṃ karissāmi yathāmati te”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3420_4: “kathaṃ nu kho imaṃ idāni māressāmī”ti vā mā cintayi.
atk-s0514a3:3420_8: Sayaṃ karissāmīti sace tvaṃ “imassa santike idāni dhammo me suto”ti maṃ māretuṃ na visahasi,
atk-s0514a3:3423_0: “Paññā have hadayaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ, te tyamha paññāya mayaṃ sutuṭṭhā;
atk-s0514a3:3424_0: Anūnanāmo labhatajja dāraṃ, ajjeva taṃ kuruyo pāpayātū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3425_0: Tattha te tyamhāti te mayaṃ tava paññāya sutuṭṭhā.
atk-s0514a3:3425_4: Pāpayātūti ajjeva taṃ kururaṭṭhaṃ puṇṇako pāpetu.
atk-s0514a3:3426_0: Evañca pana vatvā varuṇo nāgarājā irandhatiṃ puṇṇakassa adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3426_1: So taṃ labhitvā tuṭṭhacitto mahāsattena saddhiṃ sallapi.
atk-s0514a3:3428_0: “Sa puṇṇako attamano udaggo, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ labhitvā;
atk-s0514a3:3429_0: Haṭṭhena bhāvena patītarūpo, iccabravi kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3431_0: “Bhariyāya maṃ tvaṃ akari samaṅgiṃ, ahañca te vidhura karomi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3432_0: Idañca te maṇiratanaṃ dadāmi, ajjeva taṃ kuruyo pāpayāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3433_1: ahaṃ tava guṇesu pasanno arahāmi tava anucchavikaṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3433_2: tasmā imañca te cakkavattiparibhogaṃ maṇiratanaṃ demi,
atk-s0514a3:3434_0: Atha mahāsatto tassa thutiṃ karonto itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3436_0: “Ajeyyamesā tava hotu metti, bhariyāya kaccāna piyāya saddhiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3437_0: Ānandi vitto sumano patīto, datvā maṇiṃ mañca nayindapattha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3438_0: Tattha ajeyyamesāti esā tava bhariyāya saddhiṃ piyasaṃvāsametti ajeyyā hotu.
atk-s0514a3:3439_0: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako tathā akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:3441_0: “Sa puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nisīdayī purato āsanasmiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3444_0: “Mano manussassa yathāpi gacche, tatopissa khippataraṃ ahosi;
atk-s0514a3:3445_0: Sa puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, upānayī nagaraṃ indapatthaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3447_0: “Etindapatthaṃ nagaraṃ padissati, rammāni ca ambavanāni bhāgaso;
atk-s0514a3:3448_0: Ahañca bhariyāya samaṅgibhūto, tuvañca pattosi sakaṃ niketa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3449_0: Tattha yathāpi gaccheti mano nāma kiñcāpi na gacchati,
atk-s0514a3:3449_1: dūre ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanto pana gatoti vuccati,
atk-s0514a3:3449_2: tasmā manassa ārammaṇaggahaṇatopi khippataraṃ tassa manomayasindhavassa gamanaṃ ahosīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0514a3:3449_4: Sakaṃ niketanti tvañca attano nivesanaṃ sampattoti āha.
atk-s0514a3:3450_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase paccūsakāle rājā supinaṃ addasa.
atk-s0514a3:3450_2: rañño nivesanadvāre paññākkhandho sīlamayasākho pañcagorasaphalo alaṅkatahatthigavāssapaṭicchanno mahārukkho ṭhito.
atk-s0514a3:3450_3: Mahājano tassa sakkāraṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3450_4: Atheko kaṇhapuriso pharuso rattasāṭakanivattho rattapupphakaṇṇadharo āvudhahattho āgantvā mahājanassa
atk-s0514a3:3450_5: paridevantasseva taṃ rukkhaṃ samūlaṃ chinditvā ākaḍḍhanto ādāya gantvā puna taṃ āharitvā pakatiṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0514a3:3450_7: Rājā taṃ supinaṃ pariggaṇhanto “mahārukkho viya na añño koci,
atk-s0514a3:3450_9: Mahājanassa paridevantasseva taṃ samūlaṃ chinditvā ādāya gatapuriso viya na añño koci,
atk-s0514a3:3450_11: Puna taṃ āharitvā pakatiṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetvā gato viya so māṇavo puna taṃ paṇḍitaṃ ānetvā dhammasabhāya dvāre ṭhapetvā pakkamissati.
atk-s0514a3:3450_12: Addhā ajja mayaṃ paṇḍitaṃ passissāmā”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā somanassapatto sakalanagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:3450_15: mā socitthā”ti mahājanaṃ assāsetvā paṇḍitassa āgamanaṃ olokento dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0514a3:3450_17: Tasmiṃ khaṇe puṇṇakopi paṇḍitaṃ otāretvā dhammasabhāya dvāre parisamajjheyeva ṭhapetvā irandhatiṃ ādāya devanagarameva gato.
atk-s0514a3:3452_0: “Na puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, oropiya dhammasabhāya majjhe;
atk-s0514a3:3455_0: “Taṃ disvā rājā paramappatīto, uṭṭhāya bāhāhi palissajitvā;
atk-s0514a3:3457_2: so rājā paṇḍitaṃ palissajitvā mahājanamajjhe avikampanto anolīyantoyeva hatthe gahetvā attano abhimukhaṃ katvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3458_0: Atha rājā tena saddhiṃ sammoditvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3460_0: “Tvaṃ no vinetāsi rathaṃva naddhaṃ, nandanti taṃ kuruyo dassanena;
atk-s0514a3:3461_0: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pamokkho ahu māṇavassā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3462_0: Tattha naddhanti yathā naddhaṃ rathaṃ sārathi vineti,
atk-s0514a3:3462_1: evaṃ tvaṃ amhākaṃ kāraṇena nayena hitakiriyāsu vinetā.
atk-s0514a3:3462_2: Nandanti tanti taṃ disvāva ime kururaṭṭhavāsino tava dassanena nandanti.
atk-s0514a3:3462_3: Māṇavassāti māṇavassa santikā kathaṃ tava pamokkho ahosi?
atk-s0514a3:3462_4: Yo vā taṃ muñcantassa māṇavassa pamokkho,
atk-s0514a3:3465_0: “Yaṃ māṇavotyābhivadī janinda, na so manusso naravīraseṭṭha;
atk-s0514a3:3466_0: Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbo.
atk-s0514a3:3468_0: “Bhūmindharo varuṇo nāma nāgo, brahā sucī vaṇṇabalūpapanno;
atk-s0514a3:3469_0: Tassānujaṃ dhītaraṃ kāmayāno, irandhatī nāma sā nāgakaññā.
atk-s0514a3:3471_0: “Tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu, patārayittha maraṇāya mayhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3472_0: So ceva bhariyāya samaṅgibhūto, ahañca anuññāto maṇi ca laddho”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3473_0: Tattha yaṃ māṇavotyābhivadīti janinda yaṃ tvaṃ “māṇavo”ti abhivadasi.
atk-s0514a3:3473_2: Sā nāgakaññāti yaṃ nāgakaññaṃ so patthayamāno mama maraṇāya patārayi cittaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0514a3:3473_5: so hi nāgarājā catupposathikapañhavissajjane pasanno maṃ maṇinā pūjetvā nāgabhavanaṃ gato vimalāya nāma deviyā taṃ maṇiṃ adisvā “deva,
atk-s0514a3:3473_6: kuhiṃ maṇī”ti pucchito mama dhammakathikabhāvaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0514a3:3473_7: Sā mayhaṃ dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā hutvā mama hadaye dohaḷaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0514a3:3473_8: Nāgarājā duggahitena pana dhītaraṃ irandhatiṃ āha – “mātā,
atk-s0514a3:3473_10: tassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharituṃ samatthaṃ sāmikaṃ pariyesāhī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3473_11: Sā pariyesantī vessavaṇassa bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ disvā taṃ attani paṭibaddhacittaṃ ñatvā pitu santikaṃ nesi.
atk-s0514a3:3473_12: Atha naṃ so “vidhurapaṇḍitassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharituṃ sakkonto irandhatiṃ labhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a3:3473_13: Puṇṇako vepullapabbatato cakkavattiparibhogaṃ maṇiratanaṃ āharitvā tumhehi saddhiṃ jūtaṃ kīḷitvā maṃ jinitvā labhi.
atk-s0514a3:3473_14: Ahañca mama nivesane tīhaṃ vasāpetvā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3473_15: Sopi maṃ assavāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā himavante rukkhesu ca pabbatesu ca pothetvā māretuṃ asakkonto sattame
atk-s0514a3:3473_16: vātakkhandhe verambhavātamukhe ca pakkhanditvā anupubbena saṭṭhiyojanubbedhe kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a3:3473_17: sīhavesādivasena idañcidañca rūpaṃ katvāpi māretuṃ asakkonto mayā attano māraṇakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho ācikkhi.
atk-s0514a3:3473_19: Taṃ sutvā pasannacitto maṃ idha ānetukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3474_0: Athāhaṃ taṃ ādāya nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā nāgarañño ca vimalāya ca dhammaṃ desesiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3474_1: Tato nāgarājā ca vimalā ca sabbanāgaparisā ca pasīdiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3474_2: Nāgarājā tattha mayā chāhaṃ vutthakāle irandhatiṃ puṇṇakassa adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3474_3: So taṃ labhitvā pasannacitto hutvā maṃ maṇiratanena pūjetvā nāgarājena āṇatto manomayasindhavaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0514a3:3474_4: sayaṃ majjhimāsane nisīditvā irandhatiṃ pacchimāsane nisīdāpetvā maṃ purimāsane nisīdāpetvā idhāgantvā
atk-s0514a3:3474_5: parisamajjhe otāretvā irandhatiṃ ādāya attano nagarameva gato. Evaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a3:3474_6: so puṇṇako tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu patārayittha maraṇāya mayhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3474_7: Athevaṃ maṃ nissāya so ceva bhariyāya samaṅgibhūto,
atk-s0514a3:3474_8: mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannena nāgarājena ahañca anuññāto,
atk-s0514a3:3474_9: tassa puṇṇakassa santikā ayaṃ sabbakāmadado cakkavattiparibhogamaṇi ca laddho, gaṇhatha, deva,
atk-s0514a3:3475_0: Tato rājā paccūsakāle attanā diṭṭhasupinaṃ nagaravāsīnaṃ kathetukāmo “bhonto,
atk-s0514a3:3475_1: nagaravāsino ajja mayā diṭṭhasupinaṃ suṇāthā”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3477_0: “Rukkho hi mayhaṃ padvāre sujāto, paññākkhandho sīlamayassa sākhā;
atk-s0514a3:3478_0: Atthe ca dhamme ca ṭhito nipāko, gavapphalo hatthigavāssachanno.
atk-s0514a3:3481_0: So no ayaṃ āgato sanniketaṃ, rukkhassimassāpacitiṃ karotha.
atk-s0514a3:3483_0: “Ye keci vittā mama paccayena, sabbeva te pātukarontu ajja;
atk-s0514a3:3486_0: “Ye keci baddhā mama atthi raṭṭhe, sabbeva te bandhanā mocayantu;
atk-s0514a3:3487_0: Yathevayaṃ bandhanasmā pamutto, evamete muñcare bandhanasmā.
atk-s0514a3:3490_0: Amajjapā majjarahā pivantu, puṇṇāhi thālāhi palissutāhi.
atk-s0514a3:3492_0: “Mahāpathaṃ nicca samavhayantu, tibbañca rakkhaṃ vidahantu raṭṭhe;
atk-s0514a3:3494_0: Tattha sīlamayassa sākhāti etassa rukkhassa sīlamayā sākhā.
atk-s0514a3:3494_1: Atthe ca dhammecāti vaddhiyañca sabhāve ca.
atk-s0514a3:3494_5: Naccagītatūriyābhināditeti atha tassa rukkhassa pūjaṃ karontena mahājanena tasmiṃ rukkhe etehi naccādīhi abhinādite.
atk-s0514a3:3494_6: Ucchijja senaṃ puriso ahāsīti eko kaṇhapuriso āgantvā taṃ rukkhaṃ ucchijja parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ senaṃ palāpetvā ahāsi gahetvā gato.
atk-s0514a3:3494_7: Puna so rukkho āgantvā amhākaṃ nivesanadvārayeva ṭhito.
atk-s0514a3:3494_8: So no ayaṃ rukkhasadiso paṇḍito sanniketaṃ āgato.
atk-s0514a3:3494_9: Idāni sabbeva tumhe rukkhassa imassa apacitiṃ karotha,
atk-s0514a3:3495_1: amaccā ye keci maṃ nissāya laddhena yasena vittā tuṭṭhacittā,
atk-s0514a3:3495_5: Ye kecīti antamaso kīḷanatthāya baddhe migapakkhino upādāya.
atk-s0514a3:3495_7: Unnaṅgalā māsamimaṃ karontūti imaṃ māsaṃ kasananaṅgalāni ussāpetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā sabbeva manussā mahāchaṇaṃ karontu.
atk-s0514a3:3495_11: majjapā purisā majjarahā attano attano āpānaṭṭhānesu nisinnā pivantūti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3495_14: Mahāpathaṃ nicca samavhayantūti antonagare alaṅkatamahāpathaṃ rājamaggaṃ nissāya ṭhitā vesiyā niccakālaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3495_17: Yathāti yathā rakkhassa susaṃvihitattā unnaṅgalā hutvā rukkhassimassa apacitiṃ karontā aññamaññaṃ na viheṭhayeyyuṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3498_0: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3509_0: Tattha abhihārayunti evaṃ raññā āṇattā mahāchaṇaṃ paṭiyādetvā sabbe satte bandhanā mocetvā ete sabbe
atk-s0514a3:3509_1: orodhādayo nānappakāraṃ paṇṇākāraṃ sajjitvā tena saddhiṃ annañca pānañca paṇḍitassa pesesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3509_2: Paṇḍitamāgateti paṇḍite āgate taṃ paṇḍitaṃ disvā bahujano pasanno ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3510_1: Tato mahāsatto buddhakiccaṃ sādhento viya mahājanassa dhammaṃ desento rājānañca anusāsanto dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0514a3:3510_2: katvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3510_3: Rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi nagaravāsino paṇḍitassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne saggapuraṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3511_2: pubbepi tathāgato paññāsampanno upāyakusaloyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0514a3:3516_0: Phussatī varavaṇṇābheti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthuṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto pokkharavassaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:3516_1: Yadā hi satthā pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha hemantaṃ vītināmetvā udāyittherena
atk-s0514a3:3516_3: tadā sakyarājāno “mayaṃ amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatitvā bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsamānā
atk-s0514a3:3516_4: “nigrodhasakkassārāmo ramaṇīyo”ti sallakkhetvā tattha sabbaṃ paṭijagganavidhiṃ katvā gandhapupphādihatthā
atk-s0514a3:3516_5: paccuggamanaṃ karontā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍite daharadahare nāgaradārake ca nāgaradārikāyo ca paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3516_8: Tesaṃ antarā sāmaṃ gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi satthāraṃ pūjetvā bhagavantaṃ gahetvā nigrodhārāmameva agamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3516_12: amhākaṃ kaniṭṭho bhāgineyyo putto nattā”ti cintetvā daharadahare rājakumāre ca rājakumārikāyo ca āhaṃsu “tumhe bhagavantaṃ vandatha,
atk-s0514a3:3517_0: Tesu evaṃ avanditvā nisinnesu bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā “na maṃ ñātayo vandanti,
atk-s0514a3:3517_1: handa idāneva vandāpessāmī”ti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0514a3:3517_2: tesaṃ sīse pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya kaṇḍambarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3517_3: Rājā suddhodano taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā āha “bhante,
atk-s0514a3:3517_4: tumhākaṃ jātadivase kāḷadevalassa vandanatthaṃ upanītānaṃ vo pāde parivattitvā brāhmaṇassa matthake ṭhite disvā ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pāde vandiṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3517_6: Punapi vappamaṅgaladivase jambucchāyāya sirisayane nisinnānaṃ vo jambucchāyāya aparivattanaṃ disvāpi ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pāde vandiṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3517_8: Idāni imaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvāpi tumhākaṃ pāde vandāmi,
atk-s0514a3:3517_10: Raññā pana vandite avanditvā ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma ekasākiyopi nāhosi,
atk-s0514a3:3518_0: Iti bhagavā ñātayo vandāpetvā ākāsato otaritvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0514a3:3518_1: Nisinne ca bhagavati sikhāpatto ñātisamāgamo ahosi,
atk-s0514a3:3518_9: “Aho acchariyaṃ aho abbhutaṃ aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatā,
atk-s0514a3:3518_10: yesaṃ ñātisamāgame evarūpaṃ pokkharavassaṃ vassī”ti bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3518_13: pubbepi mama ñātisamāgame mahāmegho pokkharavassaṃ vassiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a3:3519_0: Atīte siviraṭṭhe jetuttaranagare sivimahārājā nāma rajjaṃ kārento sañjayaṃ nāma puttaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0514a3:3519_1: So tassa vayappattassa maddarājadhītaraṃ phussatiṃ nāma rājakaññaṃ ānetvā rajjaṃ niyyādetvā phussatiṃ aggamahesiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3519_3: ito ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0514a3:3519_4: Tasmiṃ bandhumatinagaraṃ nissāya kheme migadāye viharante eko rājā rañño bandhumassa anagghena candanasārena
atk-s0514a3:3519_7: So taṃ paṇṇākāraṃ tāsaṃ dātukāmo hutvā candanasāraṃ jeṭṭhikāya adāsi,
atk-s0514a3:3519_9: Tā ubhopi “na mayaṃ imaṃ attano sarīre piḷandhissāma,
atk-s0514a3:3519_11: candanasārena ca suvaṇṇamālāya ca dasabalaṃ pūjessāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3519_13: Jeṭṭhikā sukhumacandanacuṇṇaṃ kāretvā suvaṇṇasamuggaṃ pūretvā gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3519_14: Kaniṭṭhabhaginī pana suvaṇṇamālaṃ uracchadamālaṃ kārāpetvā suvaṇṇasamuggena gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3519_15: Tā ubhopi migadāyavihāraṃ gantvā jeṭṭhikā candanacuṇṇena dasabalassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ pūjetvā sesacuṇṇāni gandhakuṭiyaṃ vikiritvā “bhante,
atk-s0514a3:3519_16: anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa mātā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3519_17: Kaniṭṭhabhaginīpi tathāgatassa suvaṇṇavaṇaṃ sarīraṃ suvaṇṇamālāya katena uracchadena pūjetvā “bhante,
atk-s0514a3:3519_19: tāva idaṃ pasādhanaṃ mama sarīrā mā vigataṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3520_0: Tā ubhopi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3520_2: manussalokato devalokaṃ saṃsarantī ekanavutikappāvasāne amhākaṃ buddhuppādakāle buddhamātā mahāmāyādevī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3520_3: Kaniṭṭhabhaginīpi tatheva saṃsarantī kassapadasabalassa kāle kikissa rañño dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0514a3:3520_4: Sā cittakammakatāya viya uracchadamālāya alaṅkatena urena jātattā uracchadā nāma kumārikā hutvā soḷasavassikakāle
atk-s0514a3:3520_5: satthu bhattānumodanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aparabhāge bhattānumodanaṃ suṇanteneva pitarā
atk-s0514a3:3520_6: sotāpattiphalaṃ pattadivaseyeva arahattaṃ patvā pabbajitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0514a3:3522_0: Dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, saṅghadāsī ca sattamī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3526_0: Tāsu phussatī sudhammā nāma hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā vipassisammāsambuddhassa katāya candanacuṇṇapūjāya
atk-s0514a3:3526_1: phalena rattacandanarasaparipphositena viya sarīrena jātattā phussatī nāma kumārikā hutvā devesu ca manussesu
atk-s0514a3:3526_2: ca saṃsarantī aparabhāge sakkassa devarañño aggamahesī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0514a3:3526_3: Athassā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā pañcasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu sakko devarājā tassā parikkhīṇāyukataṃ ñatvā
atk-s0514a3:3526_4: mahantena yasena taṃ ādāya nandanavanuyyānaṃ gantvā tattha taṃ alaṅkatasayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṃ sayaṃ sayanapasse
atk-s0514a3:3526_7: te gaṇhassū”ti vadanto imasmiṃ gāthāsahassapaṭimaṇḍite mahāvessantarajātake paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3529_0: Pathabyā cārupubbaṅgi, yaṃ tuyhaṃ manaso piya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3530_0: Evamesā mahāvessantaradhammadesanā devaloke patiṭṭhāpitā nāma hoti.
atk-s0514a3:3531_3: Pathabyāti pathaviyaṃ gahetabbe katvā varassu gaṇhassūti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3531_5: Yaṃ tuyhaṃ manaso piyanti yaṃ yaṃ tava manasā piyaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3531_6: taṃ taṃ dasahi koṭṭhāsehi gaṇhāhīti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3532_0: Sā attano cavanadhammataṃ ajānantī pamattā hutvā dutiyagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3534_0: “Devarāja namo tyatthu, kiṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0514a3:3535_0: Rammā cāvesi maṃ ṭhānā, vātova dharaṇīruha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3536_0: Tattha namo tyatthūti namo te atthu.
atk-s0514a3:3536_1: Kiṃ pāpanti kiṃ mayā tava santike pāpaṃ pakatanti pucchati.
atk-s0514a3:3537_0: Athassā pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sakko dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a3:3539_0: “Na ceva te kataṃ pāpaṃ, na ca me tvamasi appiyā;
atk-s0514a3:3540_0: Puññañca te parikkhīṇaṃ, yena tevaṃ vadāmahaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3543_0: Paṭiggaṇhāhi me ete, vare dasa pavecchato”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3544_0: Tattha yena tevanti yena te evaṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0514a3:3544_1: Tuyhaṃ vinābhāvoti tava amhehi saddhiṃ viyogo bhavissati.
atk-s0514a3:3545_0: Sā sakkassa vacanaṃ sutvā nicchayena attano maraṇaṃ ñatvā varaṃ gaṇhantī āha –
atk-s0514a3:3557_0: Kucchi anunnato assa, cāpaṃva likhitaṃ samaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3559_0: “Thanā me nappapateyyuṃ, palitā na santu vāsava;
atk-s0514a3:3560_0: Kāye rajo na limpetha, vajjhañcāpi pamocaye.
atk-s0514a3:3567_0: Tattha sivirājassāti sā sakalajambudīpatalaṃ olokentī attano anucchavikaṃ sivirañño nivesanaṃ disvā tattha aggamahesibhāvaṃ patthentī evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:3567_1: Yathā migīti ekavassikā hi migapotikā nīlanettā hoti,
atk-s0514a3:3567_7: Likhitanti yathā chekena dhanukārena sammā likhitaṃ dhanu anunnatamajjhaṃ tulāvaṭṭaṃ samaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a3:3568_1: Palitā na santu vāsavāti vāsava devaseṭṭha,
atk-s0514a3:3568_2: palitānipi me sirasmiṃ na santu mā paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3568_4: Vajjhañcāpīti kibbisakārakaṃ rājāparādhikaṃ vajjhappattacoraṃ attano balena mocetuṃ samatthā bhaveyyaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3568_6: Bhūtamāgadhavaṇṇiteti bhojanakālādīsu thutivasena kālaṃ ārocentehi sūtehi ceva māgadhakehi ca vaṇṇite.
atk-s0514a3:3568_7: Citraggaḷerughusiteti pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddasadisaṃ manoramaṃ ravaṃ ravantehi sattaratanavicittehi dvārakavāṭehi ugghosite.
atk-s0514a3:3568_9: khādathā”ti surāmaṃsehi pabodhiyamānajane evarūpe sivirājassa nivesane tassa aggamahesī bhaveyyanti ime dasa vare gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a3:3572_0: “Ye te dasa varā dinnā, mayā sabbaṅgasobhane;
atk-s0514a3:3573_0: Sivirājassa vijite, sabbe te lacchasī vare”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3574_0: Athassā sakko devarājā phussatiyā dasa vare adāsi,
atk-s0514a3:3574_2: tava sabbe te samijjhantū”ti vatvā anumodi.
atk-s0514a3:3578_0: Tattha anumoditthāti “sabbe te lacchasi vare”ti evaṃ vare datvā pamuddito tuṭṭhamānaso ahosīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3581_0: Iti sā vare gahetvā tato cutā maddarañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0514a3:3581_1: Jāyamānā ca candanacuṇṇaparikiṇṇena viya sarīrena jātā.
atk-s0514a3:3581_3: Sā mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhitvā soḷasavassakāle uttamarūpadharā ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3581_4: Atha naṃ sivimahārājā puttassa sañjayakumārassa atthāya ānetvā tassa chattaṃ ussāpetvā soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3584_1: Atha naṃ sakko āvajjamāno “mayā phussatiyā dinnavaresu nava varā samiddhā”ti disvā “eko pana puttavaro na tāva samijjhati,
atk-s0514a3:3584_5: Taṃ ñatvā sakko tassa santikaṃ gantvā “mārisa,
atk-s0514a3:3584_7: tattha sivirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā tassa ceva aññesañca cavanadhammānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3584_8: saṭṭhisahassānaṃ devaputtānaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0514a3:3584_11: Mahāsatte kucchigate phussatī dohaḷinī hutvā catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe rājanivesanadvāre cāti
atk-s0514a3:3584_12: chasu ṭhānesu cha dānasālāyo kārāpetvā devasikaṃ cha satasahassāni vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ dātukāmā ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3585_0: Rājā tassā dohaḷaṃ sutvā nemittake brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā pucchi.
atk-s0514a3:3585_5: Taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā cha dānasālāyo kārāpetvā vuttappakāraṃ dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a3:3585_6: Bodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato paṭṭhāya rañño āyassa pamāṇaṃ nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0514a3:3585_8: Devī mahantena parivārena gabbhaṃ dhārentī dasamāse paripuṇṇe nagaraṃ daṭṭhukāmā hutvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0514a3:3585_9: Rājā nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkārāpetvā deviṃ rathavaraṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a3:3585_10: Tassā vessānaṃ vīthiyā vemajjhaṃ sampattakāle kammajavātā caliṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3585_12: Taṃ sutvā vessavīthiyaṃyeva tassā sūtigharaṃ kārāpetvā vāsaṃ gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3587_0: Vessānaṃ vīthiyā majjhe, janesi phussatī mama”nti. ;
atk-s0514a3:3588_0: Mahāsatto mātu kucchito nikkhantoyeva visado hutvā akkhīni ummīletvā nikkhami.
atk-s0514a3:3588_5: yathāajjhāsayena dānaṃ dehī”ti pasāritahatthe sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a3:3588_6: Mahāsatto hi umaṅgajātake imasmiṃ jātake pacchimattabhāveti tīsu ṭhānesu jātamatteyeva mātarā saddhiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:3588_7: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase vessavīthiyaṃ jātattā “vessantaro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3592_0: Jātadivaseyeva panassa ekā ākāsacārinī kareṇukā abhimaṅgalasammataṃ sabbasetaṃ hatthipotakaṃ ānetvā maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a3:3592_1: Tassa mahāsattaṃ paccayaṃ katvā uppannattā “paccayo”tveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3592_3: Rājā mahāsattassa atidīghādidose vivajjetvā alambathaniyo madhurakhīrāyo catusaṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3592_4: Tena saddhiṃ jātānañca saṭṭhidārakasahassānaṃ ekekā dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:3592_5: So saṭṭhisahassehi dārakehi saddhiṃ mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0514a3:3592_7: So catuppañcavassikakāle taṃ omuñcitvā dhātīnaṃ datvā puna tāhi dīyamānampi na gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a3:3592_9: Rājā taṃ sutvā “mama puttena dinnaṃ brahmadeyyameva hotū”ti aparampi kāresi.
atk-s0514a3:3592_11: Iti dārakakāleyeva dhātīnaṃ nava vāre piḷandhanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3593_0: Aṭṭhavassikakāle pana pāsādavaragato sirisayanapiṭṭhe nisinnova cintesi “ahaṃ bāhirakadānameva demi,
atk-s0514a3:3593_13: Atha vāpi koci ‘dāso me hohī’ti vadeyya,
atk-s0514a3:3593_15: Tassevaṃ sabhāvaṃ cintentassa catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā ayaṃ mahāpathavī mattavaravāraṇo viya gajjamānā kampi.
atk-s0514a3:3593_16: Sinerupabbatarājā suseditavettaṅkuro viya onamitvā jetuttaranagarābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3593_22: Pathavitalato paṭṭhāya yāva brahmalokā ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3596_0: Tadā nisajja pāsāde, dānaṃ dātuṃ vicintayiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3598_0: Dadeyyaṃ kāyaṃ sāvetvā, yadi koci yācaye mamaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3601_1: Athassa pitā rajjaṃ dātukāmo mātarā saddhiṃ mantetvā maddarājakulato mātuladhītaraṃ maddiṃ nāma rājakaññaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3601_2: ānetvā soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ aggamahesiṃ katvā mahāsattaṃ rajje abhisiñci.
atk-s0514a3:3601_3: Mahāsatto rajje patiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya devasikaṃ cha satasahassāni vissajjento mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0514a3:3601_10: Mahāsatto māsassa chakkhattuṃ alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato cha dānasālāyo olokesi.
atk-s0514a3:3601_15: Dubbhikkhapīḷitā jānapadā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā rājānaṃ upakkosiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3601_19: devaṃ vassāpessāmī”ti te uyyojetvā samādinnasīlo uposathavāsaṃ vasantopi devaṃ vassāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a3:3601_20: So nāgare sannipātetvā “ahaṃ samādinnasīlo sattāhaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasantopi devaṃ vassāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3601_21: kiṃ nu kho kātabba”nti pucchi. Sace, deva,
atk-s0514a3:3601_23: esa jetuttaranagare sañjayassa rañño putto vessantaro nāma dānābhirato.
atk-s0514a3:3601_26: Brāhmaṇe pesetvā taṃ hatthiṃ yācāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0514a3:3602_0: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā brāhmaṇe sannipātetvā tesu guṇavaṇṇasampanne aṭṭha jane vicinitvā tesaṃ paribbayaṃ datvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0514a3:3602_1: tumhe vessantaraṃ hatthiṃ yācitvā ānethā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0514a3:3602_2: Brāhmaṇā anupubbena jetuttaranagaraṃ gantvā dānagge bhattaṃ paribhuñjitvā attano sarīraṃ rajoparikiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3602_3: paṃsumakkhitaṃ katvā puṇṇamadivase rājānaṃ hatthiṃ yācitukāmā hutvā rañño dānaggaṃ āgamanakāle pācīnadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3602_4: Rājāpi “dānaggaṃ olokessāmī”ti pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā alaṅkaritvā alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato pācīnadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3602_5: Brāhmaṇā tatthokāsaṃ alabhitvā dakkhiṇadvāraṃ gantvā unnatapadese ṭhatvā rañño pācīnadvāre dānaggaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0514a3:3602_6: dakkhiṇadvārāgamanakāle hatthe pasāretvā “jayatu bhavaṃ vessantaro”ti tikkhattuṃ āhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3602_7: Mahāsatto te brāhmaṇe disvā hatthiṃ tesaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ pesetvā hatthikkhandhe nisinno paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3605_0: Paggayha dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ, kiṃ maṃ yācanti brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3611_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ahaṃ sīsaṃ ādiṃ katvā ajjhattikadānaṃ dātukāmomhi,
atk-s0514a3:3611_2: pūressāmi tesaṃ manoratha”nti cintetvā hatthikkhandhavaragato tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3613_0: “Dadāmi na vikampāmi, yaṃ maṃ yācanti brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3619_2: Brāhmaṇānaṃ adā dānanti so vāraṇassa analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ olokanatthaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3619_3: adisvā kusumamissakasugandhodakapūritaṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ gahetvā “ito ethā”ti vatvā alaṅkatarajatadāmasadisaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3619_4: hatthisoṇḍaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā udakaṃ pātetvā alaṅkatavāraṇaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3620_0: Tassa catūsu pādesu alaṅkāro cattāri satasahassāni agghati,
atk-s0514a3:3620_3: piṭṭhiyaṃ muttajālaṃ maṇijālaṃ kañcanajālanti tīṇi jālāni tīṇi satasahassāni,
atk-s0514a3:3620_14: ṭhapetvā anagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kāyāruḷhapasādhanaṃ dvāvīsati satasahassāni.
atk-s0514a3:3620_15: Evaṃ tāva ettakaṃ dhanaṃ catuvīsatisatasahassāni agghati.
atk-s0514a3:3620_21: hatthīpi anagghoyevāti hatthinā saddhiṃ satta anagghānīti sabbāni tāni brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3620_22: Tathā hatthino paricārakāni pañca kulasatāni hatthimeṇḍahatthigopakehi saddhiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3620_23: Saha dānenevassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva bhūmikampādayo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3628_0: “Samākulaṃ puraṃ āsi, ghoso ca vipulo mahā;
atk-s0514a3:3630_2: Khubhittha nagaraṃ tadāti tadā jetuttaranagaraṃ saṅkhubhitaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3631_0: Brāhmaṇā kira dakkhiṇadvāre hatthiṃ labhitvā hatthipiṭṭhe nisīditvā mahājanaparivārā nagaramajjhena pāyiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3631_2: amhākaṃ hatthiṃ āruḷhā kuto vo hatthī laddhā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a3:3631_4: ke tumhe”ti mahājanaṃ hatthavikārādīhi ghaṭṭentā nagaramajjhena gantvā uttaradvārena nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3631_5: Nāgarā devatāvaṭṭanena bodhisattassa kuddhā rājadvāre sannipatitvā mahantaṃ upakkosamakaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3632_0: “Samākulaṃ puraṃ āsi, ghoso ca vipulo mahā;
atk-s0514a3:3639_0: Athassa dānena saṅkhubhitacittā hutvā nagaravāsino rañño ārocesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:3641_0: “Uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3645_0: Disvā nāgaṃ nīyamānaṃ, te rañño paṭivedayuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3647_0: “Vidhamaṃ deva te raṭṭhaṃ, putto vessantaro tava;
atk-s0514a3:3648_0: Kathaṃ no hatthinaṃ dajjā, nāgaṃ raṭṭhassa pūjitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3658_4: Kathaṃ no hatthinaṃ dajjāti kena kāraṇena amhākaṃ hatthinaṃ abhimaṅgalasammataṃ kāliṅgaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0514a3:3658_10: Sahatthipanti hatthiparicārakānaṃ pañcannaṃ kulasatānaṃ hatthimeṇḍahatthigopakānañca vasena sahatthipaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3662_0: Etaṃ kho dānaṃ patirūpaṃ, etaṃ kho brāhmaṇārahaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3665_0: Kathaṃ vessantaro putto, gajaṃ bhājeti sañjaya.
atk-s0514a3:3667_0: “Sace tvaṃ na karissasi, sivīnaṃ vacanaṃ idaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3668_0: Maññe taṃ saha puttena, sivī hatthe karissare”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3669_2: Sivī hatthe karissareti siviraṭṭhavāsino saha puttena taṃ attano hatthe karissantīti.
atk-s0514a3:3670_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ete vessantaraṃ mārāpetuṃ icchantī”ti saññāya āha –
atk-s0514a3:3674_0: Pabbājeyyaṃ sakā raṭṭhā, putto hi mama oraso.
atk-s0514a3:3678_0: Pabbājeyyaṃ sakā raṭṭhā, putto hi mama atrajo.
atk-s0514a3:3680_0: “Na cāhaṃ tasmiṃ dubbheyyaṃ, ariyasīlavato hi so;
atk-s0514a3:3681_0: Asilokopi me assa, pāpañca pasave bahuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3683_2: Ariyasīlavatoti ariyena sīlavatena ariyāya ca ācārasampattiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:3686_0: “Mā naṃ daṇḍena satthena, na hi so bandhanāraho;
atk-s0514a3:3687_0: Pabbājehi ca naṃ raṭṭhā, vaṅke vasatu pabbate”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3688_0: Tattha mā naṃ daṇḍena satthenāti deva,
atk-s0514a3:3688_1: tumhe taṃ daṇḍena vā satthena vā mā ghātayittha.
atk-s0514a3:3688_2: Na hi so bandhanārahoti so bandhanārahopi na hotiyeva.
atk-s0514a3:3691_0: “Eso ce sivīnaṃ chando, chandaṃ na panudāmase;
atk-s0514a3:3692_0: Imaṃ so vasatu rattiṃ, kāme ca paribhuñjatu.
atk-s0514a3:3695_0: Samaggā sivayo hutvā, raṭṭhā pabbājayantu na”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3696_0: Tattha vasatūti puttadārassa ovādaṃ dadamāno vasatu, ekarattiñcassa okāsaṃ dethāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3697_1: Atha rājā ne uyyojetvā puttassa sāsanaṃ pesento kattāraṃ āmantetvā tassa santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0514a3:3697_2: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā vessantarassa nivesanaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a3:3700_0: ‘Sivayo deva te kuddhā, negamā ca samāgatā.
atk-s0514a3:3702_0: “Uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3704_0: Kevalo cāpi nigamo, sivayo ca samāgatā.
atk-s0514a3:3707_0: Samaggā sivayo hutvā, raṭṭhā pabbājayanti taṃ’.
atk-s0514a3:3719_0: ‘Dukkhaṃ te vedayissāmi, mā me kujjhi rathesabha’.
atk-s0514a3:3725_0: Sivayo deva te kuddhā, negamā ca samāgatā.
atk-s0514a3:3727_0: “Uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3729_0: Kevalo cāpi nigamo, sivayo ca samāgatā.
atk-s0514a3:3732_0: Samaggā sivayo hutvā, raṭṭhā pabbājayanti ta”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3733_0: Tattha kumāranti mātāpitūnaṃ atthitāya “kumāro”tveva saṅkhaṃ gataṃ rājānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3733_1: Ramamānanti attanā dinnadānassa vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānaṃ somanassappattaṃ hutvā nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3733_2: Parikiṇṇaṃ amaccehīti attanā sahajātehi saṭṭhisahassehi amaccehi parivutaṃ samussitasetacchatte rājāsane nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3733_4: Tattha assāsayantu manti tasmiṃ dukkhassāsanārocane kathetuṃ avisahavasena kilantaṃ maṃ, deva,
atk-s0514a3:3736_0: “Kismiṃ me sivayo kuddhā, nāhaṃ passāmi dukkaṭaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3737_0: Taṃ me katte viyācikkha, kasmā pabbājayanti ma”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3738_0: Tattha kisminti katarasmiṃ kāraṇe. Viyācikkhāti vitthārato kathehi.
atk-s0514a3:3741_0: “Uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3745_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto somanassappatto hutvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3747_0: “Hadayaṃ cakkhumpahaṃ dajjaṃ, kiṃ me bāhirakaṃ dhanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3748_0: Hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā, muttā veḷuriyā maṇi.
atk-s0514a3:3751_0: Dadeyyaṃ na vikampeyyaṃ, dāne me ramate mano.
atk-s0514a3:3753_0: “Kāmaṃ maṃ sivayo sabbe, pabbājentu hanantu vā;
atk-s0514a3:3754_0: Neva dānā viramissaṃ, kāmaṃ chindantu sattadhā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3755_0: Tattha yācakamāgateti yācake āgate taṃ yācakaṃ disvā. Neva dānā viramissanti neva dānā viramissāmi.
atk-s0514a3:3756_0: Taṃ sutvā kattā neva raññā dinnaṃ na nāgarehi dinnaṃ attano matiyā eva aparaṃ sāsanaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a3:3758_0: “Evaṃ taṃ sivayo āhu, negamā ca samāgatā;
atk-s0514a3:3760_0: Yena pabbājitā yanti, tena gacchatu subbato”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3761_0: Tattha kontimārāyāti kontimārāya nāma nadiyā tīrena.
atk-s0514a3:3761_1: Girimārañjaraṃ patīti ārañjaraṃ nāma giriṃ abhimukho hutvā.
atk-s0514a3:3761_2: Yenāti yena maggena raṭṭhā pabbājitā rājāno gacchanti,
atk-s0514a3:3761_3: tena subbato vessantaropi gacchatūti evaṃ sivayo kathentīti āha.
atk-s0514a3:3761_4: Idaṃ kira so devatādhiggahito hutvā kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:3762_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “sādhu dosakārakānaṃ gatamaggena gamissāmi,
atk-s0514a3:3762_1: maṃ kho pana nāgarā na aññena dosena pabbājenti,
atk-s0514a3:3762_3: Evaṃ santepi ahaṃ sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0514a3:3762_4: nāgarā me ekadivasaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ okāsaṃ dentu,
atk-s0514a3:3762_5: sve dānaṃ datvā tatiyadivase gamissāmī”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3765_0: Rattindivaṃ me khamatha, yāva dānaṃ dadāmaha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3766_3: ahaṃ sve sattasatakaṃ nāma mahādānaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0514a3:3766_11: nānappakārāni ca annapānādīni antamaso surampi sabbaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ upaṭṭhapehī”ti sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3766_12: vicāretvā amacce uyyojetvā ekakova maddiyā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sirisayanapiṭṭhe nisīditvā tāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3769_0: Yaṃ te kiñci mayā dinnaṃ, dhanaṃ dhaññañca vijjati.
atk-s0514a3:3771_0: “Hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā, muttā veḷuriyā bahū;
atk-s0514a3:3772_0: Sabbaṃ taṃ nidaheyyāsi, yañca te pettikaṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3773_0: Tattha nidaheyyāsīti nidhiṃ katvā ṭhapeyyāsi. Pettikanti pitito āgataṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3776_0: Kuhiṃ deva nidahāmi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3777_0: Tattha tamabravīti “mayhaṃ sāmikena vessantarena ettakaṃ kālaṃ ‘dhanaṃ nidhehī’ti na vuttapubbaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3781_0: Na hi dānā paraṃ atthi, patiṭṭhā sabbapāṇina”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3782_1: maddi koṭṭhādīsu anidahitvā anugāmikanidhiṃ nidahamānā sīlavantesu dadeyyāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3782_2: Na hi dānā paranti dānato uttaritaraṃ patiṭṭhā nāma na hi atthi.
atk-s0514a3:3783_0: Sā “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchi. Atha naṃ uttaripi ovadanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:3786_0: Yo ca taṃ bhattā maññeyya, sakkaccaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahe.
atk-s0514a3:3788_0: “No ce taṃ bhattā maññeyya, mayā vippavasena te;
atk-s0514a3:3789_0: Aññaṃ bhattāraṃ pariyesa, mā kisittho mayā vinā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3790_1: Yo ca taṃ bhattā maññeyyāti bhadde,
atk-s0514a3:3790_2: yo ca mayi gate “ahaṃ te bhattā bhavissāmī”ti taṃ maññissati,
atk-s0514a3:3790_4: Mayā vippavasena teti mayā saddhiṃ tava vippavāsena sace koci “ahaṃ te bhattā bhavissāmī”ti taṃ na maññeyya,
atk-s0514a3:3790_6: Mā kisittho mayā vināti mayā vinā hutvā mā kisā bhavi,
atk-s0514a3:3791_0: Atha naṃ maddī “kiṃ nu kho esa evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ maṃ bhaṇatī”ti cintetvā “kasmā, deva,
atk-s0514a3:3791_3: mayā hatthissa dinnattā sivayo kuddhā maṃ raṭṭhā pabbājenti,
atk-s0514a3:3791_4: sve ahaṃ sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā tatiyadivase nagarā nikkhamissāmī”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3795_0: Tattha saṃsayoti anekapaccatthike ekakassa sukhumālassa mama vane vasato kuto jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3798_0: Abhumme kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, pāpakaṃ vata bhāsasi.
atk-s0514a3:3800_0: “Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ tvaṃ gaccheyya ekako;
atk-s0514a3:3801_0: Ahampi tena gacchāmi, yena gacchasi khattiya.
atk-s0514a3:3803_0: “Maraṇaṃ vā tayā saddhiṃ, jīvitaṃ vā tayā vinā;
atk-s0514a3:3804_0: Tadeva maraṇaṃ seyyo, yaṃ ce jīve tayā vinā.
atk-s0514a3:3807_0: Tattha me maraṇaṃ seyyo, yaṃ ce jīve tayā vinā.
atk-s0514a3:3813_0: Subharā te bhavissāmi, na te hessāmi dubbharā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3814_0: Tattha abhummeti abhūtaṃ vata me katheyyāsi.
atk-s0514a3:3814_3: Tadevāti tayā saddhiṃ yaṃ maraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0514a3:3815_0: Evañca pana vatvā sā puna diṭṭhapubbaṃ viya himavantappadesaṃ vaṇṇentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:3827_0: Kīḷante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3833_0: Kīḷante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3839_0: Kīḷante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3842_0: Ekaṃ araññe carantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3845_0: Sāyaṃ pāto vicarantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3849_0: Tassa taṃ nadato sutvā, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3855_0: Kimpurise ca naccante, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3864_0: Vane sossasi vāḷānaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3867_0: Moraṃ dakkhisi naccantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3870_0: Moraṃ dakkhisi naccantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3873_0: Moraṃ dakkhisi naccantaṃ, na rajjassa sarissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3886_0: Opupphāni ca paddhāni, na rajjassa sarissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3887_9: Tesañhi sāyanhasamaye so saddo pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddo viya bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3887_10: tasmā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā rajjassa na sarissasīti vadati,
atk-s0514a3:3888_0: Evaṃ maddī himavantavāsinī viya ettakāhi gāthāhi himavantaṃ vaṇṇesīti.
atk-s0514a3:3891_0: Phussatīpi kho devī “puttassa me kaṭukasāsanaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3891_2: gantvā jānissāmī”ti paṭicchannayoggena gantvā sirigabbhadvāre ṭhitā tesaṃ taṃ sallāpaṃ sutvā kalunaṃ paridevi.
atk-s0514a3:3897_0: Rajjuyā bajjha miyyāhaṃ, kasmā vessantaraṃ puttaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3908_0: Hitaṃ sabbassa raṭṭhassa, kasmā vessantaraṃ puttaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3910_2: Rajjuyā bajjha miyyāhanti rajjuyā gīvaṃ bandhitvā mareyyaṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3910_3: Kasmāti evaṃ amatāyameva mayi kena kāraṇena mama puttaṃ adūsakaṃ raṭṭhā pabbājenti.
atk-s0514a3:3911_0: Iti sā kalunaṃ paridevitvā puttañca suṇisañca assāsetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3914_0: Evaṃ hessati te raṭṭhaṃ, pabbājenti adūsakaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3919_0: “Taṃ taṃ brūmi mahārāja, attho te mā upaccagā;
atk-s0514a3:3920_0: Mā naṃ sivīnaṃ vacanā, pabbājesi adūsaka”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3921_1: Ambāva patitā chamāti bhūmiyaṃ patitaambapakkāni viya.
atk-s0514a3:3921_2: Evaṃ mama putte pabbājite tava raṭṭhaṃ sabbasādhāraṇaṃ bhavissatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a3:3921_4: Apaviddho amaccehīti mama puttena sahajātehi saṭṭhisahassehi amaccehi chaḍḍito hutvā.
atk-s0514a3:3921_6: Sivīnaṃ vacanāti sivīnaṃ vacanena mā naṃ adūsakaṃ mama puttaṃ pabbājesīti.
atk-s0514a3:3925_0: Pabbājemi sakaṃ puttaṃ, pāṇā piyataro hi me”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3926_1: ahaṃ sivīnaṃ dhajaṃ vessantaraṃ kumāraṃ vinayanto pabbājento siviraṭṭhe porāṇakarājūnaṃ paveṇidhammassa apacitiṃ kummi karomi,
atk-s0514a3:3926_2: tasmā sacepi me pāṇā piyataro so,
atk-s0514a3:3944_0: “Yo pubbe hatthinā yāti, sivikāya rathena ca;
atk-s0514a3:3945_0: Svajja vessantaro rājā, kathaṃ gacchati pattiko.
atk-s0514a3:3951_0: Pavisantaṃ brahāraññaṃ, kasmā cīraṃ na bajjhare.
atk-s0514a3:3960_0: Sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, pathaṃ gacchati pattikā.
atk-s0514a3:3963_0: Sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, pathaṃ gacchati pattikā.

atk-s0514a3:3973_0: Sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, vanaṃ gacchati bhīrukā.
atk-s0514a3:3977_0: Sā kathajja anujjhaṅgī, vanaṃ gacchati bhīrukā.

atk-s0514a3:3986_0: Tena tena padhāvissaṃ, piye putte apassatī.
atk-s0514a3:3989_0: Ciraṃ dukkhena jhāyissaṃ, suññaṃ āgammimaṃ puraṃ.

atk-s0514a3:4007_0: Pabbājesi vanaṃ raṭṭhā, maññe hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:4008_0: Tattha kaṇikārāvāti suvaṇṇābharaṇasuvaṇṇavatthapaṭimaṇḍitattā supupphitā kaṇikārā viya.
atk-s0514a3:4008_1: Yāyantamanuyāyantīti uyyānavanakīḷādīnaṃ atthāya gacchantaṃ vessantaraṃ anugacchanti.
atk-s0514a3:4008_2: Svajjekovāti so ajja ekova hutvā gamissati.
atk-s0514a3:4008_4: Gandhārā paṇḍukambalāti gandhāraraṭṭhe uppannā satasahassagghanakā senāya pārutā rattakambalā.
atk-s0514a3:4008_7: Kasmā cīraṃ na bajjhareti kasmā bandhituṃ jānantā vākacīraṃ na bandhanti.
atk-s0514a3:4009_2: Pīḷamānāva gacchatīti kampitvā kampitvā tiṭṭhantī viya gacchati.
atk-s0514a3:4009_11: Āgammi maṃ puranti imaṃ mama putte gate puttanivesanaṃ āgantvā.
atk-s0514a3:4009_14: Pabbājesi vanaṃ raṭṭhāti yadi naṃ raṭṭhā pabbājesīti.
atk-s0514a3:4010_0: Deviyā paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā sabbā sañjayassa sivikaññā samāgatā pakkandiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4010_1: Tāsaṃ pakkanditasaddaṃ sutvā mahāsattassapi nivesane tatheva pakkandiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4010_2: Iti dvīsu rājakulesu keci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vātavegena pamadditā sālā viya patitvā parivattamānā parideviṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4016_0: Senti puttā ca dārā ca, vessantaranivesane.
atk-s0514a3:4018_0: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:4025_0: Atha vessantaro rājā, dānaṃ dātuṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:4034_0: Dānena taṃ nīharanti, puna dānaṃ adā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4048_0: “Ye vuḍḍhā ye ca daharā, ye ca majjhimaporisā;
atk-s0514a3:4056_0: “Thiyopi tattha pakkanduṃ, yā tamhi nagare ahu;
atk-s0514a3:4059_0: “Ye brāhmaṇā ye ca samaṇā, aññe vāpi vanibbakā;
atk-s0514a3:4060_0: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘adhammo kira bho’ iti.
atk-s0514a3:4069_0: Esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati.
atk-s0514a3:4075_0: Esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati.
atk-s0514a3:4081_0: Esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati.
atk-s0514a3:4088_0: Esa vessantarā rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati.
atk-s0514a3:4091_0: Esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati.
atk-s0514a3:4094_0: Esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati.
atk-s0514a3:4097_0: Esa vessantaro rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati.
atk-s0514a3:4103_0: Yaṃ pañjalikato rājā, samhā raṭṭhā nirajjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4104_1: phussatiyā paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā sabbāpi sañjayassa sivirañño itthiyo samāgatā hutvā pakkanduṃ parideviṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4104_2: Vessantaranivesaneti tattha itthīnaṃ pakkanditasaddaṃ sutvā vessantarassapi nivesane tatheva pakkanditvā
atk-s0514a3:4104_3: dvīsu rājakulesu keci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vātavegena sampamathitā sālā viya patitvā parivattantā
atk-s0514a3:4104_6: tato tassā rattiyā accayena sūriye uggate dānaveyyāvatikā “dānaṃ paṭiyādita”nti rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4104_7: Atha vessantaro rājā pātova nhatvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito sādurasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā mahājanaparivuto sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ dātuṃ dānaggaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:4105_0: Dethāti tattha gantvā saṭṭhisahassaamacce āṇāpento evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:4105_2: evaṃ santepi “surāsoṇḍā dānaggaṃ patvā ‘vessantarassa dānagge suraṃ na labhimhā’ti vattuṃ mā labhantū”ti dāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:4105_3: Vanibbaketi vanibbakajanesu kañci ekampi mā viheṭhayittha.
atk-s0514a3:4105_4: Paṭipūjitāti mayā pūjitā hutvā yathā maṃ thomayamānā gacchanti,
atk-s0514a3:4106_0: Iti so suvaṇṇālaṅkārānaṃ suvaṇṇadhajānaṃ hemajālappaṭicchannānaṃ hatthīnaṃ sattasatāni ca,
atk-s0514a3:4106_2: sīhacammādīhi parikkhittānaṃ nānāratanavicitrānaṃ suvaṇṇadhajānaṃ rathānaṃ sattasatāni,
atk-s0514a3:4106_8: Tasmiṃ evaṃ dānaṃ dadamāne jetuttaranagaravāsino khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddādayo “sāmi,
atk-s0514a3:4109_0: Dānena taṃ nīharanti, puna dānaṃ adā tuva”nti.
atk-s0514a3:4110_0: Dānapaṭiggāhakā pana dānaṃ gahetvā “idāni kira vessantaro rājā amhe anāthe katvā araññaṃ pavisissati,
atk-s0514a3:4110_1: ito paṭṭhāya kassa santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti chinnapādā viya patantā āvattantā parivattantā mahāsaddena parideviṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4114_3: Mattā kilantāvāti mattā viya kilantā viya ca hutvā.
atk-s0514a3:4114_11: Samhā raṭṭhā nirajjatīti attano raṭṭhā niggacchati.
atk-s0514a3:4114_17: Ekamekā rathe ṭhitāti so kira ekamekaṃ itthiratanaṃ rathe ṭhapetvā aṭṭhaaṭṭhavaṇṇadāsīhi parivutaṃ katvā adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4115_5: Tadā pana devatāyo jambudīpatale rājūnaṃ “vessantaro rājā mahādānaṃ detī”ti ārocayiṃsu,
atk-s0514a3:4115_6: tasmā te khattiyā devatānubhāvenāgantvā tā gaṇhitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4115_11: Yaṃ pañjalikatoti yaṃ so vessantaro rājā mahādānaṃ datvā añjaliṃ paggayha attano dānaṃ namassamāno “sabbaññutaññāṇassa
atk-s0514a3:4115_12: me idaṃ paccayo hotū”ti pañjalikato ahosi,
atk-s0514a3:4116_0: Apica kho tassa dānaṃ dadantasseva sāyaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:4116_1: So attano nivesanameva gantvā “mātāpitaro vanditvā sve gamissāmī”ti cintetvā alaṅkatarathena mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0514a3:4116_2: Maddīdevīpi “ahaṃ sāminā saddhiṃ gantvā mātāpitaro anujānāpessāmī”ti teneva saddhiṃ gatā.
atk-s0514a3:4116_3: Mahāsatto pitaraṃ vanditvā attano gamanabhāvaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:4119_0: Avaruddhasi maṃ deva, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4121_0: “Ye hi keci mahārāja, bhūtā ye ca bhavissare;
atk-s0514a3:4130_0: Tattha dhamminaṃ varanti dhammikarājūnaṃ antare uttamaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4130_6: Svāhaṃ sake abhissasinti so ahaṃ attano nagaravāsinoyeva pīḷesiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4130_11: Aghaṃ tanti yaṃ araññe vasantena paṭisevitabbaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:4130_13: Paṅkamhīti tumhe pana kāmapaṅkamhi sīdathāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:4131_0: Iti mahāsatto imāhi catūhi gāthāhi pitarā saddhiṃ kathetvā mātu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpento evamāha –
atk-s0514a3:4134_0: Svāhaṃ sake abhissasiṃ, yajamāno sake pure;
atk-s0514a3:4144_0: Acchataṃ saha puttehi, kiṃ araññe karissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4145_0: Tattha samijjhatūti jhānena samiddhā hotu. Acchatanti acchatu, idheva hotūti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:4149_0: Sace icchati anvetu, sace nicchati acchatū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4150_0: Tattha akāmāti amma, kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathetha, ahaṃ anicchāya dāsimpi netuṃ na ussahāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:4151_0: Tato puttassa kathaṃ sutvā rājā suṇhaṃ yācituṃ paṭipajji. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:4157_0: Dukkho vāso araññasmiṃ, mā hi tvaṃ lakkhaṇe gamī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4158_1: puttassa kathaṃ sutvā rājā suṇhaṃ yācituṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0514a3:4158_3: Mā hi tvaṃ lakkhaṇe gamīti subhalakkhaṇena samannāgate mā tvaṃ araññaṃ gamīti.
atk-s0514a3:4161_0: Nāhaṃ taṃ sukhamiccheyyaṃ, yaṃ me vessantaraṃ vinā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4165_0: Iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, vane ye honti dussahā.
atk-s0514a3:4168_0: Tepi taṃ tattha hiṃ seyyuṃ, taṃ te dukkhataraṃ siyā.
atk-s0514a3:4171_0: Sappā ajagarā nāma, avisā te mahabbalā.
atk-s0514a3:4177_0: Na tehi puriso diṭṭho, rukkhamāruyha muccati.
atk-s0514a3:4188_0: “Yā tvaṃ sivāya sutvāna, muhuṃ uttasayī pure;
atk-s0514a3:4189_0: Sā tvaṃ vaṅkamanuppattā, kathaṃ maddi karissasi.
atk-s0514a3:4193_1: Apare passa santāpeti aññepi santāpe bhayajanake pekkha.
atk-s0514a3:4193_5: Api māsannanti āsannaṃ attano sarīrasamphassaṃ āgatanti attho.
atk-s0514a3:4193_8: Nadiṃ sotumbaraṃ patīti sotumbarāya nāma nadiyā tīre.
atk-s0514a3:4193_11: Dhenuva vacchagiddhāvāti tava dārake apassantī vacchagiddhā dhenu viya kathaṃ karissasi. Va-
atk-s0514a3:4193_21: Saṇatevāti nadati viya saṇantaṃ viya bhavissati.
atk-s0514a3:4196_0: Yāni etāni akkhāsi, vane paṭibhayāni me;
atk-s0514a3:4209_0: Yo naṃ hatthe gahetvāna, akāmaṃ parikaḍḍhati;
atk-s0514a3:4213_0: Datvā ca no pakkamati, bahuṃ dukkhaṃ anappakaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4225_0: Itthīpi vidhavā naggā, yassāpi dasa bhātaro;
atk-s0514a3:4233_0: Taṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti, dukkarañhi karoti sā.
atk-s0514a3:4241_0: “Kathaṃ nu tāsaṃ hadayaṃ, sukharā vata itthiyo;
atk-s0514a3:4246_1: maddī rañño vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ rājānaṃ abravi.
atk-s0514a3:4246_4: Panudahissāmīti dvedhā katvā vessantarassa purato gamissāmi.
atk-s0514a3:4246_6: Gohanuveṭhanena cāti visālakaṭiyo onatapassā ca itthiyo sāmikaṃ labhantīti katvā gohanunā kaṭiphalakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4246_7: koṭṭāpetvā veṭhanena ca passāni onāmetvā kumārikā patiṃ labhati.
atk-s0514a3:4247_0: Apissā hoti appattoti tassā vidhavāya ucchiṭṭhakampi bhuñjituṃ ananucchavikova.
atk-s0514a3:4247_1: Yo nanti yo nīcajacco taṃ vidhavaṃ anicchamānaññeva hatthe gahetvā kaḍḍhati.
atk-s0514a3:4247_3: bhūmyā ca parisumbhanāti asāmikaṃ itthiṃ hatthapādehi kesaggahaṇaṃ, ukkhepā,
atk-s0514a3:4247_4: bhūmiyaṃ pātananti etāni avamaññanāni katvā atikkamanti.
atk-s0514a3:4247_5: Datvā cāti asāmikāya itthiyā evarūpaṃ bahuṃ anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ parapuriso datvā ca no pakkamati nirāsaṅko olokentova tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0514a3:4248_9: yāvajīvaṃ amhākaññeva bhāro jāto”tiādīni vacanāni vadantehi bhātūhipi sakhinīhipi ativākyaṃ garahavacanaṃ neva na labhati.
atk-s0514a3:4249_1: kittisampannā yā itthī attano sāmikassa daliddassa dukkhappattakāle sayampi daliddī samānā dukkhāva hoti,
atk-s0514a3:4249_2: tassa aḍḍhakāle teneva saddhiṃ aḍḍhā sukhappattā hoti,
atk-s0514a3:4249_5: Sacepi hi itthiyā sakalapathavī na bhijjati,
atk-s0514a3:4249_6: tāya sakalāya pathaviyā sāva issarā hoti,
atk-s0514a3:4249_8: Sukharā vata itthiyoti suṭṭhu kharā vata itthiyo.
atk-s0514a3:4252_0: Ime te daharā puttā, jālī kaṇhājinā cubho;
atk-s0514a3:4253_0: Nikkhippa lakkhaṇe gaccha, mayaṃ te posayāmase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4254_0: Tattha jālī kaṇhājinā cubhoti jālī ca kaṇhājinā cāti ubho. Nikkhippāti ime nikkhipitvā gacchāhīti.
atk-s0514a3:4257_0: Piyā me puttakā deva, jālī kaṇhājinā cubho;
atk-s0514a3:4259_0: Tattha tyamhanti te dārakā amhākaṃ tattha araññe.
atk-s0514a3:4284_0: Phuṭṭhā ḍaṃsehi makasehi, kathaṃ kāhanti dārakā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4285_0: Tattha palasate kaṃseti palasatena katāya kañcanapātiyā.
atk-s0514a3:4285_1: Gonake cittasanthateti mahāpiṭṭhiyaṃ kāḷakojave ceva vicittake santhare ca.
atk-s0514a3:4285_2: Cāmaramorahatthehīti cāmarehi ceva morahatthehi ca bījitaṅgā.
atk-s0514a3:4286_2: Mahāsattassa catusindhavayuttaṃ alaṅkatarathaṃ ānetvā rājadvāre ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4286_3: Maddīpi sassusasure vanditvā sesitthiyo apaloketvā dve putte ādāya vessantarato paṭhamataraṃ gantvā rathe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4289_0: Mā deva paridevesi, mā ca tvaṃ vimano ahu;
atk-s0514a3:4290_0: Yathā mayaṃ bhavissāma, tathā hessanti dārakā.
atk-s0514a3:4297_0: Pitu mātu ca vanditvā, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4301_3: Katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇanti padakkhiṇañca katvā.
atk-s0514a3:4304_0: Āmanta kho taṃ gacchāma, arogā hontu ñātayo”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4305_2: tato vessantaro rājā yattha “vessantaraṃ rājānaṃ passissāmā”ti bahuko jano ṭhito āsi,
atk-s0514a3:4305_3: tattha rathaṃ pesetvā mahājanaṃ āpucchanto “āmanta kho taṃ gacchāma,
atk-s0514a3:4306_1: dānādīni puññāni karothā”ti tesaṃ ovaditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a3:4306_2: Gacchante pana bodhisatte mātā “putto me dānavittako dānaṃ detū”ti ābharaṇehi saddhiṃ sattaratanapūrāni sakaṭāni ubhosu passesu pesesi.
atk-s0514a3:4306_3: Sopi attano kāyāruḷhameva ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā sampattayācakānaṃ aṭṭhārasa vāre datvā avasesaṃ sabbaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4306_4: So nagarā nikkhamitvā ca nivattitvā oloketukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:4306_5: Athassa manaṃ paṭicca rathappamāṇaṭṭhāne mahāpathavī bhijjitvā kulālacakkaṃ viya parivattitvā rathaṃ nagarābhimukhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4309_0: Sayaṃ pana oloketvā maddimpi olokāpetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:4314_0: Atha mahāsatto sahajāte saṭṭhisahassaamacce ca sesajanañca nivattāpetvā rathaṃ pājento maddiṃ āha – “bhadde,
atk-s0514a3:4314_4: Athassa sattasatakaṃ mahādānaṃ sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontā cattāro brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ āgantvā “kuhiṃ vessantaro
atk-s0514a3:4314_5: rājā”ti pucchitvā “dānaṃ datvā gato”ti vutte “kiñci gahetvā gato”ti pucchitvā “rathena gato”ti sutvā
atk-s0514a3:4314_7: Atha maddī te āgacchante disvā “yācakā āgacchanti,
atk-s0514a3:4316_0: “Taṃ brāhmaṇā anvagamuṃ, te naṃ asse ayācisuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4318_0: Assesu pana dinnesu rathadhuraṃ ākāseyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4318_1: Atha brāhmaṇesu gatamattesuyeva cattāro devaputtā rohiccamigavaṇṇena āgantvā rathadhuraṃ sampaṭicchitvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4318_2: Mahāsatto tesaṃ devaputtabhāvaṃ ñatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:4322_0: Tattha dakkhiṇassāti susikkhitā assā viya maṃ vahanti.
atk-s0514a3:4323_0: Atha naṃ evaṃ gacchantaṃ aparo brāhmaṇo āgantvā rathaṃ yāci.
atk-s0514a3:4323_1: Mahāsatto puttadāraṃ otāretvā tassa rathaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4326_0: Tassa taṃ yācitodāsi, na cassupahato mano.
atk-s0514a3:4330_1: Na cassupahato manoti na cassa mano olīno.
atk-s0514a3:4331_0: Tato paṭṭhāya pana te sabbepi pattikāva ahesuṃ. Atha mahāsatto maddiṃ avoca –
atk-s0514a3:4333_0: “Tvaṃ maddi kaṇhaṃ gaṇhāhi, lahu esā kaniṭṭhikā;
atk-s0514a3:4334_0: Ahaṃ jāliṃ gahessāmi, garuko bhātiko hi so”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4335_0: Evañca pana vatvā ubhopi khattiyā dve dārake aṅkenādāya pakkamiṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:4341_0: Te paṭipathaṃ āgacchante manusse disvā “kuhiṃ vaṅkapabbato”ti pucchanti.
atk-s0514a3:4348_0: Maggassa ubhosu passesu vividhaphaladhārino rukkhe disvā dārakā kandanti.
atk-s0514a3:4348_1: Mahāsattassānubhāvena phaladhārino rukkhā onamitvā hatthasamphassaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0514a3:4361_0: Jetuttaranagarato suvaṇṇagiritālo nāma pabbato pañca yojanāni,
atk-s0514a3:4361_1: tato kontimārā nāma nadī pañca yojanāni,
atk-s0514a3:4361_2: tato añcaragiri nāma pabbato pañca yojanāni,
atk-s0514a3:4361_5: Iti taṃ maggaṃ jetuttaranagarato tiṃsayojanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0514a3:4365_0: Upagacchantā ca pana jetuttaranagarato pātarāsasamaye nikkhamitvā sāyanhasamaye cetaraṭṭhe mātulanagaraṃ pattā.
atk-s0514a3:4369_1: Mahāsatto antonagaraṃ apavisitvā nagaradvāreyeva sālāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0514a3:4369_2: Athassa maddī bodhisattassa pādesu rajaṃ puñchitvā pāde sambāhitvā “vessantarassa āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:4369_3: sālāto nikkhamitvā tassa cakkhupathe sālādvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4369_4: Nagaraṃ pavisantiyo ca nikkhamantiyo ca itthiyo taṃ disvā parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4376_1: Paridhāvatīti evaṃ sukhumālī hutvā pattikāva vicarati.
atk-s0514a3:4377_0: Mahājano maddiñca vessantarañca dve putte cassa anāthāgamanena āgate disvā gantvā rājūnaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0514a3:4377_1: Saṭṭhisahassā rājāno rodantā paridevantā tassa santikaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4380_0: Kacci nu deva kusalaṃ, kacci deva anāmayaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4381_0: Kacci pitā arogo te, sivīnañca anāmayaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4383_0: “Ko te balaṃ mahārāja, ko nu te rathamaṇḍalaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4386_5: Ko te balanti kuhiṃ tava balakāyo.
atk-s0514a3:4387_0: Atha nesaṃ mahāsatto attano āgatakāraṇaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a3:4390_0: Atho pitā arogo me, sivīnañca anāmayaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4402_0: Avaruddhasi maṃ rājā, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4403_0: Okāsaṃ sammā jānātha, vane yattha vasāmase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4404_0: Tattha tasmiṃ meti tasmiṃ kāraṇe mayhaṃ sivayo kuddhā.
atk-s0514a3:4404_1: Upahatomanoti upahatacitto kuddhova maṃ raṭṭhā pabbājesi.
atk-s0514a3:4412_0: Tattha pavedayāti kathehi, sabbaṃ paṭiyādetvā dassāma. Bhisanti bhisamūlaṃ, yaṃkiñci kandajātaṃ vā.
atk-s0514a3:4416_0: Avaruddhasi maṃ rājā, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4417_0: Okāsaṃ sammā jānātha, vane yattha vasāmase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4418_0: Tattha paṭiggahitanti sabbametaṃ tumhehi dinnaṃ mayā ca paṭiggahitameva hotu,
atk-s0514a3:4418_1: sabbassa tumhehi mayhaṃ agghiyaṃ nivedanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4418_2: Rājā pana maṃ avaruddhasi raṭṭhā pabbājesi,
atk-s0514a3:4422_0: Yāva cetā gamissanti, rañño santika yācituṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4425_0: Taṃ taṃ cetā purakkhatvā, patītā laddhapaccayā;
atk-s0514a3:4427_0: Tattha rañño santika yācitunti rañño santikaṃ yācanatthāya gamissanti.
atk-s0514a3:4430_0: “Mā vo ruccittha gamanaṃ, rañño santika yācituṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4433_0: “Accuggatā hi sivayo, balaggā negamā ca ye;
atk-s0514a3:4435_0: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ mama niddosabhāvaṃ nijjhāpane rājāpi anissaro.
atk-s0514a3:4442_0: Matiṃ karohi tvaṃ deva, rajjassa manusāsitu”nti.
atk-s0514a3:4443_0: Tattha sace esā pavattetthāti sace etasmiṃ raṭṭhe esā pavatti.
atk-s0514a3:4446_0: “Na me chando mati atthi, rajjassa anusāsituṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4449_0: “Atuṭṭhā sivayo āsuṃ, balaggā negamā ca ye;
atk-s0514a3:4453_0: Sivīhi bhaṇḍanaṃ cāpi, viggaho me na ruccati.
atk-s0514a3:4456_0: Ekassa kāraṇā mayhaṃ, hiṃseyya bahuko jano.
atk-s0514a3:4459_0: Avaruddhasi maṃ rājā, vaṅkaṃ gacchāmi pabbataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4460_0: Okāsaṃ sammā jānātha, vane yattha vasāmase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4461_0: Tattha cetā rajjebhisecayunti cetaraṭṭhavāsino kira vessantaraṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsūti tumhākampi te atuṭṭhā āsuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4461_3: Athassāti atha mayhaṃ ekassa kāraṇā tumhākaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-s0514a3:4462_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto anekapariyāyena yācitopi rajjaṃ na icchi.
atk-s0514a3:4462_1: Athassa te cetarājāno mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4462_3: Atha naṃ sālameva alaṅkaritvā sāṇiyā parikkhepaṃ katvā mahāsayanaṃ paññāpetvā sabbe ārakkhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4462_4: So ekarattiṃ tehi saṅgahitārakkho sālāyaṃ sayitvā punadivase pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tehi parivuto nikkhami.
atk-s0514a3:4462_5: Saṭṭhisahassā khattiyā tena saddhiṃ pannarasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā vanadvāre ṭhatvā purato pannarasayojanamaggaṃ ācikkhantā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:4468_0: Yattha tvaṃ saha puttehi, saha bhariyāya cacchasi.
atk-s0514a3:4480_0: Tattha nhatvā pivitvā ca, assāsetvā saputtake.
atk-s0514a3:4506_2: Esāti dakkhiṇahatthaṃ ukkhipitvā iminā pabbatapādena gacchathāti ācikkhantā vadanti.
atk-s0514a3:4506_9: Setasogandhīkehi cāti nānappakārehi setuppalehi ceva sogandhikehi ca sañchanno.
atk-s0514a3:4507_2: Kūjantamupakūjantīti paṭhamaṃ kūjamānaṃ pakkhiṃ pacchā upakūjanti.
atk-s0514a3:4507_3: Utusaṃpupphite dumeti utusamaye pupphite dume nilīyitvā kūjantaṃ upakūjanti.
atk-s0514a3:4507_4: So dakkhisīti so tvaṃ passissasīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:4507_5: Karañjakakudhāyutanti karañjarukkhehi ca kakudharukkhehi ca samparikiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4508_0: Evaṃ te rājāno tassa pannarasayojanamaggaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃ uyyojetvā vessantarassa antarāyabhayassa vinodanatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4508_1: “mā kocideva paccāmitto okāsaṃ labheyyā”ti cintetvā ekaṃ byattaṃ susikkhitaṃ cetaputtaṃ āmantetvā “tvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4508_2: gacchante ca āgacchante ca pariggaṇhāhī”ti vanadvāre ārakkhaṇatthāya ṭhapetvā sakanagaraṃ gamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4508_4: taṃ divasaṃ tattha vasitvā tato uttarābhimukho vepullapabbatapādena gantvā,
atk-s0514a3:4508_5: ketumatiyā nāma nadiyā tīre nisīditvā vanacarakena dinnaṃ madhumaṃsaṃ khāditvā tassa suvaṇṇasūciṃ datvā
atk-s0514a3:4508_6: tattha nhatvā pivitvā paṭippassaddhadaratho nadito uttaritvā sānupabbatasikhare ṭhitassa nigrodhassa
atk-s0514a3:4508_7: mūle thokaṃ nisīditvā nigrodhaphalāni khāditvā uṭṭhāya gacchanto nāḷikaṃ nāma pabbataṃ patvā taṃ pariharanto
atk-s0514a3:4508_8: mucalindasaraṃ gantvā sarassa tīrena pubbuttarakaṇṇaṃ patvā,
atk-s0514a3:4508_9: ekapadikamaggena vanaghaṭaṃ pavisitvā taṃ atikkamma girividuggānaṃ nadippabhavānaṃ purato caturaṃsapokkharaṇiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a3:4509_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko āvajjento “mahāsatto himavantaṃ paviṭṭho”ti ñatvā “tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:4509_2: tvaṃ vaṅkapabbatakujhacchimhi ramaṇīye ṭhāne assamapadaṃ māpetvā ehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0514a3:4509_4: devā”ti devalokato otaritvā tattha dve paṇṇasālāyo dve caṅkame rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni ca māpetvā caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4509_5: tesu tesu ṭhānesu nānāphaladhare rukkhe ca kadalivanāni ca dassetvā sabbe pabbajitaparikkhāre paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0514a3:4509_7: te ime gaṇhantū”ti akkharāni likhitvā amanusse ca bheravasadde migapakkhino ca paṭikkamāpetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0514a3:4510_0: Mahāsatto ekapadikamaggaṃ disvā “pabbajitānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti maddiñca putte ca assamapadadvāre
atk-s0514a3:4510_1: ṭhapetvā assamapadaṃ pavisitvā akkharāni oloketvā “sakkenamhi diṭṭho”ti ñatvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā khaggañca
atk-s0514a3:4510_2: dhanuñca apanetvā sāṭake omuñcitvā rattavākacīraṃ nivāsetvā ajinacammaṃ aṃse katvā jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0514a3:4510_3: isivesaṃ gahetvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā pabbajitasiriṃ samubbahanto “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:4510_5: pabbajjā me adhigatā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā caṅkamaṃ āruyha aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā paccekabuddhasadisena upasamena puttadārānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a3:4510_6: Maddīpi mahāsattassa pādesu patitvā roditvā teneva saddhiṃ assamapadaṃ pavisitvā attano paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā isivesaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a3:4510_10: tumhe phalāphalatthāya vanaṃ agantvā putte gahetvā idheva hotha,
atk-s0514a3:4510_12: Tato paṭṭhāya sā araññato phalāphalāni āharitvā tayo jane paṭijaggati.
atk-s0514a3:4511_1: maddi mayaṃ ito paṭṭhāya pabbajitā nāma,
atk-s0514a3:4511_3: ito paṭṭhāya akāle mama santikaṃ mā āgacchāhī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4511_5: Mahāsattassa mettānubhāvena samantā tiyojane sabbe tiracchānāpi aññamaññaṃ mettacittaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4511_6: Maddīdevīpi pātova uṭṭhāya pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā mukhodakaṃ āharitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ datvā assamapadaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4511_7: sammajjitvā dve putte pitu santike ṭhapetvā pacchikhaṇittiaṅkusahatthā araññaṃ pavisitvā vanamūlaphalāphalāni
atk-s0514a3:4511_8: ādāya pacchiṃ pūretvā sāyanhasamaye araññato āgantvā paṇṇasālāya phalāphalaṃ ṭhapetvā nhatvā putte nhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:4511_9: Atha cattāropi janā paṇṇasālādvāre nisīditvā phalāphalaṃ paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0514a3:4511_10: Tato maddī putte gahetvā attano paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a3:4511_11: Iminā niyāmena te pabbatakucchimhi satta māse vasiṃsūti.
atk-s0514a3:4514_0: Tadā kāliṅgaraṭṭhe dunniviṭṭhabrāhmaṇagāmavāsī jūjako nāma brāhmaṇo bhikkhācariyāya kahāpaṇasataṃ labhitvā
atk-s0514a3:4514_1: ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule ṭhapetvā puna dhanapariyesanatthāya gato.
atk-s0514a3:4514_2: Tasmiṃ cirāyante brāhmaṇakulā kahāpaṇasataṃ valañjetvā pacchā itarena āgantvā codiyamānā kahāpaṇe dātuṃ
atk-s0514a3:4514_3: asakkontā amittatāpanaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ tassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4514_4: So taṃ ādāya kāliṅgaraṭṭhe dunniviṭṭhabrāhmaṇagāmaṃ gantvā vasi.
atk-s0514a3:4514_6: Atha aññe taruṇabrāhmaṇā tassā ācārasampattiṃ disvā “ayaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ sammā paṭijaggati,
atk-s0514a3:4514_7: tumhe pana amhesu kiṃ pamajjathā”ti attano attano bhariyāyo tajjenti.
atk-s0514a3:4514_8: Tā “imaṃ amittatāpanaṃ imamhā gāmā palāpessāmā”ti nadītitthādīsu sannipatitvā taṃ paribhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4522_0: “Amittā nūna te mātā, amitto nūna te pitā;
atk-s0514a3:4523_0: Ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4526_0: Ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4529_0: Ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4532_0: Ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4535_0: Ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4538_0: Ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4541_0: Yā tvaṃ vasasi jiṇṇassa, mataṃ te jīvitā varaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4543_0: “Na hi nūna tuyhaṃ kalyāṇi, pitā mātā ca sobhane;
atk-s0514a3:4544_0: Aññaṃ bhattāraṃ vindiṃsu, ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu;
atk-s0514a3:4548_0: Ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ satiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4551_0: Sā tvaṃ loke abhisapi, sīlavante bahussute;
atk-s0514a3:4552_0: Yā tvaṃ vasasi jiṇṇassa, evaṃ dahariyā satī.
atk-s0514a3:4554_0: “Na dukkhaṃ ahinā daṭṭhaṃ, na dukkhaṃ sattiyā hataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4555_0: Tañca dukkhañca tibbañca, yaṃ passe jiṇṇakaṃ patiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4557_0: “Natthi khiḍḍā natthi rati, jiṇṇena patinā saha;
atk-s0514a3:4561_0: Sabbesaṃ sokā nassanti, ye keci hadayassitā.
atk-s0514a3:4564_0: Gaccha ñātikule accha, kiṃ jiṇṇo ramayissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4565_2: Tā naṃ tattha gatāvocunti tattha gāme tā itthiyo nadītitthe udakahārikā hutvā gatā naṃ avocuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4565_3: Thiyo naṃ paribhāsiṃsūti itthiyo na aññaṃ kiñci avocuṃ,
atk-s0514a3:4565_7: Dahariyaṃ satinti dahariṃ taruṇiṃ sobhaggappattaṃ samānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4565_9: Duyiṭṭhaṃ te navamiyanti tava navamiyaṃ yāgaṃ duyiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:4565_10: so te yāgapiṇḍo paṭhamaṃ mahallakakākena gahito bhavissati.
atk-s0514a3:4565_13: Akataṃ aggihuttakanti aggijuhanampi tayā akataṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0514a3:4565_14: Abhisapīti samaṇabrāhmaṇe samitapāpe vā bāhitapāpe vā akkosi.
atk-s0514a3:4565_15: Tassa te pāpassa idaṃ phalanti adhippāyeneva āhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4565_16: Jagghitampi na sobhatīti khaṇḍadante vivaritvā hasantassa mahallakassa hasitampi na sobhati.
atk-s0514a3:4565_17: Sabbesaṃ sokā nassantīti sabbe etesaṃ sokā vinassanti.
atk-s0514a3:4565_18: Kiṃ jiṇṇoti ayaṃ jiṇṇo taṃ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi kathaṃ ramayissatīti.
atk-s0514a3:4566_0: Sā tāsaṃ santikā paribhāsaṃ labhitvā udakaghaṭaṃ ādāya rodamānā gharaṃ gantvā “kiṃ bhoti rodasī”ti brāhmaṇena puṭṭhā tassa ārocentī imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:4569_0: Thiyo maṃ paribhāsanti, tayā jiṇṇena brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4570_2: tasmā ito paṭṭhāya tava udakahārikā hutvā nadiṃ na gacchāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:4573_0: “Mā me tvaṃ akarā kammaṃ, mā me udakamāhari;
atk-s0514a3:4574_0: Ahaṃ udakamāhissaṃ, mā bhoti kupitā ahū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4575_0: Tattha udakamāhissanti bhoti ahaṃ udakaṃ āharissāmi.
atk-s0514a3:4578_0: “Nāhaṃ tamhi kule jātā, yaṃ tvaṃ udakamāhare;
atk-s0514a3:4579_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇa jānāhi, na te vacchāmahaṃ ghare.
atk-s0514a3:4581_0: “Sace me dāsaṃ dāsiṃ vā, nānayissasi brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0514a3:4582_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇa jānāhi, na te vacchāmi santike”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4583_3: Yaṃ tvanti tasmā yaṃ udakaṃ tvaṃ āharissasi,
atk-s0514a3:4586_0: “Natthi me sippaṭhānaṃ vā, dhanaṃ dhaññañca brāhmaṇi;
atk-s0514a3:4587_0: Kutohaṃ dāsaṃ dāsiṃ vā, ānayissāmi bhotiyā;
atk-s0514a3:4588_0: Ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ, mā bhoti kupitā ahū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4591_0: “Ehi te ahamakkhissaṃ, yathā me vacanaṃ sutaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4592_0: Esa vessantaro rājā, vaṅke vasati pabbate.
atk-s0514a3:4594_0: “Taṃ tvaṃ gantvāna yācassu, dāsaṃ dāsiñca brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0514a3:4595_0: So te dassati yācito, dāsaṃ dāsiñca khattiyo”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4596_0: Tattha ehi te ahamakkhissanti ahaṃ te ācikkhissāmi. Idaṃ sā devatādhiggahitā hutvā āha.
atk-s0514a3:4600_0: Mā bhoti paridevesi, mā ca tvaṃ vimanā ahu;
atk-s0514a3:4601_0: Ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ, mā bhoti kupitā ahū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4602_0: Tattha jiṇṇohamasmīti bhadde, ahaṃ jiṇṇo amhi, kathaṃ gamissāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:4608_0: “Sace me dāsaṃ dāsiṃ vā, nānayissasi brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0514a3:4609_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇa jānāhi, na te vacchāmahaṃ ghare;
atk-s0514a3:4610_0: Amanāpaṃ te karissāmi, taṃ te dukkhaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0514a3:4613_0: Aññehi saddhiṃ ramamānaṃ, taṃ te dukkhaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0514a3:4616_0: Bhiyyo vaṅkā ca palitā, bahū hessanti brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4617_0: Tattha amanāpaṃ teti vessantarassa santikaṃ gantvā dāsaṃ vā dāsiṃ vā anāharantassa tava aruccanakaṃ kammaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0514a3:4617_1: Nakkhatte utupubbesūti nakkhattayogavasena vā channaṃ utūnaṃ tassa tassa pubbavasena vā pavattesu chaṇesu.
atk-s0514a3:4618_0: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo bhīto ahosi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:4623_0: “Pātheyyaṃ me karohi tvaṃ, saṃkulyā saguḷāni ca;
atk-s0514a3:4629_0: Sā khippaṃ pātheyyaṃ paṭiyādetvā brāhmaṇassa ārocesi.
atk-s0514a3:4629_1: So gehe dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ thiraṃ katvā dvāraṃ saṅkharitvā araññā dārūni āharitvā ghaṭena udakaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0514a3:4629_2: gehe sabbabhājanāni pūretvā tattheva tāpasavesaṃ gahetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0514a3:4629_4: yāva mamāgamanā appamattā hohī”ti ovaditvā upāhanaṃ āruyha pātheyyapasibbakaṃ aṃse laggetvā amittatāpanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4629_5: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi roditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a3:4632_0: Tato so mantayitvāna, bhariyaṃ katvā padakkhiṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4636_3: Caranti dāsapariyesanaṃ caranto sivīnaṃ nagaraṃ ārabbha pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a3:4637_0: So taṃ nagaraṃ gantvā sannipatitaṃ janaṃ “vessantaro kuhi”nti pucchati.
atk-s0514a3:4639_0: “So tattha gantvā avaca, ye tatthāsuṃ samāgatā;
atk-s0514a3:4640_0: Kuhiṃ vessantaro rājā, kattha passemu khattiyaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4642_0: “Te janā taṃ avaciṃsu, ye tatthāsuṃ samāgatā;
atk-s0514a3:4644_0: Pabbājito sakā raṭṭhā, vaṅke vasati pabbate.
atk-s0514a3:4648_0: Tattha pakatoti upadduto pīḷito attano nagare vasituṃ alabhitvā idāni vaṅkapabbate vasati.
atk-s0514a3:4649_0: Evaṃ “tumhe amhākaṃ rājānaṃ nāsetvā punapi āgatā idha tiṭṭhathā”ti te leḍḍudaṇḍādihatthā brāhmaṇaṃ anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:4656_0: So pāvisi brahāraññaṃ, yattha assosi kāmadaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4659_0: Vikkandi so vippanaṭṭho, dūre panthā apakkami.
atk-s0514a3:4663_0: Tattha aghaṃ tanti taṃ mahājanena anubandhanadukkhañceva vanapariyogāhanadukkhañca.
atk-s0514a3:4663_2: Kokā naṃ parivārayunti so hi araññaṃ pavisitvā vaṅkapabbatagāmimaggaṃ ajānanto maggamūḷho hutvā araññe vicari.
atk-s0514a3:4663_3: Atha naṃ ārakkhaṇatthāya nisinnassa cetaputtassa sunakhā parivārayiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0514a3:4663_4: Vikkandi soti so ekarukkhaṃ āruyha mahantena ravena kandi.
atk-s0514a3:4664_0: So sunakhehi parivārito rukkhe nisinnova imā gāthā abhāsatha –
atk-s0514a3:4667_0: Bhaye khemassa dātāraṃ, ko me vessantaraṃ vidū.
atk-s0514a3:4670_0: Dharaṇūpamaṃ mahārājaṃ, ko me vessantaraṃ vidū.
atk-s0514a3:4673_0: Sāgarūpamaṃ mahārājaṃ, ko me vessantaraṃ vidū.
atk-s0514a3:4677_0: Rahadūpamaṃ mahārājaṃ, ko me vessantaraṃ vidū.
atk-s0514a3:4681_0: Tathūpamaṃ mahārājaṃ, ko me vessantaraṃ vidū.
atk-s0514a3:4685_0: Tathūpamaṃ mahārājaṃ, ko me vessantaraṃ vidū.

atk-s0514a3:4697_0: Tathūpamaṃ mahārājaṃ, ko me vessantaraṃ vidū.
atk-s0514a3:4700_0: Ahaṃ jānanti yo vajjā, nandiṃ so janaye mama.
atk-s0514a3:4703_0: Ahaṃ jānanti yo vajjā, tāya so ekavācāya;
atk-s0514a3:4705_1: Ko me vessantaraṃ vidūti ko mayhaṃ vessantaraṃ ācikkheyyāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:4705_6: Ahaṃ jānanti yo vajjāti ahaṃ vessantarassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmīti yo vadeyyāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:4706_0: Tassa taṃ paridevasaddaṃ sutvā ārakkhaṇatthāya ṭhapito cetaputto migaluddako hutvā araññe vicaranto “ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4706_4: idheva naṃ māressāmī”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0514a3:4706_5: na te jīvitaṃ dassāmī”ti dhanuṃ āropetvā ākaḍḍhitvā tajjesi.
atk-s0514a3:4710_0: Pabbājito sakā raṭṭhā, vaṅke vasati pabbate.
atk-s0514a3:4718_0: “Tassa tyāhaṃ na dassāmi, jīvitaṃ idha brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0514a3:4719_0: Ayañhi te mayā nunno, saro pissati lohitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4727_0: “Taṃ me suyiṭṭhaṃ suhutaṃ, tuyhaṃ maṃsena brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0514a3:4728_0: Na ca tvaṃ rājaputtassa, bhariyaṃ putte ca nessasī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4729_3: Saro pissatīti ayaṃ saro tava lohitaṃ pivissati.
atk-s0514a3:4729_4: Vajjhayitvānāti taṃ māretvā rukkhā patitassa te sīsaṃ tālaphalaṃ viya luñcitvā sabandhanaṃ hadayamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4729_6: Na ca tvanti evaṃ sante na tvaṃ rājaputtassa bhariyaṃ vā putte vā nessasīti.
atk-s0514a3:4730_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā maraṇabhayatajjito musāvādaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a3:4733_0: Tasmā hi dūtaṃ na hanti, esa dhammo sanantano.
atk-s0514a3:4736_0: Mātā ca dubbalā tassa, acirā cakkhūni jīyare.
atk-s0514a3:4739_0: Rājaputtaṃ nayissāmi, yadi jānāsi saṃsa me”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4740_0: Tattha nijjhattāti saññattā. Acirā cakkhūni jīyareti niccarodanena na cirasseva cakkhūni jīyissanti.
atk-s0514a3:4741_0: Tadā cetaputto “vessantaraṃ kira ānetuṃ āgato”ti somanassappatto hutvā sunakhe bandhitvā ṭhapetvā brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:4741_1: otāretvā sākhāsanthare nisīdāpetvā bhojanaṃ datvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:4743_0: “Piyassa me piyo dūto, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāmi te;
atk-s0514a3:4745_0: Tañca te desamakkhissaṃ, yattha sammati kāmado”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4746_0: Tattha piyassa meti mama piyassa vessantarassa tvaṃ piyo dūto.
atk-s0514a3:4749_0: Evaṃ cetaputto brāhmaṇaṃ bhojetvā pātheyyatthāya tassa madhuno tumbañceva pakkamigasatthiñca datvā magge
atk-s0514a3:4749_1: ṭhatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ ukkhipitvā mahāsattassa vasanokāsaṃ ācikkhanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:4752_0: Yattha vessantaro rājā, saha puttehi sammati.
atk-s0514a3:4768_0: Yattha vessantaro rājā, saha puttehi sammati.
atk-s0514a3:4772_1: etassa pādena uttarābhimukho gacchanto yattha sakkadattiye assamapade vessantaro rājā saha puttadārehi vasati,
atk-s0514a3:4772_4: Āsadañca masaṃ jaṭanti ākaḍḍhitvā phalānaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ aṅkusañca aggijuhanakaṭacchuñca jaṭāmaṇḍalañca dhārento.
atk-s0514a3:4772_7: Dhavassakaṇṇā khadirāti dhavā ca assakaṇṇā ca khadirā ca.
atk-s0514a3:4772_8: Sakiṃ pītāva māṇavāti ekavārameva pītā surāsoṇḍā viya.
atk-s0514a3:4772_10: Saṅgītiyova suyyareti nānāsakuṇānaṃ vassantānaṃ saddā dibbasaṅgītiyo viya suyyare.
atk-s0514a3:4772_13: Sākhāpattasamīritāti sākhānaṃ pattehi saṅghaṭṭitā hutvā vikūjantā sakuṇā,
atk-s0514a3:4785_0: Aññe āmā ca pakkā ca, bhekavaṇṇā tadūbhayaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4801_0: Puttajīvā ca kakudhā, asanā cettha pupphitā.
atk-s0514a3:4813_0: Athettha vātā vāyanti, dakkhiṇā atha pacchimā;
atk-s0514a3:4827_0: “Nandikā jīvaputtā ca, jīvaputtā piyā ca no;
atk-s0514a3:4828_0: Piyā puttā piyā nandā, dijā pokkharaṇīgharā.
atk-s0514a3:4832_0: Yattha vessantaro rājā, saha puttehi sammati.
atk-s0514a3:4836_9: Bhekavaṇṇā tadūbhayanti te ubhopi āmā ca pakkā ca maṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇāyeva.
atk-s0514a3:4836_10: Athettha heṭṭhā purisoti atha ettha assame tesaṃ ambānaṃ heṭṭhā ṭhitakova puriso ambaphalāni gaṇhāti,
atk-s0514a3:4837_0: Ateva me acchariyanti ativiya me acchariyaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4837_3: Mālāva ganthitāti supupphitarukkhānaṃ upari ganthitā mālā viya pupphāni tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0514a3:4837_4: Dhajaggāneva dissareti tāni rukkhāni alaṅkatadhajaggāni viya dissanti.
atk-s0514a3:4837_5: Kuṭajī kuṭṭhatagarāti kuṭaji nāmekā rukkhajāti kuṭṭhagacchā ca tagaragacchā ca.
atk-s0514a3:4837_13: Palālakhalasannibhāti tesaṃ heṭṭhā paggharitapupphapuñjā palālakhalasannibhāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:4838_5: Tesu hi kiñjakkhato reṇu bhassitvā pokkharamadhu nāma hoti.
atk-s0514a3:4838_6: Dakkhiṇā atha pacchimāti ettāvatā sabbā disā vidisāpi vātā dassitā honti.
atk-s0514a3:4838_11: Byāviddhāti pasanne udake byāviddhā paṭipāṭiyā gacchantā dissanti.
atk-s0514a3:4838_13: Madhaunti bhisakoṭiyā bhinnāya paggharaṇaraso madhusadiso hoti.
atk-s0514a3:4838_14: Khīrasappi muḷālibhīti muḷālehi paggharaṇaraso khīramissakanavanītasappi viya hoti.
atk-s0514a3:4840_0: Evaṃ cetaputtena vessantarassa vasanaṭṭhāne akkhāte jūjako tussitvā paṭisanthāraṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:4843_0: Madhupiṇḍikā ca sukatāyo, sattubhattaṃ dadāmi te”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4848_0: Itopi brahme gaṇhāhi, gaccha brahme yathāsukhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4855_0: Taṃ tvaṃ gantvāna pucchassu, so te maggaṃ pavakkhatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4856_1: Etīti yo ekapadikamaggo amhākaṃ abhimukho eti,
atk-s0514a3:4860_0: Tattha yenāsīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne accuto isi ahosi, tattha gatoti.
atk-s0514a3:4865_0: Disvāna taṃ bhāradvājo, sammodi isinā saha.
atk-s0514a3:4867_0: “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4868_0: Kacci uñchena yāpesi, kacci mūlaphalā bahū.
atk-s0514a3:4871_0: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, kacci hiṃsā na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4872_0: Tattha bhāradvājoti jūjako. Appamevāti appāyeva. Hiṃsāti tesaṃ vasena tumhākaṃ vihiṃsā.
atk-s0514a3:4876_0: Atho uñchena yāpemi, atho mūlaphalā bahū.
atk-s0514a3:4879_0: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, hiṃsā mayhaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0514a3:4885_0: Anto pavisa bhaddante, pāde pakkhālayassu te.
atk-s0514a3:4888_0: Phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja brahme varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4891_0: Tato piva mahābrahme, sace tvaṃ abhikaṅkhasī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4896_0: Tamahaṃ dassanamāgato, yadi jānāsi saṃsa me”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4897_0: Tattha tamahaṃ dassanamāgatoti taṃ ahaṃ dassanāya āgato. Tāpaso āha –
atk-s0514a3:4900_0: Maññe bhavaṃ patthayati, rañño bhariyaṃ patibbataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:4901_0: Maññe kaṇhājinaṃ dāsiṃ, jāliṃ dāsañca icchasi.
atk-s0514a3:4904_0: Na tassa bhogā vijjanti, dhanaṃ dhaññañca brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4905_0: Tattha na tassa bhogāti bho brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0514a3:4905_1: tassa vessantarassa araññe viharantassa neva bhogā vijjanti,
atk-s0514a3:4912_0: Tamahaṃ dassanamāgato, yadi jānāsi saṃsa me”ti.
atk-s0514a3:4913_4: ahaṃ pana na kiñci vessantaraṃ yācitumāgato,
atk-s0514a3:4913_8: mayā ca so yato sivīhi vippavāsito,
atk-s0514a3:4914_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā saddahitvā “hotu sve saṃsissāmi te,
atk-s0514a3:4914_1: ajja tāva idheva vasāhī”ti taṃ phalāphalehi santappetvā punadivase maggaṃ dassento dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:4917_0: Yattha vessantaro rājā, saha puttehi sammati.
atk-s0514a3:4933_0: Yattha vessantaro rājā, saha puttehi sammati.
atk-s0514a3:4944_0: “Ambā jambū kapitthā ca, nīce pakkā cudumbarā;
atk-s0514a3:4948_0: Suciṃ sugandhaṃ salilaṃ, āpo tatthapi sandati.
atk-s0514a3:4955_3: Na tatthuddhaṃsate rajoti tasmiṃ vane appamattakopi rajo na uddhaṃsate.
atk-s0514a3:4955_5: Tiṇāni nātivattantīti tāni tassā bhūmiyā mayūragīvavaṇṇāni tiṇāni samantato caturaṅgulappamāṇāneva vattanti,
atk-s0514a3:4955_7: Ambā jambū kapitthā cāti ambā ca jambū ca kapitthā ca.
atk-s0514a3:4955_9: Sandatīti tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vaṅkapabbate kunnadīhi otarantaṃ udakaṃ sandati,
atk-s0514a3:4955_14: ekāni lohitakānīti imehi tīhi uppalajātehi taṃ saraṃ vicittaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:4956_0: Evaṃ caturassapokkharaṇiṃ vaṇṇetvā puna mucalindasaraṃ vaṇṇento āha –
atk-s0514a3:4959_0: Kalambakehi sañchanno, mucalindo nāma so saro.
atk-s0514a3:4966_1: Setasogandhikehi cāti setuppalehi ca sogandhikehi ca kalambakehi ca so saro sañchanno.
atk-s0514a3:4966_3: Gimhā hemantikāti gimhe ca hemantike ca pupphitapadumā.
atk-s0514a3:4966_4: Jaṇṇutagghā upattharāti jaṇṇupamāṇe udake upattharā phullā honti,
atk-s0514a3:4966_6: Vicittapupphasanthatāti vicittā hutvā pupphehi santhatā sadā surabhī sampavāyanti.
atk-s0514a3:4969_0: Kadambā pāṭalī phullā, koviḷārā ca pupphitā.
atk-s0514a3:4978_0: Ketakā kaṇikārā ca, kaṇaverā ca pupphitā.
atk-s0514a3:4989_0: “Daharā rukkhā ca vuddhā ca, akuṭilā cettha pupphitā;
atk-s0514a3:4991_4: Vāraṇā vayanāti vāraṇarukkhā ca vayanarukkhā ca.
atk-s0514a3:4991_7: Te kira setakkhandhā mahāpaṇṇā kaṇikārasadisapupphā honti.
atk-s0514a3:4991_8: Nigguṇḍī sirīnigguṇḍīti pakatinigguṇḍī ceva kāḷanigguṇḍī ca.
atk-s0514a3:4991_11: Dhanutakkārī pupphehīti dhanūnañca takkārīnañca pupphehi sobhitā.
atk-s0514a3:4991_12: Sīsapāvaraṇāni cāti sīsapehi ca varaṇehi ca sobhitā.
atk-s0514a3:4991_14: Setageru ca tagarāti setageru ca tagarā ca.
atk-s0514a3:4991_15: Maṃsikuṭṭhā kulāvarāti maṃsigacchā ca kuṭṭhagacchā ca kulāvarā ca.
atk-s0514a3:4991_17: Agyāgāraṃ samantatoti agyāgāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:5000_0: Sattāhaṃ dhāriyamānānaṃ, gandho tesaṃ na chijjati.
atk-s0514a3:5007_0: Kalerukkhehi sañchannaṃ, vanaṃ taṃ tulasīhi ca.
atk-s0514a3:5014_5: Uddāpavattaṃ ulluḷitanti taṃ udakaṃ tīramariyādabandhaṃ vātāpahataṃ ulluḷitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0514a3:5014_6: Makkhikā hiṅgujālikāti hiṅgujālasaṅkhāte vikasitapupphagacche pañcavaṇṇā madhumakkhikā madhurassarena viravantiyo tattha vicarantīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:5014_7: Dāsimakañjako cetthāti imāni dve rukkhajātiyo ca ettha.
atk-s0514a3:5014_10: Tesanti tesaṃ tassā valliyā pupphānaṃ sabbesampi vā etesaṃ dāsimakañjakādīnaṃ pupphānaṃ sattāhaṃ gandho na chijjati.
atk-s0514a3:5014_13: Gandho tesanti tesaṃ indīvarapupphādīnaṃ gandho aḍḍhamāsaṃ na chijjati.
atk-s0514a3:5017_0: Asī tālāva tiṭṭhanti, chejjā indīvarā bahū.
atk-s0514a3:5032_0: Sabbāni tattha dissanti, evaṃ rammo mahodadhī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:5033_5: Asī tālāva tiṭṭhantīti asīti evaṃnāmakā rukkhā siniddhāya bhūmiyā ṭhitā tālā viya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0514a3:5033_6: Chejjā indīvarā bahūti udakapariyante bahū suvaṇṇaindīvarā muṭṭhinā chinditabbā hutvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0514a3:5033_8: Vallibho khuddapupphiyoti vallibho ca khuddapupphiyo ca.
atk-s0514a3:5033_11: Kaṭeruhā ca vāsantīti ime ca dve pupphagacchā.
atk-s0514a3:5033_13: Niliyā sumanā bhaṇḍīti nīlavallisumanā ca pakatisumanā ca bhaṇḍī ca.
atk-s0514a3:5036_0: Rohitā naḷapī siṅgū, kumbhilā makarā susū.
atk-s0514a3:5038_0: “Madhu ca madhulaṭṭhi ca, tālisā ca piyaṅgukā;
atk-s0514a3:5042_0: Paddhakā naradā kuṭṭhā, jhāmakā ca hareṇukā.
atk-s0514a3:5045_0: Vibhedikā corakā kuṭṭhā, kappūrā ca kaliṅgukā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:5046_0: Tattha athassā pokkharaṇiyāti idha pokkharaṇisadisatāya sarameva pokkharaṇīti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:5049_0: Eṇeyyā pasadā ceva, rohiccā sarabhā migā.
atk-s0514a3:5052_0: Cāmarī calanī laṅghī, jhāpitā makkaṭā picu.
atk-s0514a3:5058_0: Ākucchā pacalākā ca, citrakā cāpi dīpiyo.
atk-s0514a3:5061_0: Aṭṭhapādā ca morā ca, bhassarā ca kukutthakā.
atk-s0514a3:5072_0: “Karaviyā ca saggā ca, uhuṅkārā ca kukkuhā;
atk-s0514a3:5074_1: Rohiccā sarabhā migāti rohitā ceva sarabhā migā ca.
atk-s0514a3:5074_7: Cāmarī calanī laṅghīti cāmarīmigā ca calanīmigā ca laṅghīmigā ca.
